The selling point for me on Apple products is the seamless integration with their companion devices, the ease of use & how well thought out the user interface is.I've used the product for one week feel comfortable & productive with it.

Reviews.Title: Met all of our expectations
Reviews.Author: joyce pasto
Reviews.Content: purchased this for our eleven year old grand daughter .  She is very happy with it .  It does allthat she expected it to do.

Reviews.Title: It's perfect!
Reviews.Author: Debbie Fleenor
Reviews.Content: The iPad works great, it is in perfect condition!  It is just what I expected! I could not be happier!

Reviews.Title: first time user and I am satisfied.
Reviews.Author: Dieter Klupsch
Reviews.Content: Enjoying the newness of all the apps, and just the learning curve.  i answered this yesterday as well, so I have no more comments.

Reviews.Title: IPAD
Reviews.Author: Darlene
Reviews.Content: It was great for a first time apple and first time IPad user. Very easy to work with.  I only had it for 3 weeks and it got stolen in Germany out of my back pack, but I just bought another one, I liked it so much.

Reviews.Title: This tablet is perfect for daily usage
Reviews.Author: tim payne
Reviews.Content: Me and my dad share this tablet and its great, we bought this from verizon in 2012 it's a great tablet it does crash a little that's because it's over 2 years old but its just down right great i use it for youtube and web browsing, my dad uses it for some video, email and web browsing and it works almost flawless and it never let is down its just the perfect tablet but if you want tethering i would get the ipad 3,4 and air for wifi hotspot but this is great for everything else and that explains it all

Reviews.Title: Birthday Gift
Reviews.Author: Jessica Overton
Reviews.Content: My husband was thrilled to receive this!  (I had to get him off of my Ipad and this was the perfect solution)

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product, Use all the Time

Reviews.Content: The Ipad is Great, use all the time, The 64gb is well worth getting, very fast.  althoughI'm used to a laptop, with a hard drive to store files, the ipad should have a hard drive.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Allen Raczkowski  Sr.
Reviews.Content: Birthday gift for my wife instant success. It came as advertised everything new and in original package. I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Content: This device has everything you could want, but finding how to work with it is very tough.  My PC experiences probably made it more difficult.  I plan to keep trying to find out how to work with  all the apps.  Might get there before the year is out.

Reviews.Content: Very nice IPad that we have used for more than a year and it is perfect. I would recommend this seller highly. Good price and is the item as advertised.

Reviews.Author: Christopher Ledesma
Reviews.Content: Got his unit as a gift for my Mother in-law and so far no complains. Unit is working as advertised.  Super Fast Delivery!

Reviews.Author: Heuer
Reviews.Content: the only thing you need to know is that this is a slightly better than the very first model. Still the old style charger and connector. Does not have the retina display, and is being phased out. That being said, I bought this for my 3 year old how plays learning games, so no high expectations.

Reviews.Content: Arrived 8 days ahead of schedule - absolutely no signs of wear and tear, except the engraving on the back which is mentioned in the description. Almost looks brand new. When turned on the iPad went through the registration process. Once complete it had ~50% battery life and iOS 7.0.3 - updated to iOS 7.1 and looks great. Extremely satisfied customer - Thanks Turbo Tunes! A+

Reviews.Content: I have not liked any iPad covers as much as this. This IPad looks brand new & works like brand new, my friends can't believe they paid more for the same thing!

Reviews.Title: Glitches
Reviews.Author: Katrina Edwards "trina e"
Reviews.Content: It has a few glitches. At first on the internet I was not able to add the next page. It just started working.  And I don't like the fac that it didn't come with a calculator

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Brandy Marvel
Reviews.Content: Works just like it was brand new! No problems at all. The screen have no scratches and look brand new too!

Reviews.Title: Great  purchase1
Reviews.Author: Candance Johnson
Reviews.Content: The iPad was everything I expected.  Very satisfied in my purchase. I would buy from them again, the only thing I didn't like is how long it took to get it.

Reviews.Title: My momma loves it
Reviews.Author: Marmar532
Reviews.Content: It works great and came with a protective screen on, it should have been more bubble wrapped but it came in perfect condition

Reviews.Title: Refurbished
Reviews.Author: Jon L. Waldman
Reviews.Content: The retailer did not disclose that this was second-hand or refurbished. I round out when I took it to the Apple store.

Reviews.Title: can't do without
Reviews.Author: Grandma Cindy
Reviews.Content: I love my Ipad.  I don't know how I ever got along without it.love it love it love it amen

Reviews.Title: One of the best things i have bought!
Reviews.Author: Brookssm
Reviews.Content: I am not a huge fan of apple. i have pods that i love, and a mac computer that i hate. but this is great! i can use it as my cook book when I'm cooking, watch amazon instant in bed when I'm lazy. play my slacker musing allover the house. i use it all the time! i got a targus 360 cover for it and it looks beautiful!

Reviews.Title: I Pad  second generation.  does not meet its qualifications.
Reviews.Author: Frieda M Baldwin
Reviews.Content: the IPad does  not  hold its charge.  I can charge it to 100% and by evening it could be all used up even when I don't do anything on the IPad.  that is why I am returning it.  I have another order in to take its place that I just ordered.  I would like to put the refund toward the new IPad.  Hopefully I can return this with out any problems.  Thank you

Reviews.Title: Worth the money!
Reviews.Author: Bertie
Reviews.Content: My son has got a lot of use out of his ipad and it's a very good price for what you get. He enjoys it alot.

Reviews.Title: Great iPad
Reviews.Author: MN Mom
Reviews.Content: Great iPad at a great price.  Easy to use with updated functions.  Perfect for the husband and kids.  Wifi connects quickly.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value at $100 discount
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: The Ipad2 needs no further reviewing, but I greatly appreciated being able to buy it a discount of a hundred bucks from the Apple price.  I came in a new box with all accessories and ready to go.  Being able to buy the Logitech keyboard & cover (refurb) at only $25 made for a total ipad/keyboard/copver package at ~$325 with no shipping and no tax.  All in all, a very good deal from two good suppliers.  Shipping was free and fast on both items.

Reviews.Title: Thinner, faster - more likely to slip from your hands...
Reviews.Author: P. Repage "FT Dad, Doctor & PT photographer"
Reviews.Content: the Apple-era has spawned a whole cottage industry spun off from the fact that the units are thin and slippery and expensive to replace.That being said, if you have an iPad, you need a case too.  :-)

Reviews.Title: Great 2nd generation ipad
Reviews.Author: MummsTheWord
Reviews.Content: Bought for my daughter...she simply loves it. Music, movies, ebooks, game apps...she does it all.  Bought this generation because of the price. Worked out well.

Reviews.Title: Great deal good product.......
Reviews.Author: Duane Zink
Reviews.Content: This was just as advertised and came in record time!  I am sure we will enjoy this for many years to come!

Reviews.Title: It's real!
Reviews.Author: R. Bethel "r. bethel"
Reviews.Content: Just got this for my Aunt- it's brand new, packaged, sealed, wrapped- perfect!  Could have used bubble wrap due to what was inside the box.  Seller listed as WIFI- but it says Verizon on the screen.  Trying to fix that now- but otherwise listed as promised, not a knock off, real deal. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Has replaced my computer for 90% of my day
Reviews.Author: E. Murnan "Ed"
Reviews.Content: I can not say enough good things about this tablet. I love it and more so the ease at which I can carry it around vs a laptop. Battery life is superb compared to my laptop and the picture is as well.But what really makes this so useful are all the applications you have for it and how easily you can call them up. Want to send an email or check the ones you have waiting. Easy. Want to play a video game Easy. Do you subscribe to a magazine and have a few minutes and you want to read it. Easy. Listen to music. The same. Take a beautiful and I mean beautiful picture and send it to someone quickly. Easy. Children around and you want to make a little video of them. Easy. I could go on and on and on. But the bottom line is EASY. And for what $300 or so. You can't miss.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Anatoly Ritsman
Reviews.Content: Like the product very much , listen to music,go on internet,much convenient than the home computer.like the product a lot.

Reviews.Title: must have
Reviews.Author: cbb88christian
Reviews.Content: Can't beat for the money, and very user friendly. We have tried cheaper tablets and I wish we would have purchased thr iPad first

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Wesley Mc Callum
Reviews.Content: I have a iPad and finally upgraded to the iPad 2, I am impressed,I really  like being able to get some of the newer apts

Reviews.Title: Great service and product. It's what i expected
Reviews.Author: Jason Largent
Reviews.Content: Everything works on the Ipad as stated by seller. A few dents, but everything works on it. I really like the Ipad so far.

Reviews.Title: A satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Mae Rudd
Reviews.Content: I was excited about my purchase. Didn't get a charger with my iPad but I was satisfied with it. I would purchase something again.

Reviews.Title: Wife is loving it.
Reviews.Author: Elton Hallock
Reviews.Content: It is exactly what we thought it would be and love it.  My wife is loving it very, very much.

Reviews.Title: Great service and product. It's what i expected
Reviews.Author: Jason Largent
Reviews.Content: Everything works on the Ipad as stated by seller. A few dents, but everything works on it. I really like the Ipad so far.

Reviews.Title: A satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Mae Rudd
Reviews.Content: I was excited about my purchase. Didn't get a charger with my iPad but I was satisfied with it. I would purchase something again.

Reviews.Title: Wife is loving it.
Reviews.Author: Elton Hallock
Reviews.Content: It is exactly what we thought it would be and love it.  My wife is loving it very, very much.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: FRISCO
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my Mom and I could not beat the price for a new iPad.  I am very pleased because there is no worry about a fake product or warranty so therefore my Mom can enjoy worry free

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT! =)
Reviews.Author: LadyBug
Reviews.Content: I love my Ipad 2 - it came on time, VERY MINOR scratches (You would really have to look hard, to realize them), also came with the charger -(Does not come with the original box) but I really got a deal! And to add - the customer service with this seller was good as well. WAY TO GO! My son loves it..

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: jiaen li
Reviews.Content: when i bought it the price is really good and valuable. later on the price was increased. I was so lucky.

Reviews.Title: Re:  IPad 2
Reviews.Author: Pat Freeman
Reviews.Content: I was extremely pleased with this I-pad.  It is exactly what I was looking for.and am thankful that I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Locked iPad
Reviews.Author: L. Kelly
Reviews.Content: A great computer but the machine is locked.  Some other wiser iPad users have suspicions about the origin of this 'used' computer.  All I want is directions or help in unlocking.  What I can do on it is very good?

Reviews.Title: It's great in almost every way.
Reviews.Author: Critic
Reviews.Content: I love the iPad with one exception.  The whole thing works very well but they put a very cheap screen on it.  Today I knocked it off a table that is 17 inches high and the screen cracked.  Whatever it's made of is more delicate than glasses that have fallen off the table or other plastic screens on phones that have fallen farther.  I know someone else who had the screen crack.  So, I got a good 2 1/2 months out of it.

Reviews.Title: I Pad II
Reviews.Author: M Eileen Conlin
Reviews.Content: I like it, but there is a learning curve to use it. It came with NO instructions and I needed some.

Reviews.Title: Great product in excellent condition
Reviews.Author: Glenn Ellmers
Reviews.Content: I resisted buying an iPad for a long time and finally broke down.  I wanted to get a used one first, just to make sure I would make full use of it, before going all in.  This item arrived quickly and in perfect condition. I'm very pleased with this seller.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE iPad!!!!
Reviews.Author: tampadoglover
Reviews.Content: I purchased this iPad for my 73 year old aunt a few months ago.  She never used it, then my iPad 3 was stolen, so she returned this iPad 2 to me to replace my stolen one.  I activated the iPad this week and found it to be a horrible unit.  I would return if I could.  It is SLOW, the screen freezes and a real pain to use.  I am hoping that someone will trade me this piece of junk for another iPad that works better.

Reviews.Title: Great Item!
Reviews.Author: Sheri Carroll
Reviews.Content: I love my ipad. It works great and is perfect to take along anywhere I go. Great item love it!

Reviews.Title: I love my ipad
Reviews.Author: Erica
Reviews.Content: I love my ipad. It has been the best thing I have bought in a long time. I am reallying enjoyning my purchase.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Linda J. Wallers
Reviews.Content: I didn't need the newest tech. IPad 2 works for what I needed to do. I'm very happy with it, although I would have liked to spend. Less on old tech no longer in production. Ah we'll, it's good enough for now.

Reviews.Title: Almost like new!
Reviews.Author: AmazonWoman
Reviews.Content: Ordered this refurbished iPad as a gift for a relative. Was shipped quickly. Not a scratch on it, and works like a charm! Came in original box with everything in package. Very happy with it.  :-)

Reviews.Title: My 1st iPad,love it
Reviews.Author: Amy K. Anderson
Reviews.Content: I'm never on the cutting edge of technology.  But now that I have it, don't know how I lived for so long without it.  Love all the apps.  Only problem is, I can't stop using it.

Reviews.Title: iPad forever!
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad.  Previously I had a kindle fire which I loved also until I tried an iPad my wife brought home from her work...I was hooked.  Graphically it is far superior to the kindle fire in my opinion.  Absolutely love the fact that the calendar, photos, etc...will sync with my iPhone.  The available apps from Apple far exceed anything amazon has to offer.  I'm am a freelance graphic designer and love the amount of helpful design apps available on the apple store.  There is even one that allows me to open a file from my computer and edit designs for customers if I'm away from my desk.  The larger screen size in relation to the kindle fire makes this tablet even more appealing to me.  Don't get me wrong the fire is a good product, but with a kindle app on the iPad to make it a reader for your amazon books...who needs it.  Recommend this product any chance I get.

Reviews.Title: Efficient for its age
Reviews.Author: Trevor Rentschler
Reviews.Content: Able to push iOS 7 with A little lag with minimum stuttering. But this lag is very noticeable. Screen is low res compared to other newer iPads but that is to be expected at this price point. Still runs better then the android competitors.

Reviews.Title: I am very happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: Rjanew
Reviews.Content: Once I got the iPad wiped clean and got a charger everything was great. It did come with a case, which I didn't  expect so it was a nice surprise. I feel I got a great deal. In fact a colleague ordered one for himself.

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: crystal carter
Reviews.Content: A big improvement for my company.  Will increase my business 100%. I am very pleased with merchandise.  Looks great on the stand.

Reviews.Title: Great unit
Reviews.Author: Jay B. Greene "jaywriter"
Reviews.Content: After nearly one year it still works great? Wife loves it and uses every day and night. Get one and don't cry.

Reviews.Title: IPAD
Reviews.Author: Tara deeming
Reviews.Content: This IPAD was bought as a replacement for an IPAD that my son accidental broke.  Even though it was an accident, the school made us replace it so I really don't know if it worked and really don't care.  Thanks for having one available.

Reviews.Title: I-Pad
Reviews.Author: june myers
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item for my sister for her birthday;  since she has been using an I-pod for a time, I knew shewouldn't have any trouble using the I-Pad

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Renee Smith
Reviews.Content: It lightweight and easy to manuver I can do every I need to and more it hold a lot of memory

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love
Reviews.Author: Christopher Waynard
Reviews.Content: iPad, iPhone, i anything we know it will always be of a high caliber, as always :) only issue I have with this model is it's non-support for Siri.

Reviews.Title: Fast.
Reviews.Author: R.Thornley
Reviews.Content: I can't ask for more. This ipad2 2nd generation is more faster than my Ipad2. 16gb is a bit small though. Elegant design and finish!

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2
Reviews.Author: eleanor shepard
Reviews.Content: I gave it the best rating because you stand by your product.  The product was in mint condition for a reasonable rate.  When I purchased something similar from Walmart, it was not working.  They still have not given me an even exchange since Christmas.I will definately recommend this product and service to my closest friends.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Susan Y.
Reviews.Content: I bought a refurbished iPad 2 and expected dings and scratches.  In fact, part of the frame has a dent in it that looks like the device was dropped.  Overall though it functions well and I am enjoying it very much.  New iPads are grossly overpriced, so I do recommend going with still somewhat overpriced refurbs... this one was $250.  Satisfied overall.

Reviews.Title: Better than I have expected!
Reviews.Author: Ghassan AlGhouri
Reviews.Content: Although it is a used one but really it is like a brand new one with the original apple box and the charger. Shipped and arrived before what expected, that was great. I recommend such item for any family has children they can use it to teach them with the great children apps in apple store.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: jose
Reviews.Content: Somewhat expensive, but great. No problems yet. My kids and wife enjoy using it all the time. All the application are running well.

Reviews.Title: iPad Rating
Reviews.Author: Teri Charnley
Reviews.Content: We love our iPad!! I am very happy with ordering used products on Amazon!!  I have recommended this option to several people.  The only thing is it seems like the charger cords are very sensitive. Our wires were exposed after the 2nd week.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Jeremy R. Clark
Reviews.Content: We have had this iPad for over a year. No issues at all. My wife uses it for real estate daily.

Reviews.Title: ipad 2
Reviews.Author: Lindsey
Reviews.Content: LOVE IT!  Great picture, quality, lightweight.  Perfect for checking e-mails and letting the kids play games on it...I think they use it more than I do.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Mansfield Plumbing Company
Reviews.Content: Very Satisfied with the product that choose to purchase, great shipping packaged great will shop again and do recommend that you give this a try. My thanks go out to you sellers that care about your customers. Thank you so much

Reviews.Title: Apple IPad 2
Reviews.Author: Carol Jordan
Reviews.Content: Love my tablet! I had bought other brands, but will never use anything but an Apple again....It works great! Can't picture sitting in front of a computer anymore!

Reviews.Title: perfect for me
Reviews.Author: Nick Stargu
Reviews.Content: I found this product on amazon's website and found it to be perfect for my use. I actually enjoy using this more than my surface or my laptop. It allows me to watch many of my favorite shows on it for free and with the headphone plugged in, it sounds excellent too.

Reviews.Title: The best gift ever
Reviews.Author: Retia M. Hall
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect gift to get into the good graces of your mom, child and love ones and Amazon delivers on time

Reviews.Title: Ipad
Reviews.Author: Natalie G
Reviews.Content: I just got it in on Saturday, my kids just love it!!  I would too if they let me near it, it was just as described and is in great condition!!

Reviews.Title: Poor quality touch
Reviews.Author: Deborah
Reviews.Content: The newer models have a  nicer screen and  the touch keyboard on this model is a little hard to  deal with.  There are some letters that require a harder touch

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Lance L. Logan "L Logan"
Reviews.Content: I was recently reminded how cool iPads are when I was forced to work with a bunch of Kindle Fire's.  You can't really compare the two except for maybe form factor.  I'm sure the Kindle must do something better, but I didn't find it.  Sorry Amazon ;)

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2 MC774LL/A Tablet
Reviews.Author: Pam
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband for his Birthday and he really loves it.  He doesnt leave home without it.

Reviews.Title: Could've been better
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: When I received the item, it was dirty. Like food smudges and stuff. The cord to charge with was all dirty and the wall plug was broken!

Reviews.Title: apple the best
Reviews.Author: gusafro
Reviews.Content: good product woks very well and it have a good quality, good materials and good price i recommend it always

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy for college students!!
Reviews.Author: l.a
Reviews.Content: Nextworth was very prompt and gave me an ipad in great condition. It did not look used. It works smoothly and I have yet to have an issue with it. I've had my ipad for a month now and I am pleased and overly satisfied with my purchase!!! It was worth my money!

Reviews.Title: Love love love
Reviews.Author: Ariana DiCaprio
Reviews.Content: Love love love! Came super fast, and in perfect condition. I've had my ipad2 for over a month now and haven't had any problems at all. My mother wants one as we'll for her birthday in April and I am definitely going to be ordering again.

Reviews.Title: Give this to a friend,and he loves it.
Reviews.Author: Richard P. Gard
Reviews.Content: This unit was in great shape, it looked new and works great. It came in a white box just for the iPad with a charger and cord. I think I will buy more this way. Thanks

Reviews.Title: about the item
Reviews.Author: Antonio Leon Parilli
Reviews.Content: this item its used!!!! it was already opened, didnt brin any manual, or the key to open the sim card tray, its alrady configurated, it just brougth the stickers im so dissapointed, this is a fraude, the ipad has scratchs in the back. its supposed to be a brand new. but its not!!! this is a scam!!!

Reviews.Title: Apple IPad
Reviews.Author: t
Reviews.Content: The IPad that I purchased was not actually for me, but I gave it as a birthday gift to student that needed it for his studies and for teaching. After he received he was very grateful and it was just what he needed. I appreciate the company from whom I purchased it, as it came as they described it in their ad.

Reviews.Title: iPad rocks
Reviews.Author: Jenny C Tucker
Reviews.Content: Love its flexibility and portability.  Great for games and notetaking.  Slick graphics and intuitive operation.  Recommend for students and book lovers and gamers.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as described. Perfect condition.
Reviews.Author: Alicia
Reviews.Content: Exactly as described. I don't need any more words to describe what it was. It's self-explanatory. It is as described.

Reviews.Title: Scratches
Reviews.Author: Brady Stipancic
Reviews.Content: Its had more scratches than it said i would not recommend it to any body that wants a perfect ipad

Reviews.Title: *BEST TABLET*
Reviews.Author: eve
Reviews.Content: If it wasn't for Steve Jobs. The world wouldn't be like it is with its best computer technology. This iPad 2 (what I possess right now,) including all the other iPads like the 3 generation, retina display, iPad Air, even the mini are all the best :) :) :) ;) I love Apple, I would suggest for you to get this best tablet in the entire universe, or any other Apple electronic like the iMacs, MacBooks, iPods, and iPhones.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad
Reviews.Author: shaon dunbrook
Reviews.Content: I was.glad to be able to make my purchase on .line without any hassles of shopping.  I am most pleased with my iPad.

Reviews.Title: Very handy in my profession.
Reviews.Author: Roberta Oldfield
Reviews.Content: Very user friendly and serve my purpose easily when out of the officewith clients and do not have my laptop.  I enjoy its size.

Reviews.Title: Super Fast Shipping!!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca K. Grider "Book Addict"
Reviews.Content: Item was actually better than described. Absolutely perfect condition. The shipping was unbelievably fast. I ordered it on a Thursday night and had it by noon on Monday. And I didn't ask for any special shipping, either. It works like a dream - when it came it was already charged. Took me about five minutes to set up with my Apple ID and I was surfing the internet. Fantastic price for a fantastic product!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: vdiz
Reviews.Content: For being used, it came in wonderfully clean and works perfect. I am using it to send photobooth photos VIA Facebook at events, I have full confidence it will work great! My first gig is in a month!

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Elaine K.
Reviews.Content: IPAD looks like new We have not had any issues so far with anything. This was a  great value for what we received!

Reviews.Title: Service review
Reviews.Author: Jeff Bartlett
Reviews.Content: The iPad2 may not be the newest brand but I have been very happy with it so far. I'm loving it...

Reviews.Title: Unfortunate purchase
Reviews.Author: Felix Quist-Natter
Reviews.Content: The tablet was not working correctly. It would suddenly go back to the home screen. Also the seller did not check that the storage account was cancelled from the previous owner.

Reviews.Title: Super Fast Shipping!!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca K. Grider "Book Addict"
Reviews.Content: Item was actually better than described. Absolutely perfect condition. The shipping was unbelievably fast. I ordered it on a Thursday night and had it by noon on Monday. And I didn't ask for any special shipping, either. It works like a dream - when it came it was already charged. Took me about five minutes to set up with my Apple ID and I was surfing the internet. Fantastic price for a fantastic product!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: vdiz
Reviews.Content: For being used, it came in wonderfully clean and works perfect. I am using it to send photobooth photos VIA Facebook at events, I have full confidence it will work great! My first gig is in a month!

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Elaine K.
Reviews.Content: IPAD looks like new We have not had any issues so far with anything. This was a  great value for what we received!

Reviews.Title: Service review
Reviews.Author: Jeff Bartlett
Reviews.Content: The iPad2 may not be the newest brand but I have been very happy with it so far. I'm loving it...

Reviews.Title: Unfortunate purchase
Reviews.Author: Felix Quist-Natter
Reviews.Content: The tablet was not working correctly. It would suddenly go back to the home screen. Also the seller did not check that the storage account was cancelled from the previous owner.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Charles A. Dickens Jr. "joeloggie"
Reviews.Content: works just like a laptop but lighter and easier to carry around, charges up quickly and very portable, is now getting old and discontinued by Apple though

Reviews.Title: Not Bad
Reviews.Author: Philip
Reviews.Content: The Ipad had some signs of it being dropped because of all the scratches on the bottom, but other than that it is perfect!

Reviews.Title: MINT CONDITION!
Reviews.Author: Angielicious
Reviews.Content: We were skeptical about purchasing a refurbished product with such a high price tag because you never know what you're getting yourself into when you can't actually see what it is you're buying until it arrives. Will it be scratched, scuffed, buggy, slow??...etc All of these were concerns for us. NONE of that was the case with this iPad2. It arrived in mint condition!! Not so much as a scratch and runs as smoothly as one fresh out of the box! Would definitely recommend this to others!

Reviews.Title: Great Bargain!
Reviews.Author: Aishah M Muhammad
Reviews.Content: I received my ipad before the estimated delivery date and it works like new. It was engraved by the previous owner but that stays hidden in my case so no worries.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Houtzwife "pianowoman"
Reviews.Content: I got this for my husband, who wanted something to use at our meetings.  The storage space on it is sufficient for what he needs and my son loves playing games on it.  Great purchase!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Wendy moye
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my iPad. I have a nook tablet but it small and the iPad is just the right size. Apple products are the bomb!!!

Reviews.Title: Great I pad
Reviews.Author: jose naranjo
Reviews.Content: My I pad is great and in good condition and works like if I bought it new and I love it.

Reviews.Title: Great,
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: I love my second generation iPad.  Itis very portable and convenient.  It can go anywhere and it is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: IPad review
Reviews.Author: Mihailo
Reviews.Content: it was easy to set up , to download apps  and search the browser. camera was disappointment but you cannot have all apps best in one device

Reviews.Title: Still have it
Reviews.Author: NenaOchoa
Reviews.Content: Love this iPad, have used it since i bought it back in March 9, 2012 and still works.Love the brand and i'm planning on purchasing the iPad Mini for my toddler.

Reviews.Title: iPad Delivers
Reviews.Author: vicharlie
Reviews.Content: This product went way beyond my expectations. Not only does the device perform as advertised, but the extras provided with the iPad were awesome ( carry-case and Bluetooth keyboard and several other protective cases ).

Reviews.Title: Helpful and Straight forward!
Reviews.Author: heidi
Reviews.Content: I gave them a 5 star because I love the iPad. I had a problem after 2 weeks and had too send it back and they went out of their way to rectify the issue! I am please with the product  the professionalism of the company. They kept communication going while they were fixing the problem. Great dealing with Keith and all of the company. Amazon only chooses the best to deliver for us :)  Thank you again Roger & Heidi B

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased!
Reviews.Author: portia
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this purchase.  For a used i pad this functions very well.  My daughter loves it and has had no problem with this.  It appears not to go online with some wireless routers although I have had no problem with the lynksys router which is a better quality than my other one.  Very good quality and I would purchase this again.

Reviews.Title: Great cover!
Reviews.Author: Karengeneric
Reviews.Content: I bought one for my first iPad and loved it, so when I got a second one, I ordered another (the blue is MUCH PRETTIER than the black!

Reviews.Title: apple iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Tageriss
Reviews.Content: enjoy it very much a little rough in the beginning but then every thing is going good now. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Lots & lots of storage.... I steam my entire iTunes library from my iPad to my home theater & in my truck on long road trips
Reviews.Author: Mario
Reviews.Content: After I got the 64GB iPhone 5s, I had to get this 64GB iPad to match!! Gave my 16GB to my dad.

Reviews.Title: I got exactly what I expected.
Reviews.Author: D. Benjamin
Reviews.Content: This was a risky transaction, based on prior experience with used electrical equipment. This iPad and case and charger was a great transaction! Everything as promised! Happy!

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: Mary Ann Callahan
Reviews.Content: If you need a tablet but don't want to spend lots, getting a used model of quality makes sense. This Apple I Pad works great and has double the GBs of similarly priced items by lesser known brands.

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: Mrskaye
Reviews.Content: I purchased the apple Ipad 2 and as of right now I am very pleased with it.The fuctionality of it is great.I haven't had any problems with it.I am also pleased with the delivery in a timely fashion as i was told.The packaging was in great shape.I will in the future order from this company again.

Reviews.Title: LOVE! Perfect for college
Reviews.Author: Gianna
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my iPad! I use it all the time in my college classes. Very light and small to fit anywhere for on the go. I love how much space I have available

Reviews.Title: Apple IPad 3
Reviews.Author: Sarah K mcneill
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my purchase. It came earlier than expected. It was in perfect like new , as promised. and the cover that came with it was just what I wanted...everything functions as it should.  I could not ask for more! Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Ipad
Reviews.Author: Mildred Pintchman
Reviews.Content: The ipad has opened up so many choices I did not expect.  My only wish is that there was something for beginners in writing or on line included so that I could experiment myself.

Reviews.Title: The first tablet I've ever bought

Reviews.Title: Ehhh...it is what it is....
Reviews.Author: Shannan
Reviews.Content: UPDATED MARCH 5, 2014I am starting to hate this more by the day!! This is WIFI only and well, my WIFI is constantly disconnecting!! It's not just my home network, but anywhere I go!! Thought maybe it was just me, but is asked hubby how his was since I bought them both at the same time last week, and his is doing the same thing!! Ugh...ORIGINAL REVIEW:I'm an Android fan and when my Android crashed, I decided hey I'll buy not one, but two of these things!  Ugh...my hubby loves it, I hate it :(Pros:It is super fast!The battery life is unbelievable! Hubby played games for three hours straight and lost only 20% of the battery life!  I spent hours downloading apps and using them and had the same result. I've been using it non stop since 7am and it's now 10:30am, played my games, used Facebook and a few apps, and now reviewing...I'm at 75%. My android would have been dead long ago as well as the other cheap tablet we have.Cons: my opinion keep that in mind...It's too much of a hassle typing when you're used to a smaller screen. I'm a very fast typist, and this thing is just too big for my liking. Did I know the size? Duh! I may return it for a smaller Android though. If you need a large screen, this is perfect! My mother in law and hubby love it, but again, if you like the smaller screens, it's hard to get accustomed to.Takes FOREVER to set up! Omg, you have to create an IPad ID, an Apple ID, confirm this, confirm that, ugh...Finding apps seems to be mission impossible!  I go to the store, they aren't there!  But if I go to the browser and search, it gives me the Apple download and then I get it. So where the heck was it hiding??All in all, this is one of those 50/50 deals, either you're an IPad lover, or an Android lover. If you love Androids, don't bother. If you love Apple products, it's probably a must have!!

I don't know if that means anything is wrong but I hope not. I don't want anything to be wrong with this ipad as I really love using it. Reviews.Content: thank you for the speedy delivery of my new I PAD .  this will be used for my 2 yr old sons ABA(applied behavioral analysis) therapy..  my friends and i order from you because you have EVERY THING we look for . i encourage anyone who can order on line to go to you.  research shows that since  the typewriter  an autistic child  can communicate  through these devices and with technology that led to the I PAD .. thank you for the SPEEDY delivery , my sons therapist is programming all the apps and we are all excited to have the i pad.  in our lives . The survivor cover Is AWESOME also . we are really impressed with that . it is very tough and attractive looking. well worth the money to add it to  the I PAD 2  .  THANK YOU THANK YOU

Reviews.Title: Disclaimer: I a true Apple Fan, only recently converted...
Reviews.Author: T. Clifton "Techie Tony"
Reviews.Content: I'll mix it up a little and start with the things I don't like about the iPad 2. I sold my iPad 2 a while back, but I now have an iPad 3 and iPad Air. 4 iPhones, and an iMac.  On the other side of the fence I own a Kindle Fire HDX 7", and did own a 7" Lenovo tablet, both of which I like also.  Obviously the only draw-back I can think of with the iPad 2 is the poor resolution, which probably isn't even that big of a deal to some people. To me it's a deal breaker, and that is why I sold my iPad 2, however when I got the iPad 3 and realized how much heavier it was, I actually kind of regretted getting rid of my older version!  I absolutely love the light weight of the 2, ALMOST as much as I love the Retina display of the successive models.  I honestly can't tell any real difference in the speed of the 2, vs. the 3, vs even the Air! I guess I'm not all that much into games anymore, which is probably the only place the upgraded power and speed of the newer iPads would ever come in to play anyway!  As I mentioned before, the Retina display to me is a very worthwhile tradeoff even for a heavier iPad.  I actually prefer my iPad w/ Retina and keyboard case to a much more expensive Mac book Air, without Retina display. The reason being, no matter how close you set the iPad to your eyes (such as laying in bed with it sitting on your chest, the clarity is just like reading printed material right out of a book, and to me that's more important than a big screen any day of the week! I much prefer the new fire wire charging cables over the 32 pin one that the iPad 2, android tablets, and other phones use.  I hate having to worry about which side is supposed to be up or down...  The reason I would go with an iPad 2 over any of the other Android tablets, including the Kindle Fire, even though probably all the android tablets have far superior hardware for the same amount of money, is that iEnvironment. iOS, iTunes, iCloud, better quality apps, even from the exact same software on iOS vs. Android.  Owning something from Apple is not about a status symbol or anything like that for me, to me it's like owning a piece of art that makes my heart go pitter-pat every time I pick one up or sit down to relax with one on my chest.  My satisfaction and joy of owning and using such device with such a OS and compatibility with everything in my book is well worth the extra money that Apple charges for their devices.  I'm also very proud to support an American company, versus a Chinese or Korean one... sorry, but do you haters even stop to think that all the Chinese and Korean equipment use poorly paid and poorly cared for cheap labor in China just like Apple does... duh!

Reviews.Author: ChristyAnn
Reviews.Content: This iPad is working great.  Thought I was having trouble with it.  Turned out the problem was with my wireless router.  I upgraded my router and all worked well.  It takes more throughput to run the iPad than to run my laptop, so the it took me a while to troubleshoot since I was still using my laptop wirelessly every day.  I would reset the general settings on iPad, and it would be able to connect to the internet for a bit.  There was an update that I needed, but it crashed the whole thing every time I tried to download it.  Bought a new modem/wireless router at Officemax, hooked all up, and everything is working great!  (Obviously I don't have a contract with AT&T; yet)

Reviews.Title: Hardcore android fans will fine the ipad limiting.
Reviews.Author: Jaunell
Reviews.Content: As an android fan I found three things about the ipad that I liked1) Battery life is PHENOMENAL2) Some of the apps I use on android have better versions on the ipad (this is largely due to the OEM fragmentation of android and a more uniform OS and hardware situation with apple)3) Lots of accessoriesAs an android fan I found a bunch of things I didn't like1) Almost everything has to go through itunes/apple2) No widgets/home screen customization.3) No Amazon MP3 downloads4) No CLEAR access to device flash memory.5) Only apps from the apple app store can be installed6) second hand google apps7) Maps and GPS don't work WELL8) No flash. (although there aren't anymore official android flash player updates. It can still be installed)9) One app at a time (I'm spoiled by my note 2)

Reviews.Title: Great device, even though its 2 1/2 years old
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Shames "DrJeff"
Reviews.Content: This model came out in March 2011, and me and 3 other family members have had one since June 2011.Despite the age of the model it has not become obsolescent like many other gadgets. It runs the latest IOS 7 and apps perfectly. The battery still holds a full charge, and all of the buttons and features still work (I could not say the same about my 4 year old Ipod Touch...).I use it primarily for web browsing, email, Facetime and e-books.This model does NOT have a retina display. Although Retina is nice it makes no difference in day to day use, including viewing photos. So what if I can see dots close up? I am certainly not bothered by them.Sure its fun having the most up to date toy, but having the new Ipad Air would not enhance the enjoyment that I get from the device one bit.Still, it seems like chutzpah for Apple to sell an old model for $400, so if I were in the market, I would look at used/refurbished models. The device is very well built and reliable so I wouldn't worry about getting a used one in good condition.

Reviews.Title: After 2 years
Reviews.Author: sauprankul
Reviews.Content: I got this iPad in October 2011, according to the engraving on the back, and since 2 years seems to be the extent of most gadgets' life these days, I simply had to make a review. A good one, of course.PROS:Weight: By far, the most amazing thing about this tablet is that it weighs so little. I believe it weighs less than any other iPad out there, which is weird, but I think the iPad mini is supposed to cater to those who have a problem with that. The iPad isn't meant to be held in one hand, though. It's a real personal computer, only in tablet from, and you must treat it as such. If you need to be able to read in bed or something, get a kindle or iPad mini. However, you'll find that the iPad is very convenient for most uses.Design: The front of the iPad is defined by a single pane of multitouch glass - and a home button. The back is made of aluminum. There is a front camera, a rear camera in the top right corner, and a speaker at the bottom. This simplistic design, which Apple litigiously fought for against Samsung, is in a word, magical. I'm not too much into the marketing stuff, but seriously, there is something extremely premium about Apple products, and I am sure it is more than the pseudo philosophical marketing. The Smart Cover actually works really well, though its necessity is... debatable. Overall, this tablet feels like its worth 500 dollars. Ok, so it's 400 now, but you know what I mean.Durability: The primary user of this tablet is an unhygienic now-9-year-old who is not exactly dexterous and immediately gets on it after school, sin lavar sus manos. If you know glass, you know that the only thing that can really scratch it are minerals. That's right. Not knives or cleats, though they may if you try hard enough. It's finger salts, salt from food, dust, dirt, sand, jewelry like diamonds and quartz. However, today I wiped off all the prints with a damp hand towel and I could count, I kid you not, 3 micro scratches. That's amazing. This tablet has been dropped, probably not from extreme heights, but still. The glass at the corners, along with the aluminum housing, is tattered. There are several deep scratches in the aluminum on the back. However, there are no functional damages to this tablet. That's also very nice. You probably don't need the Smart Cover for its protective aspect. You will however, want it so you can use it for support. It helps a lot.Display: Eek. I'll kick it to you straight; the resolution of this screen is terrible. If your going to be looking at pictures, you're going to be disappointed. 1024x768 doesn't cut it. My 4.5 inch S2 had a resolution of 800x640. I thought it was sub par, but acceptable. The iPad is just bleh. It's colors are amazing though. I don't know too much about outdoor performance, but I've never felt that brightness was an issue, so it's probably ok. What the iPad lacks in detail more than makes up in size. Laying down in bed with a ten inch screen feels so empowering. I feel like I have all the media in the world in my hands, and I almost do.Apps: I don't use my iPad for work. It stays at home most of the time, and at home, I have my desktop. I would assume it would be pretty easy to use iWork to create, but I wouldn't know. *flame alert* I believe Android is better for smartphones, and iOS for tablets. There is a serious lack of tablet apps for android, but I am continually surprised at the growing iOS tablet app ecosystem. However, there are a greater variety of apps on Android, in my experience. The iPad can actually handle games pretty well, despite its age. That all I really need to say. There isn't any calculator or weather or stocks app, but you'll find great alternatives in the App Store.Camera: Why are you reading this? What are you doing with your life? Why would you want to use the iPad's camera for anything except FaceTime? Seriously? Well, that's all you're going to be able to do, because the cameras on the 2 are terrible. Really. I would expect more for 500 bucks, but whatever. It's not a priority. If you ever find yourself in so dire a situation that you need to use the iPad camera, you better invest in a disposable, or something.Battery life: Ho ho. Tee hee. The battery life of the 2 makes me want to giggle. Even 2 years later, the battery life still feels virtually infinite. I can almost guarantee you, you will never have a problem with the iPads battery life. This is because if the square cube principle. The surface area (screen size) increases at rate of the dimensions, squared. The volume, cubed. More volume means more battery. So, theoretically, the bigger the device, the longer the battery life. Oh, and iOS is super efficient, almost forgot that.Performance: Welp, iOS7 is here. Anybody with anything older than 2012 must upgrade to escape the lag! Not so. Though the animations in iOS7 are super slow and can induce "motion sickness", the iPad 2 handles it pretty well. (I swear, auto correct has something against the word we'll.) The gaming isn't bad for such an old device, though I have yet to try out newer games like asphalt 8. However, you'll be able to stream video (not in hd, of course!) and play 2d games  with no hitches. The keyboard does sometimes take a while to pop up and apps do take somewhat longer to load, but hey, we're talking about an old geezer tablet here.Features: I haven't been able to use Bluetooth to transfer files yet, presumably because Apple wants me to upgrade and use AirDrop. Classic Apple. And I'm pretty sure Siri could easily run on the 2. Oh well, looks like we're stuck with... The two doesn't have any gimmicks, per se, to it. It has the dual cameras, but that's about it. There is nothing to show off. Just to experience. FaceTime is great, though. Like, wow. It's really the best video chat technology I've ever seen. If nothing else, I would commend apple on its FaceTime infrastructure. It's simple and fun and convenient, not to mention powerful.Overall: Even after 2 years of not so nice treatment, my 2 is functionally perfect. It really feels amazing to be able to consume content on such a big screen. The thinness and lightness of the device make it disappear as you're using it. FaceTime really is the best interpersonal video chat platform as of today. IOS 7 runs fine on this, but don't expect to be so lucky next year. I was actually shocked to see the price here on Amazon. Really? 400 bucks for a 2011 tablet? When the 5 is just around the corner and will cost only 100 more? Only a fool would buy it now. However, the 2 really bolstered the image of Apple I had. I have a first gen Nano that actually still works for a whole day! I would expect the iPad to do the same. This review isn't recommending that you buy the 2. All I'm saying is that Apple makes the best tablets out there. Even the most hardcore Android fanatic (which I am dangerously close to) could agree on some levels. iPads are feat for consuming content. Maybe even for creating. However, if you want to get real work done, you're going to want to wait for the next generation of windows 8 pro tablets with Broadwell Chips in them. I need an IDE to be able to do programming when I go to college, and the fact that no such software is available for iOS means that I can't take this there. The iPad isn't a complete replacement for a real computer. But it comes pretty darn close.Sent from my iPad

Reviews.Title: Great product/Great seller
Reviews.Author: dabrown
Reviews.Content: This was an excellent package; iPad, cove and external keyboard. Items were delivered as described. Fast shipping. Retina display must be amazing as this iPad, without it, has great graphics in its own right.

Reviews.Title: Great product/Great seller
Reviews.Author: dabrown
Reviews.Content: This was an excellent package; iPad, cove and external keyboard. Items were delivered as described. Fast shipping. Retina display must be amazing as this iPad, without it, has great graphics in its own right.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: trainer
Reviews.Content: Been very happy with iPad. Very convenient to have with me all time. Can access calendar, email, notes, weather and many programs I've download as apps.

Reviews.Title: ipad 2
Reviews.Author: Jack Nash
Reviews.Content: love it - kind of heavy compared to a kindle fire, but fully satisfied with the unit. Very user friendly even for a technically challenged senior!

Reviews.Title: perfect apple product for my 3 year old
Reviews.Author: Mrs Fluffurs ":)"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my 3 year old son as an upgrade to his ipad 1. He has been very proficient at using ipad from a very early age. itunes store has a huge selection of learning apps for his age group and younger. My son has been a ipad and ipod user sinc he was about 9 months old, he thinks he is playing, but he is really learning. He is way ahead of where he should be and he has had a ton of fun doing it. After ios 6&7 came out his ipad 1  was no longer able to keep up with the technology of the upgraded apps. I purchased the 64g ipad 2 so he would have plenty of room for his apps since some of the apps can be large downloads. i am able to also to limit what he is able to do in settings and the app store. He can only get apps ifi unlock it. ipad 2 was easy to child lock certain features and content. ipad 2's long battery is great on trips, it keeps him busy and i dont need active wifi for his apps to work. I wish that ipad existed with my other children. I like that he is learning on current to future technology that most daycares or preschools can not provide.  I recommend this to any parent. The ecpense is worth it. A childs education id priceless. ipad 2 is perfect for facilitating that.TJ

Reviews.Title: It's a Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Marty D
Reviews.Content: I bought this model because I just wanted a basic Wi-Fi unit to surf the web from home and retrieve my emails. I didn't need the retina display or the 3g capability.

Reviews.Title: ipads are the best
Reviews.Author: Angela Mitchell
Reviews.Content: i love this item it came quick and packaged very nicely most of my friends have one but i was too scared because i didn't want it to break. i love this ipad

Reviews.Title: Touch screen is unprodictable
Reviews.Author: William A Von Alt
Reviews.Content: It works, but the touch screen does not always work.  There are times when I have to press the screen icon several times to get it to work.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: jordan  ceremony
Reviews.Content: Works great, runs well, great storage space, new in package. Very pleased with product. Definitely happy I bought it :)

Reviews.Title: Thanks Apple!!!!
Reviews.Author: sheila mcmath
Reviews.Content: I love this iPad. I am so glad I talked myself into finally taking the leap to buy one. A must!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Jen Peters
Reviews.Content: I was surprised by how quickly I received this item and it arrived better than described. It seems brand new for being a refurb. Good price as well. I'm quite pleased with it! Thanks!!

Reviews.Title: Great quality for price!
Reviews.Author: Gunnar
Reviews.Content: This was a great cheap buy for a good product. The back was a little worn as expected and glass was in great shape.

Reviews.Title: My new Ipad
Reviews.Author: Susana Malnati "Sumalnati"
Reviews.Content: I'm glad with my new ipad that allow me to work on music theory fast and easy with all my piano students.Thank you for the service.  You guys are good business!!!!Susana Malnati.

Reviews.Title: Thank you so much guys
Reviews.Author: Moses Kim
Reviews.Content: A little scratch, but acceptable for the price. And all is perfect. Thank you so much guysIt is you that I can have another transaction with if I want to do again.

Reviews.Title: Patience is what I need and hope that I can soon master the iPad.
Reviews.Author: genmur
Reviews.Content: Nothing wrong with the iPad.  I am having trouble learning how to use it.  I found learning on the computer much easier.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Lever
Reviews.Content: I love it! It is great for my classroom use as well as personal! Love new iOS 7 as well.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Guarantees Third party Transactions....other companies do not!
Reviews.Author: Lexi Jo Larson
Reviews.Content: Bought this used from an individual! Was checking out Best Buy, but they do not guarantee third party transactions and if you buy used, you are at the third party's mercy. Got this iPad way cheaper than any competitor and it works and looks great!

Reviews.Title: Great tool at a great price
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Been waiting to find a low cost iPad - found this deal and it has been great. Upgraded to iOS 7 and it works great.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: KRISTI ODONNELL
Reviews.Content: I  am very satisfied with my new iPad. It has exceeded my expectations.  I was a little nervous about ordering a used one at first, but it was great.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: FoxRun
Reviews.Content: Mom loves the iPad 2.  Works great and easy to use.  Very intuitive. Wish it wasn't so expensive, though.  Would by one for each member of the family.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Colleen E. Davis
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a deal on an ipad2 for a while and got the BEST price for the 64gb ipad2 from chubbiestech. I didn't know what to expect since it was listed as "used-very good," but it is in near perfect condition. Super fast shipping too, I really lucked out and would definitely buy from this seller again!

Reviews.Title: I have an iPad
Reviews.Author: Davka
Reviews.Content: I have wanted one of these since they first came out and am so thankful for the ability to get one this nice for the price I paid.  The iPad came early and was packaged very well.  I am happy that I waited for this item as this is a real treasure.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: T. Ehrich
Reviews.Content: My first iPad.  When I opened the box it looked brand new, and contained the cords as advertised.  About a week later I took a good look at it at an angle and noticed some slight scratches around the edges, but by then they could have been mine.  Great buy as "used" product.  And I love it, have not used my desktop computer since (and my laptop died which is why I got this).  Everything from my iPod touch was automatically loaded on startup, just had to turn it on.  I have used it constantly - email, surfing, twitter, Words...  Much easier to use than laptop, handy to take room to room, easier to use lounging on sofa, reading in bed, etc.  I love it.

Reviews.Title: CHEAPER AT WALMART
Reviews.Author: Angie H
Reviews.Content: Just bought mine yesterday paid only 349.00 for it at Walmart. Save your money and get it there. So far I like but can't use java on it.

Reviews.Title: Just as he wrote!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Sarah Johnson
Reviews.Content: I had a few questions with delivery and seller responded back to me the same day and also provide me with everything I needed to make this buy as easy as possible. He also gave me a few case for what I bought at no charge. The product was just as he explained!!!! Very nice to work with and would buy again

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2 received
Reviews.Author: Jody Renfrew
Reviews.Content: iPad 2 was received when it said it would be. I would recommend to everyone. The iPad works great for me.

Reviews.Title: It has grown on us!
Reviews.Author: Eero Turunen
Reviews.Content: My husband got it for work, but we have found so many more uses for it. The one we got looked brand new, if there were any marks on it, we didn't notice them. Although the case was a little on the dirty side, it did come free, so we didn't have to purchase a case separately. Great product and fast shipping.

Reviews.Title: Satisfactory Service
Reviews.Author: Ballubhai
Reviews.Content: I am completely satisfied for my purchase through Amazon and has no hesitation to give Five Star recommendation. I am very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for!
Reviews.Author: bclin
Reviews.Content: I wanted my son, who has some disabilities, to be able to connect with friends and play games without the hassel of turning on a desktop computer or using my laptop.  This fit the bill!  It was easy for him to use and he is now very interested in FB and communicating through email.  This interest had not happened on our other home computing devices.  This was the perfect fit for him!

Reviews.Title: Great Ipad But A Bad Cord, Sucks I Have To Get A New One
Reviews.Author: Christopher Adams
Reviews.Content: I love my IPad but the cord that came with it doesn't work!!! Sucks I have to buy a new one!!!

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2 received
Reviews.Author: Jody Renfrew
Reviews.Content: iPad 2 was received when it said it would be. I would recommend to everyone. The iPad works great for me.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: C. F. Jones
Reviews.Content: Received this for my birthday and can't tear it out of my husband's hands.  But when I do, I really am enjoying it!!

Reviews.Title: just what we needed
Reviews.Author: Bdawg
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful product and works as advertised. I am very glad I purchased this product and would recommend this product to any person looking for a product like this. Amazon continues to provide quality items using a platform that is easy to navigate and use.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I expected
Reviews.Author: Californiamom
Reviews.Content: Love the iPad .  It's not perfect but does everything that I need. I love that it is so easy to get started, about 15 minute setup and I was up and running.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Roxanna
Reviews.Content: Loved this IPad.  It was practically brand new.  No marks or scratches.  It is used every day and it was everything I expected.

Reviews.Title: Otherwise perfect.
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Pretty sure the power cord was designed to drum up residual income from off the initial purchase, plugging it in takes to much time, seems unreasonably difficult, and the cord too delicate. Now I know why iPad owners I know have had to order new cords. Otherwise, seemingly a perfect little machine.

Reviews.Title: C'est tre PERFECT
Reviews.Author: Fanette
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this gadget! I use it for leisure and for school and it helps me out so very much. I have two laptops as well as this iPad and quick frankly, sometimes a laptop is too much sometimes. It's interesting how I've noticed that. Perfect and wonderful overall! I'd highly recommend it to anyone looking for a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2
Reviews.Author: John Stone
Reviews.Content: it's good, I bought it to be a gift to my wife, and my wife liked it, she always uses it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Michelle Hicks
Reviews.Content: I was worried about purchasing used electronic. Great value. My iPad arrived in the exact shape they stated. Better then I expected!

Reviews.Title: Super Switch!
Reviews.Author: winter
Reviews.Content: I recently bought a Windows version of a tablet and it was so horrible It was virtually unusable. So I turned it in for this iPad and I love. It actually works! The only compliant that I think almost everyone has is there is no USB port but its better than a windows device that has a USB port and hardly functions.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Jacqui
Reviews.Content: Love the IPad, great price, good shipping and without tax it was cheaper then in the store. Also we used a lot of gift cards we had saved up to buy it!

Reviews.Title: Very easy to set up and use!
Reviews.Author: Susan in Cincinnati
Reviews.Content: I need to learn how to use the notes application and few other things on this but I love how handy it is to use when you're around the house and don't want to run to your computer to look things up online. My phone screen is too small to read most websites but the Ipad is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use. Lots of hard drive space.
Reviews.Author: shelby1069
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a gift for my mother. Easy to use and set up. Using every day and having no problems. She has trouble with electronics but the ipad is working out great!!!

Reviews.Title: Best purchase ever
Reviews.Author: Jones
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this iPad. I was thinking about buying it directly from apple at first. Then I thought getting the one with retina display but heard it wasn't worth it. So I decided to go with the iPad 2. It has been great already. It was used and has 2 small scratches on the back. No big deal. Simple wear and tear. I definitely recommend this. It was shipped immediately and received right on time.

Reviews.Title: Buying a used iPad2
Reviews.Author: Christiane Fox
Reviews.Content: Bought it used and spent hours on line with Apple to discover that the operating system had not been updated. Therefore I could not receive/send email or use the internet. A more computer saavy person than I might have caught onto the problem faster than I did, but with no Apple experience, I was pretty lost.So buying a used tablet with no literature wasn't ideal for me.

Reviews.Title: It's a 'love, hate relationship'
Reviews.Author: George Clark
Reviews.Content: I tired years ago of trying to figure out the nuances of different computer systems. I love Macs, so why does this thing seem almost alien in comparison? From email to the internet, everything is similar but different at the same time. Perhaps if I used it as often as my home computer, I wouldn't be so clumsy with it. All that aside, it's a beautiful machine and wouldn't trade it for any other pad.

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: Robbin Murray
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday present for my son and he just loves it.  We are very pleased with this product Robbin Murray

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Jaffster211
Reviews.Content: This is one amazing thing it's great for games travel gps you name it it does it I would recommend to all.

Reviews.Title: I just love my iPad 2 32 GB Wi-fi
Reviews.Author: Ivan J. Andrade
Reviews.Content: One of the greatest devices I ever had. Great for use in meetings, reading emails, taking notes. Of course its usefulness depends on the applications you install.My favorite apps:For productivity: iThoughts HD, Evernote,Trello, Polkast, TeamviewerFor Reviewing News: Flipboard, Readability and ZiteFor movies: NetflixFor social networking: Twhell, HootsuiteFor Sharing Music: Polkast Music, JangoFor Reading: Kindle, NewsStand, iBooksGames: Infinity Blade, Infinity Blade II, KOTOR, The Walking Dead, Angry BirdsAlso, iOS 7 is coming in September 2013. iPad 2 is the oldest device that will be supported

Reviews.Title: First iPad
Reviews.Author: Betty W Swoveland
Reviews.Content: Never used a pad before, but I'm impressed at how easy it is. Basically turn it on (a friends helpe with that) and go!

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Joyce Willis
Reviews.Content: Its everything i expected..it was easy to set up and came in perfect condition.  Feel that I got a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: William Downer
Reviews.Content: This arrived quickly and in good shape.  Absolutely love all the features and apps.  Use it every day and every night.  Great as a reader too.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Robert E Lee
Reviews.Content: Product arrived on time and was very secure and attractive in the outer and inner packaging.  The IPad is one of my favorite tools. Reviews.Title: Far more useful than I had imagined it would - now my constant companion
Reviews.Author: PositiveLogic
Reviews.Content: I have resisted getting a tablet for years. As others have observed, a computer without a real keyboard is weighted toward content consumption rather than content creation (otherwise known as work). To fill the need for a lightweight, long battery life, zero fan/vent portable, I had purchased a Chromeook. Frankly, after the novelty wore off, it was sitting in the drawer more than on my lap.Well a month or so ago, on a whim I got the iPad 2. Within 24 hours of playing with it and discovering both powerful productivity (like aTimelogger and DayOne) and music apps (such as Synthesia, Garage Band) that fill voids in what I've seen as an owner of an Android phone, I became a devoted member of the iPad cult. From there, I tested several keyboards and have settled on the Kensington Ultimate and Logic Fabricskin.Now, after month downrange, it smile on my face hasn't worn off -- the iPad and I are inseparable. It is really an integral part of my life and work.I will probably sell the Chromebook on eBay. This will be the first of many iPads to come as they come out with newer versions.

Reviews.Title: perfect

Reviews.Content: all is good i like it i will buy again from this seller. good delivery well timed also material good and as described. also well seal an protected.

Everything I used to do on my computer, (check email, shopping, etc.) I want to do all those things on this iPad all the time now. It's fast, responsive, has pretty much everything you could think of table-wise.I'm going to have this for while, I know that much.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Amy Phillips
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad 2.  I really do.  I bought it for college, and so far I can do everything from read textbooks to take notes to stay in touch with my family, all on one device.  I know there are a lot of arguments about Android vs. iOS.  Personally, I prefer iOS because it is a very simple interface and I don't need a lot of customization.  If you like to change every single aspect from the background to the icons, etc, then you might prefer a different OS.  But for me, this is perfect.

I was a little skeptical buying a used iPad, but getting it for nearly half the price was worth trying it (30 day warranty sealed the deal).Better than buying on Craigslist, as you can actually return these as long as it's within the 30 day window.

I would not spend 150 extra dollars for tretina disply, A-6 chip, and longer battery life, and siri, when this is really good. I love my ipad 2.

Reviews.Author: Dan "danoinct"

If I get more than 20 feet from the access point, the connection randomly drops out.I've heard others complain about this as well, but your results may vary. Just keep in mind that other tablets have multiple antennas to avoid this issue.

Reviews.Title: As Ordered
Reviews.Author: Lance B.
Reviews.Content: There are several positive things to be said. First Hi-Tech Deals got my order to me quickly. Second, the iPad2 works great. Third, The case that was sent with it was a nice extra. Fourth, the iPad 2 works great except for its inability to stay on the WiFi. After doing some research I found out the problem is not the iPad but the new Apple 6.x update for the iPad2.  (Warning to owners of iPads, be careful of Apples new 6.x update as it does not help like it should) Otherwise I am very happy with the tablet and am having great time learning how to run it.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2 (64GB AT&T; 3G)
Reviews.Author: Dr. Daniel Brewer
Reviews.Content: I have been an owner of an Apple iPad 2 (64GB AT&T; 3G) since the date of it's first released in the US on March 11, 2011. After more than two years of heavy use both personally and professionally I can say the Apple iPad changed my life. It is without a doubt one of the most innovative, useful, and powerful products on the market. That was true in April of 2010 when Apple released the first iPad, and it remains true to this day. An unimaginable number of iPad reviews exist online, so I will not restate the specs or the seemingly endless uses and applications. I will simply state that I have never regretted my purchase of my iPad for one second and I have found it to be one of the most versatile, useful, and simple pieces of technology I have ever owned. It's multipurpose functionality cannot be overstated. I cannot speak highly enough of the Apple iPad - and look forward to the day when I can upgrade to the latest model. Even so, my iPad 2 continues to be fully functional, fast, and sturdy. Why wait - BUY APPLE!

Reviews.Title: The product was literally new
Reviews.Author: dario
Reviews.Content: I bought several things on the web, things that were considered "NEW" and actually they weren't.This time everything changed, the product was literally new, no use at all and I saved a lot of money.I've been a long term Apple customer and will be forever.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: chris stern
Reviews.Content: Terrific buy; I love this iPad! Nasty scratch on screen but I can live with it.....so happy to finally own an iPad...thank you.

Reviews.Title: Just "meh".
Reviews.Author: Jessie Ivey
Reviews.Content: I wish I would have gotten a newer model. I pretty much have given up on this thing, so many apps that I would like to have don't work because it's outdated. I love the iPad in general and still plan to keep it for a while, but it's functionality leaves a lot to be desired. The NPR app works perfectly which is really great, and I mostly just use it for portfolio purposes and if I don't feel like carrying around a bulky laptop. Please listen to folks who tell you that this is not a replacement for a laptop, they are not lying. Seriously. Don't get rid of your damn laptop.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous- what a great Ipad for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Happy Girl
Reviews.Content: I ordered this since I just wanted an IPAd 2 for fun, so why pay for a new one? The price was amazing but I got skeptical after reading some of the seller's reviews.  I wrote the seller myself and was reassured of the product.  It came in 2 days, was well wrapped, it was called Very Good condition- a few scratches on the back, but basically perfect.  It came with an older cover ($40.00 is what it said, but definatley not worth that today, but hey it's a cover), 2 charge cords, clean and working perfectly.  I just ran up to TJ Max to get a new cover- and it really looks like a brand new IPAd for about half the price!  I know I got a very good deal and was happy to have the seller write back immediately for all my concerns, making sure that I was pleased with the product. Don't know what happened to others, but I am very pleased with this product and the responses of the seller.  This was a great deal and I am enjoying every second of my "new" ipad for a great price.  Just get the seller's  email and ask questions if you have them- I feel they were very helpful  and concerned.  Even though this was cheap , it is still a major purchase for me and I feel that this purchase was made in confidence and carried through exceeding my expections.  Thanks IPAD MANIA!

Reviews.Content: This exactly what I wanted and the price was great. There were no defects with it only thing was the USB part of the charger was not original so it charged slow but I got a real one and now it charges in a shorter time and the battery last a long time. This was a great buy.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT iPAD 2
Reviews.Author: Beatrice
Reviews.Content: I bought this refurbished iPad 2 (32 GB, Wifi+AT&T; 3G for my husband's birthday because he won't leave mine alone. Mine is also a refurb but I I bought it at Apple online and spent about $700.00 for it compared to Rocket Jakes price of $399. A Genius at Apple told me he prefers refurbished products as any FACTORY quirks that existed are straightened out. The iPad was simple to set up. It was in original Apple packaging and works perfectly. The AT&T; Wi-fi was also easy to set up. AT&T; has lower data charges for iPads than Verizon but Verizon has a larger coverage area. Alas! Money is tight. I also got a Smart Magnetic Cover for Apple Ipad 2 cover at Amazon from CyprusTech for $7.74 compared to the $39 I spent for mine at Apple and it looks and acts exactly the same. I'm thrilled with this product so far but I set it up with my Apple ID and now I'm going to have to jump through some hoops to figure out how to get my husband his own Apple ID because iTunes is all set up on one computer with MY Apple ID ....h-h-m-m-m! Another tech challenge.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Echavarria
Reviews.Content: I'm writing to express how satified I am with my iPad.  I think it was one of the best investments I have ever made, I pratically use it for everything writing papers  for college, music, photos, videos, surfing the wed, games and email. My iPad has practically replaced my two laptops.  I'm not recommending to get rid of your laptop and get an iPad because there are certain things I can not  do on my iPad that only my laptop can do the job, but you should definately get one for its portability, accessibility and great battery life.  I was so impressed with my Ipad I went out and purchased an ipad mini this was in a 3 month period. Also plan to upgrade my regular ipad for the new edision with 120gs and my laptop with an Mac Air. I really like Apple products and wish I would have taken advantage of their products sooner.

Apple mainly foucuses on its apps and games which attract the younger population. For example it has more Angry Birds Apps then your fingers on your hand! Some strong points are the Facebook app, Facetime(Similar to Skype) and Itunes. Not my taste of tablet and I will be selling it soon.

Reviews.Title: My best electronic purchase.
Reviews.Author: Just me
Reviews.Content: I was given an older version IPAD from my brother last year and really liked it but it only worked on Wi-Fi. I don't live in an area where Wi-Fi is always available so I was limited to using it at home. so a few months later when my 50th birthday was coming up, my husband asked what I would like. I told him the only thing I wanted was the IPad with wireless AND 3G. Of course he thought I was nuts since I had a perfectly good, working IPAd already. So naturally, I got my wish!  We ordered a refurbished one to save money. I have not been disappointed yet! I take it everywhere with me. I am impressed with the speed even when using 3G. I am able to use it at our cabin and streamed our High School basketball State Championship game with zero problems.  The only problem I have now is I own a 5 month old Laptop that I rarely use!

Reviews.Title: What to say that hasn't been said
Reviews.Author: Jahmez "I'm a nerd who wants to help"
Reviews.Content: Chances are, you know what an iPad is and know the positives of it. It is very user friendly, it has tons of apps, and they are all ran through Apple so they work very well. There are occasional crashes with streaming app, but it only closes the app and you can reopen it. This is the iPad 2, so, if you are expecting Siri... you will be disappointed. Siri is nice, but it isn't needed to love this product. The maps is still awful, but you can get Google maps and that is much better. Realistically, this is wonderful for people who do a lot of internet based surfing and want a phone experience but bigger. It is also great for family that is horrible with tech. If you are wondering, "Well, I'm a power user, is there anything for me?" Firstly, you should know how to look that up yourself. Secondly, yes! You can VPN into a laptop or desktop with many apps available in the app store to Virtualize your desktop from any wifi access point. Great buy and if money is a problem, the iPad 2 is now cheap enough to not be a big purchase.
