Reviews.Title: Ipad 2 is good but not great.
Reviews.Author: J. Chang
Reviews.Content: First, I am tech savvy. I mainly use a PC. I have owned an iphone before. Don't use macs. This is my first ipad. It was given to me as a gift. I use android based phones.My impression is that the ipad is very much like the iphone. Exactly the way you get into the phone you do the ipad. The icons are identical. So if you're coming from those other devices it's nice to have the same icons that you're already familiar with.Overall I'm happy with the unit. My only real complaints are the camera, speakers, no siri and lack of microsd card slot. The camera is horrible. I was shocked to learn the mexapixel that comes stock on this device. I don't think it's even 1 megapixel but for taking pictures it's really bad. Very grainy. Video recording is in hd so when the video does come out the picture is good quality. But the camera pictures are horrible.The speakers are mono. I'm not sure why they are mono on such a flagship device. They sound ok but i figured you would at least get stereo speakers with something that costs over $400.Lack of microsd slot. Now this is really bad. iphones dont have them either. neither do their ipods. it's a great way for apple to make more money since you can't upgrade the storage capacity. Android tablets and phones I'm able to add up to 64gb of extra storage. So with this device I'm locked in to what storage I buy. That's apple's deal so take it or leave it.No siri. Upgrading to os 6 I thought that I would at least get siri. No. Apple won't allow that. Kinda sad for their once top of the line tablet. Ok but not really a big deal. Just would have been a nice feature.If I were in the market for a new tablet now, I would seriously consider the Samsung Note 10.1. It can do everything the new ipad can do and more.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2 best way to go
Reviews.Author: Kamron Wilson
Reviews.Content: 64 G. Great product. No lag, easily starts up and runs fast! I suggest to anyone considering getting an iPad.

I love apple products but tablets pricing has gone down so much that IPad is just getting too expensive.  There are 10 inch tablet from Google Nexus 10 with better spec than latest Ipad and it's cheaper than Ipad 2 that I bought.  I see so many other companies such as Idolian with their Studio 10 that works better than IPad 2 and cost only $250.  Ii think Apple is great product but I think they need to get in the game with more reasonable price.  BTW, I'm returning this iPad and getting Studio 10 or Nexus 10.

If I knew the new iPad would have been out soon, I would have held out on buying this until the new iPad with the retina display was out. Anyway, this iPad is still useful. I use it mostly for reading/writing emails and surfing the web while sitting on the couch. Sometimes I use Facetime which works well since my Wifi connection is fast. This thing runs smoothly and is pretty fast. The games for iPad are pretty fun to play on thing as well. Also, I find the camera is not all that great indoors and most of my indoor photos look grainy. Overall a good product but not the sharpest screen.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: keeeem
Reviews.Content: In the words of my boyfriend, "that iPad was a great investment, you use it all the time!" And I do use it all the time, it has made my workflow a lot more enjoyable and makes things easier to view, more enjoyable to process and ties in my interests with the apps and everything. The seller who I got this from gave me a great deal and he shipped it promptly and kept up with messages to give me info about it. It came brand new sealed in its box and I have been jubilant ever since I carried the box from the post office to my house. I take it with me everywhere and I use it for a lot of different things such as checking my email, pinterest, stumble upon, writing on blogsy and pages, as well as drawing and creating custom cards on procreate (a beautiful art app) and a bunch of other apps that work with me. I do my couponing on this iPad and I just absolutely love it. I have an android wifi only device and I wanted to work with the iOS system in order to see it for myself, and I love both, for my uses, each platform resonates perfectly for me for what I use it. I am also a budding app developer and I like working both platforms. (: I love my iPad 2!

Reviews.Content: This was the deal of the century. I love it.  It arrived on time and was just as described. I really would not have been able to tell the difference from a brand new item.  I feel very lucky to have found this.

Reviews.Title: This was a gift for Christmas
Reviews.Author: dmoney347
Reviews.Content: I bought this one for my wife for Christmas last year. She loves Apple like I do so I bought her one.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipper
Reviews.Author: casey bailey
Reviews.Content: Shipped right away arrived as advertised. What more could you want. Bought as a gift for my wife. Thanks and happy holidays.

Reviews.Title: typical apple quality
Reviews.Author: Jan Jurnecka
Reviews.Content: My (95 year old) Dad is very happy with this high quality device, which we gave him as a birthday present. He particularly loves the built-in camera.

Reviews.Title: I use this instead of my laptop
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: I purchased this iPad2 for my wife, since I was so pleased with the one I bought for myself last year. I use mine more than my laptop, installing Docs-To-Go for laptop-like capability for Excel, Word, and PPT.

Reviews.Title: Like new
Reviews.Author: Chris A. Johnson
Reviews.Content: This was the deal of the century. I love it.  It arrived on time and was just as described. I really would not have been able to tell the difference from a brand new item.  I feel very lucky to have found this.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!
Reviews.Author: Kym
Reviews.Content: This is a GREAT product! I haven't had a bit of problems with it, it came exactly as described in a timely manner and the price was right! I love it!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent seller & product
Reviews.Author: Jim Foley
Reviews.Content: Bought for my daughter as a gift, gave it to her today. The iPad was in excellent shape and worked great. This was an excellent  buying experience  the seller had great communications' and fast delivery.

Reviews.Title: Ipad
Reviews.Author: hoghead98
Reviews.Content: great Ipad at a great price. Wife is pleased with the ipad. sinks with the Iphone easy as apple pie

Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Content: My husband got this for me for Christmas last year and I use it daily.  I love it but who wouldn't!

Reviews.Title: IPAD 2

Reviews.Content: I love it.  It does everything I want it to do.  Was like brand new.  Great price. Got it very fast

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Peking
Reviews.Content: I have stayed anti apple for all of these years! It took a day or two to adjust but this is just an item I needed and it works for me:)I wanted white and the way it was listed, I didn't realize I could have gotten the white instead, (didn't have an color option bar, had to locate white one separately) but I'm over that... Just letting you know for future reference.

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: Maryia Sky
Reviews.Content: I loved this tablet. Was awesome and had a great battery life. It was awesome for apps and e-mails. Also has the perfect screen size.

Reviews.Title: The Ipad
Reviews.Author: Vin
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item for 2011 christmas for my 75 year old mother who wanted to have access to Facebook to communicate to her children and other family who live all over the world.  One of my sisters who lives locally uses this all the time when she comes over and now she wants one for herself.  I have played with many of the other computer pads like the Samsung but I think the Apple Ipad beats them all hands down. If it was not so expensive I would have purchased at least two more, but the price keeps me from doing that.  I rate this device with an A+

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Selena Wiggs
Reviews.Content: My daughter loved it. She has played on it every day scense Christmas I have to make her put it down.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Jane McNally
Reviews.Content: Great for work. Easy to take along, Holds charge very well. Good for both work and play. Games are easy to play.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: It's just plain awesome.... I've had for 5 days and my wife hates it because I can't put it down

Reviews.Title: I like it

Reviews.Title: Excellent

Reviews.Title: Love it!

It's light, the speaker has good sound. I have heard people complain about the camera quality, honestly I love the camera and I think it's great. I know its not the best quality but I thinks it's fine.

But the thing about apple is they are more conscientiousness of their Apps where as androids are not and android has some catching up to do as far as full screen apps so I figured I would spend the extra money and get a used ipad 2 ( did not want the three because they changed the flipping connector :/). Great product, good job Apple

Reviews.Content: Apple knocked it out of the park with these tablets. I'm completely satisfied and happy that I purchased one.  The pictures are decent quality and the screen response time is dependable.  Great purchase!

Reviews.Title: Best purchase ever.
Reviews.Author: Alpal
Reviews.Content: I bought this iPad 2 right when the new ones came out because I thought this was the best price.  My excuse to buying such an expensive product was that I was studying for the CPA exam and thought the apps would be helpful.  For me this is the perfect amount of space (I havent run out yet and I have tons of games and other social apps and email)  I use mostly for personal and it is my favorite toy in the world.  I would recommend going this route instead of investing in a brand new iPad or other tablet.  You wont find as good apps as you will with apple.  I live in SC and bought it from someone in GA used.  It was like brand new plus i got a free case and screen protector which I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND to anyone who purchases one of these.

Reviews.Title: Excellent

Reviews.Title: great value

Reviews.Content: Appreciate if productNeed to buy one more if any promotion is on to itNeed to buy at more competitive price

Reviews.Title: I love this thing
Reviews.Author: Ami
Reviews.Content: We got this iPad because it can read my husbands text books out loud to him (which helps with the absorption of the massive amounts of material he has to read for grad school) but the rest of us have fallen in love with it too. I like it because its quick and easy to grab and read blogs or look up a recipe and its not nearly as hard to type on as I was afraid it might be. And it is my very best friend when it comes to road tripping with our 3 year old. Road trips went from being a terror to a very enjoyable experience with the iPad (We got an Otterbox Defender case to keep it safe when the kid has it).

Reviews.Title: I Apple
Reviews.Author: Michael W. Tyler "thx. M"
Reviews.Content: Why? Compare two things and you will know. Time and Living. If these two matter to you, then look at how convenient it is to use an Apple based appliance. Some say intuitive. I say easy. Basic. Bottom line - resourceful all the time. Time is what you save with Apple iPad 2, second generation. The core of Apple is it's safety, not programs that take up your memory and time, costly in cash and down town, called security programs. You know what I am talking about. Security for the designers and owners, but un-necessary with Apple.Easy to take-along with its weight-less characteristic, yet durable on the road in performance. Best buy for the iPad buck so far.iT InterestedMichael T

Reviews.Title: Fabulous device
Reviews.Author: Beanie
Reviews.Content: I purchased this used through amazon at significant savings. Everything works perfectly. Like the camera on the second generation iPad. Great for using the FaceTime feature. The kids like it for the photo booth option (like the old photo booth you use to see in the malls, etc). Besides the millions of apps and games available for all ages, this is great for your e-mail, web browsing, showing your photos, watching movies through amazon instant video, netflix, or iTunes. Tons of possibilities. In our family, everyone uses it, from age 5 to 83! Terrific product. Don't be afraid to check out the used ones. I have purchased several used devices, and have never had a problem.

Reviews.Title: First Apple Product.
Reviews.Author: Grace G
Reviews.Content: The iPad2 is my first Apple product. The packaging is very nice. iPad itself looks amazing, but a bit heavier than I thought it would be. That might be me... but I always thought iPads would be a bit lighter. Nonetheless it is amazing. I use the iPad for any e-textbooks. It is easy and simple to use.The downside is that I upgraded to iOS6, anddd the preinstalled YouTube app is no longer there. I wish the app store had a better selection as well. Most apps are mehh-- ok. Also wish that one day you can delete the preinstalled apps. Some apps I really don't need.

Reviews.Title: The Apple IPad Second Generation is great!
Reviews.Author: Ms. Heeder
Reviews.Content: The Apple IPad Second Generation is awesome! When my dad got it, all he had to do to be able to use it was activate it on the computer. It has really cool features. It has a camera and it can play videos and movies. It can also play games, surf the web, and more! Sometimes my dad lets me use it. Most of the time, I enjoy using it. Also, it's pretty much a big IPod Touch. This product can be your all in one device!  I really like Apple products, and this product is a pretty good Apple product. You probably would like it if you're one of those people who like Apple products. You might not like it if you like Samsung tablets better. I think the Apple IPad Second Generation is a great product!

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad

Reviews.Content: There is still alot I need to learn about the iPad 2, but so far it is wonderful. It has a ton of apps to use, so you never get bored. Having a good time with it.

Reviews.Title: Just as promised
Reviews.Author: 777 builder
Reviews.Content: Received promptly, works great. I have had for this for  over a month with no problems. I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: IPad 2 wifi and verizon
Reviews.Author: Trudie Case "fabric lover"
Reviews.Content: After talking with Apple I was able to get my IPad up and running.  It is a wonderful product, as described and arrived early!  Best price I found.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: MY new iPad
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: The iPad came in good shape, scratches on back as mentioned. But it was never mentioned that there was a scratch on the front screen. Its not too noticeable but I should have paid less considering that because others were the same price without this problem.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: nc
Reviews.Content: Received in a timely manner, package contained everything as expected and it is a GREAT tablet!! My entire family uses it for games, finances, reading and educational tools. If you have the money, I would certainly suggest you purchase an IPAD

Reviews.Title: Amazing gift!
Reviews.Author: Caohu09
Reviews.Content: I purchased the iPad 2 as a gift for my mother to use as an ebook.She ended up surfing the web, using her email, and downloading and listening to music from it. Now I know itsnot hard to do that, nor is the iPad magical, but it was nice to give my mother something that wassimplistic, minimalistic, and very user friendly!It was also awesome that the Geniuses we willing to help her out with EVERYTHING!IF not for how cool, and sleek it looks, or for how good the product is, the customer service makes any apply product amazing!

Reviews.Title: Got it for my birthday
Reviews.Author: Valerie St John
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the iPad 2.  It's been great to just pick up and check email without having to turn on the laptop and wait for it to boot.  Also great to pick it up and take a picture without having to get the camera out and load batteries, etc.  Love the apps too!

Reviews.Title: Great device, lives up to the hype
Reviews.Author: dobrin
Reviews.Content: I've had my iPad, which I bought used, since the end of April 2012.  I bought it to read articles (both academic PDF's and online fare via Instapaper) and play silly games, and it has exceeded my expectations on both counts.  I had used both a 7" and 10" Android tablet (modded Nook Color and gTablet, respectively) and a 4th generation iPod Touch in the past for pretty much the same purposes as with the iPad, and found myself not turning them on and subsequently selling them, so I was skeptical of how useful I'd find the iPad vs. a laptop or desktop.The advantage over the iPod Touch is just a matter of real estate.  The interfaces of the universal apps that I've used (ones that are available on both the iPod Touch and iPad) are much better on the iPad.  Not to knock Android, because I was admittedly using heavily modded versions of it and didn't have access to the entire Market (now Google Play, I guess), but there really are a ton of good apps available on the App Store.  There are good, efficient implementations of board games, silly puzzle games, a perfectly fine browser experience, good Dropbox, Instapaper, and Evernote apps; I could go on, but, really, there are just a ton of ways to use the iPad well.  I don't use it for much productivity (outside of Evernote and Dropbox), so I couldn't speak to that aspect.  But as a fun device that's useful to me, it's easy to recommend it to others.  If you want to spend the extra $100 for retina display, sure, go ahead and get the third generation one.  If you're struggling between the iPad 2 and other companies' tablets, though, I say go with the Apple.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Ivory
Reviews.Content: The shippment is quick.The ipad is cool. And I am hunting for some interesting app to install.  Wish there is more free app there.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: It works just great.  I use it all the time.  I  was asked to review the product.  It would have been hard to do with iPhone

Reviews.Title: A Fun and Convenient Tablet
Reviews.Author: The Life & Times of a Book Addict
Reviews.Content: At first, I thought the idea of having an iPad was silly, until my friend was telling me of the benefits of having one. I debated and after some time I got the iPad 2. Now I love it. I take it with me everywhere I go. To school, work, etc.. I use it to write, watch movies, check email, music, and the occasional games. The main thing I use it for is to read e-books. I like that I can have a Kindle app, a Kobo app, and a Nook app all in one place without having to have several different e-readers. I like to get certain books on certain apps, especially if the price for a book is more affordable than another. Having an iPad just makes things a little more convenient. I love it.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: baltierm
Reviews.Content: I love love Love my new iPad. I bought it mostly for work, but I am on it all the time time.

Reviews.Title: Works Good as per my expectation
Reviews.Author: AmazonShopper
Reviews.Content: this iPad 2 came almost like new, works good. Solves my purpose. performance of ipad 2 is excellent for a normal user, until unless u are using it for High end games or memory sucking apps.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Ruthie
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my ipad very much.  I have no complaints about it and love being able to place on my kitchen counter and follow recepies.  It is very handy being able to carry it with me.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: Mr. Floyd M. Heafner
Reviews.Content: Being new to the MAC world, learning the IPad operation has been a challenge but one worth undertaking. So far I am very impressed with this unit and still learning it's capabilities. I tried another tablet last year and the connection speeds and operation was so frustrating that I returned it immediately. The Ipad 2 is very efficient even though I have to go to several different places to learn it's operation i,e, Itunes then ICloud, next Ibooks and Safari and much more to come I am sure.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: xWolf
Reviews.Content: My mom bought this for my dad and its awesome! I can bring it anywhere and its small enough for my backpack. Small and Convinient. I recommend you get this!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely great!
Reviews.Author: Tristin
Reviews.Content: I couldn't have gotten a better deal. My iPad worked just like new without any marks or scratches. It was sent really quickly and I got it way before anticipated. This was a great purchase and I would do it again in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: A revolutionary device but not a laptop replacement
Reviews.Author: rkruger
Reviews.Content: Destroyed my laptop in a usual manner - drop from the counter.  Bought an iPad 2 and tried to use it as a laptop replacement.  I did last several months and didn't really feel that my range was somehow limited.  Eventually I purchased a laptop to use on a long trip.  It was a huge relief to go back to a bigger screen, fixed keyboard, windowed environment, and faster processing speeds.iPad is a revolutionary device and I find its design and build quality outstanding.  However, once the novelty wears off, it becomes apparent that it is best at supplementing your other mobile devices, not completely replacing them.The device is also fragile, so make sure to buy a sturdy case, especially if you plan to use your device in the field.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: DMoney
Reviews.Content: Product arrived in perfect condition, looked brand new and working as brand new despite knowing it was a refurbished product. Easy to set up the data plan just need to have access to wireless connection or a computer with iTunes in order to set up the iPad initially.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with product
Reviews.Author: maggie
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time, IPAD works great.  Should have bought it a year ago.  Love it. Did not need much time to get use to an Apple product.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Mummy of 1
Reviews.Content: I purchased this "used like new" from Amazon Warehouse and was pleasantly surprised to receive an item that looked brand new.  It easily found my Wi Fi and I was able to set up my email accounts.  It is a little heavy for reading, but I mostly use my Kindle Fire for that.  The iPad quickly connects to the Internet and I find myself picking it up instead of my laptop when I need to check something on the net.  It is my go to device for casual browsing and viewing my recipes.  Love it more than I thought I would.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Having fun
Reviews.Content: The Apple iPad 2 was given to me as a birthday present and I have not been able to put it down.  All of my friends are sharing apps and from the games to news it is the greatest?  There is still so much to discover.  I love it and would recommend It to anyone.  You must be able to pick up WiFi.

Reviews.Title: Happy!
Reviews.Author: Jaz
Reviews.Content: I am soon happy with my wonderful new iPad! Love that it came with a screen protector because the same day I received it my daughter scratched up my screen and I peel the protector off to check and make sure it was good and thank god it was!! I give my product and shipping time  10 stars.lol

Reviews.Title: Great iPurchase
Reviews.Author: M. Lavallee
Reviews.Content: The two iPads ordered arrived in perfect condition. The purchased items were clearly identified as AT&T; during the order process, but I required the Verizon provider. Items were given an RMA and return label within 30 seconds of my call. This is the best customer service I've ever dealt with.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Tom at 3R
Reviews.Content: Although this was a rebuilt unit, it worked perfectly, showed no signs of wear and was easy to set-up.The iPad has met my expectations in every way.

Reviews.Title: iPad2
Reviews.Author: stmccraw
Reviews.Content: I had been bidding on this item via Ebay with no success, as people were paying more than $430 for a "used" iPad 2.  Knowing they were only $399 plus tax, I made the decision to purchase a new iPad2 from Amonzon.  The item shipped fast and has been all that I expected.

Reviews.Title: Very good tablet for work and play
Reviews.Author: Dsk001
Reviews.Content: This is a very good item to have cause it can be used for work and play. I have played a TON of games on this but I have also done a lot of school and job related work on this device. For basic users this can completely replace a laptop altogether. There are so many apps there must be something that exist for your needs.

Reviews.Title: state of the art tablet...but
Reviews.Author: Daniel Kleiman Priewer "MD"
Reviews.Content: didnt get the ipad 3 because  it is heavier, and dont care if the battery its going to last 5 instead of 10 hours. Just wanted a light tablet!!.the main problem which is not a secret to anyone at this moment is that it is very restricted to the use of the famous(infamous) itunes.the only way  to copy my tons of bookmarks was on safari and with the help of an expert. the only movie format that reads is mp4,and nothing ,pictures,files,videos,nothing can be organized on the tablet itself. It has to be done in the computer,and then moved to the ipad. In my humble opinion apple has never been friendly,or easy to use,and its full of restrictions but WHO CARES,its an apple, its magnificent!

Reviews.Title: Very easy to use, looks great, feels great
Reviews.Author: claufeld
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my wife that hates technology..She's using it, every day found a new appl:Easy, comfortable to move, high definition screen (do yo NEED more??)

Reviews.Title: IPad lover
Reviews.Author: Torah
Reviews.Content: The Ipad 2 is amazing I've had it almost a month and I can't put it down nor can I stop trying to find out what more it can do.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: softwind
Reviews.Content: it is ok, excpet that too expensive for those software. I should learn to pay for the price of IP. HAHA!

Reviews.Title: IN LOVE WITH MY IPAD(:
Reviews.Author: chelsea
Reviews.Content: This is absolutely amazing, I was skeptical buying online but no problem. It was packaged up amazingly, so no problem at all, defenately the best investment I made into my low vision inventory(:

Reviews.Title: Best purchase from amazon!
Reviews.Author: Melissa C.
Reviews.Content: I received my iPad a couple days ago and absolutely love it! It actually came a week earlier than the estimated delivery date which I was surprised because I was not expecting it yet. I had been doing my research on the tablets and the iPad but finally ended up choosing the iPad and It was definitely the right choice ,and the battery life is a lot better than I thought a full charge can last me about 2-3 days upto 4 depending how much I use it.

Reviews.Title: Great Service - Wrong Color
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I appreciate the fact that mistakes are sometimes made, but to order a black IPad Tablet and have white one arrive makes one wonder how well the quality control system works.  The distributor provided a smart cover to atone for the mistake.  That was appreciated, but cannot dispel the disappointment in receiving the wrong product.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: grivladish
Reviews.Content: That was my best buy in 2012. Good product, great service. This is the way to go! I am really enjoy my new toy.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: MIGUELANGEL
Reviews.Content: Mi esposa esta encantada con el producto ella es medico y la gran variedad de aplicaciones para medicina son excelentes, le esta sacando el máximo provecho 100% recomendado

Reviews.Title: Fantastic product!
Reviews.Author: GailB
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband and he loves it! He searches the internet with it, reads, watches tutorials on his various tools when he is out in his shop. The size is perfect, he can read on it easier then on the Kindle Fire because the screen is larger. We both have one now and are very happy with our IPads, we are in our late 60"s and it was easy to learn how to use. When the grandkids are over they like to play games on them too, inexpensive entertainment. One more thing, we downloaded a GPS app which is very helpful when we travel, skype for the kids that are out of state, and Words With Friends, helps keep us sharp :)

Reviews.Title: Nice-- multimedia lacking document/storage
Reviews.Author: Tricia Weaver
Reviews.Content: This is an ideal item for the business Mom--Work:* Great for checking email- Microsoft docs you will have to download app for attachments.  Also Adobe files are no accessible either since Bill and Steve didn't get along.* Webcasts/conference calls* Linkedin, etc* Love how small it is.Mom engineering:1. Great for Movies/games apps  for the little ones2. Fb3. Exercise videos when on the runNegatives:After downloading 2 Disney Movies and one exercise video I am being told I don't have enough storage on iCloud.  Of course, I am sure I Cloud is willing to sell me additional space.  LOL

Reviews.Title: Would give it more stars if I could
Reviews.Author: Tanya Buys "Teacher"
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad. It is so easy to use and so useful. I bought the one without the cellular data ability. I didn't want to have to pay for a data plan and saved money on the cost of the iPad. That was the right choice for me. I use it all over the place with free wi fi spots so widely available. There are so many apps available that you can customize it for your needs very easily. This almost replaces my laptop computer. I hardly ever turn on the laptop anymore. The iPad runs faster than my laptop on most things online. I bought my iPad after falling in love with the one that I was issued for use in my special education class. I have been totally amazed at the things that I have seen happening in my classroom with the iPad. Any teacher, homeschoolers, or parent should have at least one iPad strictly for the kids. They are great learning tools with so many educational apps available--most free or low cost. And if you have a special needs child or student, then you doubly need an iPad for their use. It is much easier to use than a conventional computer for special needs children. And if you have a child with any disability on the Autism spectrum than you absolutely, without a doubt MUST have an iPad for your child. There are hundreds of apps designed just for people with Autism. If for no other reason than to use as an augmented communication system device, you must get this for your child with Autism.If I am asked to name one flaw with the iPad, it is that it cannot be cleaned. The screen gets lots of finger prints and gunk on it--especially with children using it. And it will get scratches on the screen, no matter how careful you are. If using it in a classroom with lots of children it can be a germ breeding ground since you cannot wipe it down with disinfectant. At school, we stick them inside gallon zip close storage bags as a good protective covering that can be thrown out and replaced cheaply. Screen protectors are a must have accessory.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Greg Hines "Hines, MD"
Reviews.Content: I have had a couple of iPhones, and now this iPad.  I like it, mostly because the same apps for my phone are on it.  I did not get the cellular package, as I use it mainly at home and at hot spots, but so far, I have liked it.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Monkeys1124
Reviews.Content: I already had an ipad 2 and i knew my older brother wanted one, so i got him this one and he loved it. It's small and smooth, very well done.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: iPad was just as they said. Looks new and works great, no problems what so ever and best yet still under apple care like they said.

Reviews.Title: Love the Ipad
Reviews.Author: C. Magro "Teacher and mom"
Reviews.Content: We received the product within three days over the weekend.  It was still in the original box with the Apple warranty.  The ipad was in near perfect shape.The ipad is very easy to use and navigate.  We downloaded a few apps, all our itunes songs, movies and books.  Very easy to read, quality sound and screen.  We just love it!We are already thinking of purchasing another one for us adults because our teenagers hog it and we want to play!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Niiko
Reviews.Content: IPAD is an awesome tool! I use it everyday! The price is really good for the 64gb IPAD 2! I recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied.
Reviews.Author: MARIA
Reviews.Content: exceeded my expectations. item arrived faster than i expected, right ontime for my trip. normally i dont write reviews but this was truly note-worthy.

Reviews.Title: IPAD 2
Reviews.Author: Chris (new_resource on Twitter)
Reviews.Content: I got it in 3 days, super fast. It's clean and awesome. My family thought it was brand new. So far as I learn to use it and load up the apps I'm loving it. If I wanted to nit-pick and this is nit-picky, I didn't like the bubble envelope it was packaged in, but that's about it. Everything else is cool.Thanks Amazon and thanks Encore Equipment!

Reviews.Title: Mostly amazing
Reviews.Author: Revan
Reviews.Content: My iPad 2 has worked great for me, and even though I originally expected that I would need more space, the 16 GBs have been plenty. However, this is my first tablet, and one thing I've noticed is that it's hard to do much besides watch movies, play games, and check email on them without some sort of a keyboard. The on-screen keyboard is just too clunky and hard to use to be very productive on. If this was easier to use, I'd give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2
Reviews.Author: CL.
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my iPad, never knew I would use it so much.  At first  had second thoughts about buying a used one but so far I love it and was taking care of .  I have jet to get a bill for it and don't understand that, no one at Amonazon seems to br able to help me with that.  Thanks for a good product.

Reviews.Title: Quality is there
Reviews.Author: R. Williams
Reviews.Content: Most of the reviewers have given all the pros and cons, so I won't bore you with another list here. Like most people, I use the iPad 90% of the time on just a few Apps. For me, reading an ebook, checking stock quotes, and reading the news constitute most of what I do. It's good to have half a million Apps, but it's impossible to use that many, or even a fraction of that. I've compared the iPad to the Kindle for reading ebooks. For me, the iPad is the clear winner. In my opinion, the iPad is easier to read and is sharper, also the color is a plus. The Kindle is hard to read in low light. Maybe if you are outside, the Kindle would have the edge, but I never read outside, and I think most people don't (possibly some do at the beach). I have an iPad 1 with WiFi and 3G, and an iPad 2 with WiFi only. I think the WiFi is the way to go because of the cost savings. Sometimes the 3G is nice, but I don't use it that often. Bottom line, I can recommend either model. It's reliable, easy to use, and Apple has the updates to improve things or fix any bugs that crop up.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2 Review
Reviews.Author: Gpvegas
Reviews.Content: The Ipad2 is a very good product. I bought it when it came out from Apple. Mine was stolen a year later and I bought this one from Amazon. It is exactly as advertised and is working in perfect condition. I saved about $150. I would highly recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: iPad Upgrade
Reviews.Author: Larry Melton
Reviews.Content: I needed a larger memory on my iPad 2. Since they are only available in 16GB from apple, I was having a hard time finding a new one with 64GB, even online. Amazon had a vendor who was able to sell me the higher memory iPad at a reasonable price, and it was shipped promptly. I am very satisfied with this purchase from all points of service.

Reviews.Title: getting it new
Reviews.Author: J. Hayes "Videographer & Photographer"
Reviews.Content: my dad has an ipad i always play it and i refuse to say its less than awesome so now im getting my own

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: David Bowlin
Reviews.Content: Very quick and very sturdy feeling. The battery seems to last all day too. And tons of apps to use and play with.

Reviews.Title: Great good looking tablet!!
Reviews.Author: Juan Reinaldo Morales Gil
Reviews.Content: This is an incredible and a great good looking tablet, almost a laptop because you can all you want with it, i recommend it and i will buy again from this seller

Reviews.Title: Great product, great price
Reviews.Author: Paula O'Brien
Reviews.Content: I love the ipad for my personal use.  I bought it to test for business use, but found few applications that apply to my business. So now it is my personal device.  Great for photos, music, ibooks, etc.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 3G wi-fi AT&T;
Reviews.Author: Lilia
Reviews.Content: I received my iPad 2 in great new condition. It was delivered in prompt time. It works great!! I even purchased an outer box for it to completely protect my iPad.

Reviews.Title: Love the Ipad
Reviews.Author: Linda Floyd "lff"
Reviews.Content: This Ipad was in much better condition than the product description. It said light scratches on the back well, there were very few and hardly noticeable.  Ipad was in great condition. Fast shipping. I would recommend this seller to my friends and I would def to business with the seller again. Thank You for the Ipad.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: Jenn Stacy
Reviews.Content: I have been waiting along time to get myself one of these.  I guess the waiting paid off because I finally got it. You can do some much with an Ipad, it's endless. It's amazing just like Amazon is.  I order from here alot, and I will continue to do so.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Great tablet plenty of gigabyte space.  Easily handable.  I would reccommend this product to everyone I knew because it is like a pc and does everything the same as a pc, but at a cheaper price...

Reviews.Title: Simply Awesome!
Reviews.Author: T. Noble
Reviews.Content: This is my first experience with an iPad2 and I have to say I LOVE it! I tried to buy one from the Apple site but they no longer offer the 64 GB model. The seller shipped quickly and everything was as listed. There is so much to learn and so much one can do with this product. I am looking forward to using it!

Reviews.Title: Ipad2
Reviews.Author: Betty
Reviews.Content: I bought the Ipad as a graduation gift for my granddaughter. So far I am very pleased with it. It arrived on time and in great condition. It is being used more than I had imagined it would be! She has had absolutely no problems at all. She will be starting college and probably get great use out of it.

Reviews.Title: I love them iPad
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: The iPad is great and functions perfectly. I opted to get the 2nd generation with 3G and 64 gb  unit and have I activated the 3G which works good. After a little confusion regarding the shipping timeline, the seller upgraded the services to meet the expectations at no additional cost. One thing to keep in mind though is that the delivery requires a signature at delivery so for a residential delivery may get delayed if no one is home.

Reviews.Title: Love my new iPad!!!
Reviews.Author: Circuschica
Reviews.Content: I was a bit skeptical to order from a new merchant with no ratings but I'm very happy I did.  I got an iPad at a great price and thought it was to good to be true but it was true.  I expected it to arrive next week but I got in 4 days sooner and was pleasantly surprise and very happy.  I will definitely buy from her again confident I'll get the same super fast deliver and quick response.

Reviews.Title: Should you purchase the iPad 2?
Reviews.Author: Neel

} } } Length:: 0:42 MinsThe iPad 2 was a great device. Nevertheless, the release of the New iPad brings forth a new question: Should you buy the now cheaper iPad 2?There are many factors to be considered when making this purchase. The main upgrades of the New iPad include retina display, faster processor, better cameras, and with iOS 6, siri. My family owns both the iPad 2 and the New iPad. Apple did not change the iPad much between these two generations. It kept the same battery life, the same thickness (almost), and the same design. Thus, it is a personal decision.The devices are very similar, and most of the cons of the iPad 2 are fixed in the New iPad. However, is the upgrade worth $100-150?Cons of iPad 2 and how the New iPad uses them:Lack of Retina Display: When the iPad 2 was released, retina display had already been seen in other apple devices, like the iPod touch 4th generation. The general public was disappointed by the lack of this feature in the iPad 2. The iPad 3 had this feature. However, I don't really notice the difference. They both appear to have excellent displays. The New iPad's improved display can only be identified in rare conditions, such as viewing upgraded apps or sharp photos. Overall, the retina display in the iPad increases the memory many apps in the app store take up. For example, many iPad 2 users posted bad reviews about Monopoly HD when they had an update that increased the memory that app took up extensively. The update of Monopoly HD did not bring any new features besides Retina display. iPad 2 users were angry because now they lost memory without any benefits.Lack of better Cameras: The iPad 2's cameras are terrible. They back facing camera is .7 megapixels. On a smaller screen this would be acceptable because it is still HD, but on a 10 in. screen photos shot by the iPad camera look pixelated. The New iPad is said to have 5 megapixel cameras. Even so, the cameras on the New iPad aren't that great. Look at the video I posted so you can see the difference yourself. The video is best viewed in full screen.Faster Processor: The iPad 2 has a decent processor and is capable of doing everything you can currently do on an iPad decently. The iPad 3 is faster, especially when loading apps. The upgrade is great but not necessary.Siri: With iOS 6, the New iPad will have exclusive new abilities like Siri. Although many are not appreciative of siri after seeing it on the iPhone, the fact that the New iPad will now have it suggests that apple will continue to do this. Apple's newest products will continue to receive features that older products won't have through updates. Thus, it may be a good idea to purchase the New iPad as another one is not expected soon.

Reviews.Author: HockeyBoy25
Reviews.Content: I first got this ipad 2 because my computer broke. It functions well and I like it, but not as a computer. If you want a computer, get a computer, not an ipad. If you want to use the ipad for reading or playing apps or even watching movies, then this would work great for you. You can listen to music through it but it is so bulky I don't see how you are supposed to do so in comfort. It would have to be sitting next to you and you can't really carry it around and do stuff. If you want to listen to music get an ipod. The ipad is also very durible. I have dropped it many times and nothing is wrong with it. Thank you for taking your time to read this and I hope it helped you.

She fell in love and spends 2-3 hours each day on it for a variety of purposes. Thank you so much Steve Jobs and Apple employees, you made her smiles each day!

Reviews.Title: Reformats most websites
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: What I like about this product: a high ratio of portability to usefulness, an excellent distraction for small children at restaurants.What I don't like about it: websites look different and you have to re-learn how to do almost everything you'd normally do online.Unfortunately, the availability of wireless internet anywhere you want just isn't there, so that greatly limits its usefulness for users who don't have wireless plans. For that reason alone, it isn't as convenient and useful as it could be. If you're already paying for wireless service, I'd say go for it, but if not, you might want to ask yourself if the other features it has would make it worth carrying around.

It's actually easier to hold than the Ipad 1 which got heavy at times when I was laying down and watching a movie or show on it before bed. It's nice to carry around for college classes then carrying around a laptop, which can get heavy. Great to take notes with, type papers up, edit photos, surf the web, read, watch tv/movies/netflix, pandora, and play games! This doesn't have the retina display but I don't really need that insane graphics. If you want something that is now cheaper than the Ipad retina get this as an alternative. It's a great Tablet and still sets the bar high! 5/5

Reviews.Title: Nice toy for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My six year old is addicted to it.  I don't know whether that's good or bad.  Most of the time she watches netflix but other times she reads childrens books and plays casual games.  I hardly use it other than while I lie down on my bed (with laptop, you can't do that facing up).  It was a gift from her grandmom.  If I had to buy a tablet for her, I wouldn't buy ipad because other android tablets do them fine with lesser price.  She hardly plays her Nintendo DS anymore.  Maybe Nintendo should make a tablet.  It's fast and has no lag, rarely has problems (one time I had to do factory restore because it wouldn't download/update apps anymore, very strange).  I hope it last 10 years.  I know apple wouldn't do it for minimalist reasons but I wished they would include usb ports, microsd slot, and HDMI.  These and being able to view Flash are the reasons why I'd opt for Toshiba Thrive if I had to buy a tablet.

I use this device for browsing the web and playing appa which are amazing and second to none as far as quality and selection. I got this device at a killer price from amazon. The only remorse I have is that Apple will have a better device in a matter of months, but that is battle you will never win.

Reviews.Title: A rather fun distraction and way to convince myself I'm not blocked at school
Reviews.Author: a gentle sound
Reviews.Content: This was an unexpected gift. In truth I'm buying Fires for my own kids (love them) and intended one day to get one myself. So when I was given the ipad it was a serious shock. That said I use it at my school where things are mostly blocked. It's so vivid and I can hold it up close and see it so well. The screen is vibrant.I prefer the Fire for my kids actually and wish I had a set of these to teach with. Too bad my school in a poverty area can't wrangle that.All I can say is the thought of not having this for kids seems luddite.

Reviews.Title: I enjoy it
Reviews.Author: Brandon J. Hall "Rationalism & Logicality pro...
Reviews.Content: I wanted a lightweight tablet to replace my laptop for school use, and after weighing my options, I decided on the iPad 2 over the Samsung Galaxy tab because Apples appstore is alot more disverse and expansive. With apps like Documents To Go Premium and AVPlayerHD, it has almost completely replaced my laptop, and with the keyboard/case combo I ordered it does word processing just fine. It does pretty well with the battery life at mid-level brightness and does terrific on the lowest setting. Im a college student and Im at school for 12 hours on some days, so time is factor and it delievers.My one big issue with the iPad is its restrictions. You can not drag and drop items like word documents, images, pdf's, videos to and from the ipad without itunes, and because the iPad natively only plays a few video formats, you have to download an app if you want a broader selection. AVPlayerHD plays all video formats and actually allows you to drag these files into the sharing option in itunes. Which makes the device feel much more diverse, but the app isnt free, its about 1.99 in the appstore. Aside from the restriction issue I really like it, it hasnt completely replaced laptop, not until your able to transfer items without the use of iTunes.(There are apps like AVPlayerHD that allow you to transfer  certain incompatible files to your ipad through iTunes, and Im sure there are some for photos and documents, but you'll have to hunt for them down and they probably wont be free -but I guess if you can afford to shell out the dough for an iPad you can afford a couple 1 to 10 dollar apps-)I reccomend the iPad, its pretty cool.*Update*I got my iPad on Jan 14th, 2012 and got rid of it February 12th, 2012. It was very fun for awhile, but once the novelty wore off the iPad was just too limited. I needed more freedom and less hassle, I'm not a fan of going through iTunes for virtually all data transferring. I cant hook anything up to it without some ridiculous peripheral; something as simple as an SD or MicroSD card slot could have made a world of difference, my model was 16 gig. After the iOS 5 update it was down to about 13, and I had over 6 gigs for music and 8 for previous iPod touch apps.I had tons of movies but with the limited none expandable space, I could only fit about three compressed movies at a time, which were greatly smaller in size compared to anything offered in the iTunes store. I greatly regret not going with the Galaxy Tab, which in terms of flexibility is incredibly superior, however, neither of these are computers so the overall flexibility I prefer might never be on that level. That said, I probably should have gone with the Galaxy, although, the iPad was very fun, it wasn't for me.

Reviews.Title: Nice, easy to use, and a great invention
Reviews.Author: Patricia Brouillette
Reviews.Content: This is definitely worth the money. I don't have to be running to my computer. It is very portable, so unlike your desktop computer, you can take it to any room. Unless you are doing a lot on the actual road away from WiFi, there is not much reason to get one with 3G. Between IMessage and FaceTime it makes it worth it for my 5 1/2 year old daughter to keep in touch with Grammy and Grandpa, who live in a different state. She likes to talk to them while eating dinner, so I would rather have her eat near this than my computer.

Reviews.Title: excellent hardware and service
Reviews.Author: Caminante
Reviews.Content: I bought the iPad for my wife. If you're not a Mac user, it might be a little difficult to get used to, at first, as it was for her. However, it's well worth the learning effort. After an initial slow, but fun orientation and adjustment period, she loves it. It's fun, attractive, and pretty funciontal. I found it was not good for doing my homework asssignments and heavy duty work, because of its small size and onscreen keyboard (not effecctive if you really know how to type). However, once we added a bluetooth keyboard, I thought that it really could be a good "only" computer for anyone but a hard core document writer. I certainly would consider it for myself, as a travel and meeting device, but I'm still not giving up the big comfortable screen on my desk in the office. One more important note. Customer service is superb to any I've used anywhere in my life. Representatives are friendly, responsive, well-educated and just good folks. Thanks, Mac.

Reviews.Title: A tablet-sized iPhone, sans phone
Reviews.Author: Dane Alexander "Dane"
Reviews.Content: Like most, I've been smitten by the iPad since it was released about two years ago. I couldn't justify purchasing it for the longest time because I couldn't figure out how to work it into my technology regime. It's not computer enough to replace my Macbook Pro, and it's not phone enough to replace my iPhone 4 (not the 4S) running 5.0.1. When you factor in the price, I just couldn't convince myself that the iPad was something I couldn't live without.Then the iPad 2 comes out: front- and rear-facing cameras were new, so I could use the iPad for face-timing my mom 14 hours away, but it was essentially still something halfway between a computer and an iPhone.Finally I came to a point where I could spare the $600+ dollars to purchase the cheapest iPad 2 capable of connecting to at&t;'s 3G wireless service. I ordered this iPad on January 18 and just received it yesterday, so keep in mind I've only had this thing for one day.Immediately, I can see how the iPad 2 may come off as seductive; essentially, it's a ginormous screen surrounded by a thin frame of black or white (depends on which color your purchase--I bought white) with a single button. There's no denying that it's sexy. When you turn it on (after plugging it into iTunes and completing the necessary setup) you're blown away by the crisp screen--though it's not yet on par with the Retina display of the iPhone 4 and 4S, it's a luscious screen and only the seasoned 'techie' would notice this slight inferiority. The iPad 2's screen is still better than most if not all its competition.Apple also has a leg-up on its competition with the easy integration with iTunes. If your like me and you bought the iPad 2 to simply be what it is: an iPad, somewhere in between a computer and an iPhone--then you likely won't be filling your iPad 2's limited storage with your entire music library. I opted to sync with only my recently played music, top played music, recently added music, and a few recent playlist I've made, which I'll probably replace with newer playlists as they're made. I did sync with a fair amount of the same apps that I have on my iPhone, a handful of movies, none of my ringtones (what would I use them for?) and ended up using about 9GB of the 16GB available on the iPad 2 model I purchased. And in all actuality, after the firmware files and other junk Apple puts on their products, only about 13-14GB of the 16 are available to use out of the box.As expected, web browsing and email are where the iPad 2 shines. It's very smooth, the screen shows side-screens and sub-menus simultaneously, which really makes this thing quick to use. I used a Best Buy gift card I received for Christmas to purchase Apple's aluminum wireless keyboard to connect to my iPad 2 via Bluetooth and, although the keyboard makes me occasionally reach over for a mouse (you must still use the touch-screen mechanism despite having an actual keyboard), typing is a DREAM on here now! Facebook is also very fun to use with the keyboard setup versus the onscreen keyboard or even using the Facebook app on my iPhone. Don't get me wrong, the onscreen keyboard of the iPad 2 is very usable, but I find with a screen as large as the iPad 2's, I'd prefer having an actual keyboard so as to utilize as much of the screen as possible for web browsing, emailing, Facebooking, and anything else.I wish Apple would make it more clear that for at&t; 3G models, the SIM card is not included and will need to be purchased separately. I haven't gotten around to going to my local at&t; store to pick one up, so I'm not too sure how much a SIM card will cost.All things considered, so far I'd say I'm happy that I purchased the iPad 2. It's only receiving 4 of the 5 stars because, although I'm very comfortable with using it and definitely see myself using it on a daily basis, it hasn't replaced any of my other electronics. In all actuality, it's become another separate electronic device that I've incorporated into my routine for its own purposes. The 4 of 5 stars also reflects the price; I understand that you 'get what you pay for' (which is definitely the case for the iPad 2, as it outperforms the competition on every aspect except price), but for a product to ADD to your routine rather than to REPLACE or SIMPLIFY, I think the price could come down just slightly. Even a difference of $50 might be enough to lure in some hesitant customers.

Reviews.Title: Really nice product
Reviews.Author: Phandaal
Reviews.Content: I ordered the IPAD2 3 days ago for my mother, 75 years old.She really enjoys it and like how user friendly it is. She spent hours on it already, listening to music and using the apps I installed for her.I would recommend the Ipad2 for everyone that is not really concerned about the limitations (no flash, limited customization, necessity to go through Itunes for everything...)Display is nice, sound quality is good and it is really easy to use for older people.

Reviews.Title: Excellent iPad 2
Reviews.Author: teachntec
Reviews.Content: The iPad arrived within the one day shipping by Amazon.  The packing was appropriate for this item.  I find the Apple line of consumer electronics to be very user friendly. The software is intuitive--it does and goes where you would expect it to if you were doing the same process manually. This is my first exposure to the iPad.  I highly recommend it as an addition, or replacement to other computer products.  The screen keyboard takes getting use to. It is a light touch.  I anticipated this, amd so I am using an AmazonBasics Bluetooth Keyboard for Apple iPad/iPhone. There was no contact with the seller as this was fulfilled by Amazon, but I would buy from this seller again based on a good product delivered in the described package. Buy an iPad, you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 Review
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: I can probably go into a dissertation about what i like with the iPad 2, but I'll just say that it is reliable, doesn't crash or perform updates everyday and does the basic tasks I need it for.  If you are debating on this or the Galaxy, it comes down to personal preference really.  If you are looking into a Kindle Fire, my daughter has one, and I can tell you there is a reason it costs $199 because it is not made as well, just the basics of using it are not as easy or efficient as the iPad.

Reviews.Author: kmstein
Reviews.Content: This Ipad 2 is great.  I would strongly suggest going with more space if you are going to download videos or applications.  The icloud only does music/photos.  I submitted inquiry to seller and quick response was followed addressing my questions.Thanks for the speedy response!

Reviews.Title: Consider a Macbook Air before you get too excited about the iPad2
Reviews.Author: Knight Rain "Liberty=Creativity"
Reviews.Content: After a few weeks of playing with and trying to make my iPad2 functional and integrate it into my life etc. it suddenly dawned on me that so much of what I was struggling to do ... was to make my iPad into a... notebook computer... that does the things that the Mac OS already does so well!One of the first things I did was ... BUY A Keyboard! Mac Bluetooth.Then it was the infatuation with "apps!" " GOLLY look at this! It allows me to print a document!!"  And other absurdities like that.You know? The stuff that we all have been doing well now for 10 plus years, with the buggy nightmares of the 90s, that used to make one pull hair out in Windows' frustration, now thankfully long suppressed... .I used to refer to Mac devotees as "Mac Bigots!"But after dealing with Windows security issues, and instability through every Windows generation... I finally took the plunge with a Powerbook and never looked back. If I became less than a "Mac Bigot," still I learned to love Apple's integration,  stability, sleek looks and creative tides... that happily washed over Apple's countrymen and America as a whole, like that great wave from the first iPhone.But, this is an iPad review and although I don't desire to denigrate this generally great piece of technology or even review it seriously, I  do want to you to seriously consider a Macbook Air before the iPad.Weight is a great part of the allure of the lightweight iPad...but... the new Macbook Air is only about twice as heavy and since it may be likely that the first thing you may buy is a Bluetooth keyboard... that may not be a deciding issue...because if you wish for your, oh so cool... purchase to actually be a functional input device of text... and you took touch-typing in high school... the plunking at an iPhone or iPad's screen... with one's THUMBS... or the dull end of your fingers... becomes a tedious devolution of functionality.And this is the real core of my criticism of PADS in general. They are at this point clever receivers of information but clunky input...ers. One looks for app after app to do the simplest things...  and then we say... "golly isn't that cool,  I can actually highlight text!"And guess what? That highlighting of text usually takes a few tries to get the text that you actually need to select with "TAPS" selected...to 'mark-up' a doc properly... and some compromise is usually entailed and could have been far more exactly... achieved with a mouse 30 seconds ago.Look ... do I like my iPad?Yes!And I did  order a stylus for 27 bucks and it has not come yet so I can't comment upon that helpful addition as a partial solution for... the iPad's entry flaws... .  But realize... when one peals away the COOL... and gets to the functional daily needs of email ... and entry of certain data... you will spend a good deal of your iPad time... which after all... is life time... learning to get around.. the touch screen and the operating system"s... limitations.Now ... it is true that if one has say...an iMac which I Highly recommend ... that the real question is: how much...do you actually  need to input at the coffee shop or as a quick reference in the car or as a very light travel basic communication computing device? If the answer is "not really that much..." or if putting up with the iPad's limitations for real text entry is OK on occasion... and the added weight of a keyboard is only needed part time... then it has indeed a LOT of very cool qualities and... apps too... that we actually do find we desired and... didn't even know it!!Are even... useful and yes... fun,  a LOT of fun.If you work seriously on the road... an iPad is not for you... at this time in its development... if you need a very cool slick device that is indeed just about the perfect weight and size for extreme portability happiness... and mainly want it for consumption, of information... then the iPad is wonderful.The iPad is a very creative and evolving technology. The "Cloud" Apple's and say Dropbox... are bringing all of these devices together and we all are literally with our use... defining their place and potential and the APP ecosystem is indeed VITAL... .That participation in change... is in itself fun to watch and to take part in... lets face it... our participation in that creative process by supporting what works is... a central part of an iPad's attractions... nothing wrong with that! That is the old America, remember her?Creativity  is sadly... so purposefully dimmed for political outcomes... in our dear country...that any tree of creative life left...is worth supporting even one without a real keyboard... .

Reviews.Title: iPAD 2  Very good
Reviews.Author: Duck
Reviews.Content: Works well.  I date back to only wood pencils and  wax crayons.  The Radio always looked back and the iPAD looks forward beyond belief.

Reviews.Title: Tough to beat for ease of use, variety of applications and reliability
Reviews.Author: Greg John A
Reviews.Content: Great tablet. No wonder it's the leader of the pack. Shipped immediately and my wife is very immpressed. AND I get her iPad1

Reviews.Author: Robert S. Brown "Scot"
Reviews.Content: You will be happy to deal with this seller! Packaging was over the top, arrived within 48 hours of purchase and was responsive to my injuries prior to and after purchase.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad
Reviews.Author: lulupats
Reviews.Content: This was an amazingly easy process.  Amazon site very user friendly and efficient.  Product arrived on time and without mishap.  Beautiful condition.  We are very happy!

Reviews.Title: Great Device
Reviews.Author: Shelly
Reviews.Content: I really like looking at pictures with this thing when I am on the couch or on the move.  It really is a great tool that I have fallen in love with.

Reviews.Title: Exceeds Expectations-  I'm now a beliver
Reviews.Author: OPFL
Reviews.Content: I have always been resistant to anything Apple. However, this ipad has converted me.  It really is at a new level of "user-friendly" and has logical and efficient features.  I can't keep it away from my kids for very long.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Grant b
Reviews.Content: Amazing fast and on time. This iPad 2 was spotless and $250 cheaper thank you for a great Christmas present for my gf on a budget! ********* please offer delivery confirmation the iPad sat on the porch for 5 hours, I was really surprised it wasn't stolen**************

Reviews.Title: Great!!!
Reviews.Author: Isabel M. Corniel
Reviews.Content: The Ipad was in great condition love it the $$ pay for it was worth. It was for a give and my boyfriend was very happy with it didn't even noticed that was used..

Reviews.Title: Super fast shipping
Reviews.Author: Klaudeczka
Reviews.Content: My IPad arrived super fast even though I choose the free, standard shipping option. Very hapy with the purchase. Tablet came in a brand new condition - as described by the seller.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: Gaurav
Reviews.Content: I took a long time deciding which tablet to buy and had narrowed down to Motorola Xoom, Sony Tablet S and iPad 2. I tried out all 3 and a few more tablets before choosing the iPad 2. I bought the iPad because-1. Navigation was smooth with the iPad. With all other tablets, I noticed that the tablet would not react to the touch every once in a while.2. The tablet is for my wife. iOS is much more intuitive than Android when it comes to tablets. the complexity of use of Android is fine for techies, though.3. Assurance of OS upgrade. I know that my iPad 2 would be compatible with future versions of iOS and that Apple would allow free upgrades. At the time of my purchase, I wasn't so sure about Android based tablets (looking at how many Android based cellphones dont get timely OS upgrades)4. Flaws in other tablets. Every other tablet has flaws, which is pretty disappointing. Xoom is good, but they dont deliver what they promise (Read up on Xoom users' agony over the micro SD unusability for over 6 months). Sony tablet doesn't come with 3G.Reasons why I took so long before buying the iPad:1. Dependence on iTunes2. No SD input3. Heavy price of accessories (like the one for connecting iPad to a TV)But in the end, it was worth it. Now I rarely open my PC; I just find it too bulky and slow now. :)

Reviews.Title: not that "user friendly"
Reviews.Author: jeff
Reviews.Content: not all that user friendly; had to go to apple store more than once for help; told not to use voice over feature--creates problems;  not able to have books read to me while jogging or driving--except audiobooks--somewhat disappointing. Probably better for people more IT savvy

Reviews.Title: Thank-you
Reviews.Author: Ross
Reviews.Content: Thank-you for selling a great product my Wife is enjoying her Christmas present. She said I went over the top on this gift. Now all I can say is I hope you have something else great to sell next year. Thanks again!!

Reviews.Title: I LOVE my iPad2!!!
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: Well since Ed purchased the iPad2 for me, his lovely wife, I will do the review.  It is one of my most favorite gifts!!  I am getting use to all its features and learning how to get the most of its capabilities.  I am so happy with it!  Thanks to my hubby for this great gift!  I LOVE my iPad2!!!

Reviews.Title: size does matter
Reviews.Author: leon
Reviews.Content: this is so awesome the size is great for everything from games, checking mail, hiking. kids love the interactive books and games. you can do alot more and better then an iphone or touch for size on alot of things. great with skype, web while in bed or couch.needs a better camra and needs gps

Reviews.Title: MYIPAD2
Reviews.Author: Mark-N-Tulsa,ok
Reviews.Content: Landon Electronics Rocks, item was ordered and arived early, and secure through the local post office. the wifes big gift for christmass and she loved it .thanks amazon and landon electronics for everything. see ya next year.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted.
Reviews.Author: Mara
Reviews.Content: I have wanted an iPad for a little over a year now, and I finally have one. I'm actually writing this review with it right now! A lot of people I know have criticized the iPad for being like the iPhone or iPod Touch, and I have to say while a lot of features are similar to my 3GS (don't own a touch), there are a lot of features which differ. I have had so much fun typing the screen of the iPad, I spent hours with the yahoo app talking to one of my friends while I installed my other apps. I am a college student and plan to use the iPad instead of my computer at school so I don't kill my back walking to class. I'm not the most tech savvy, but I know my way around the iPad from having my 3GS and love the simplicity of the device.  Besides, you can't beat the awesome of having almost full functionality of web pages through safari on the iPad. I continually get frustrated with my phone's version. I am not a fully converted Apple person since I still own a Sony Vaio and prefer the solidarity of The Sims 3 on PC. I also used a Mac last semester in school, and I just couldn't get used to it.I also REALLY love how much faster the iPad 2 is compared to the 3GS. It may not be a fair comparison but I also added 6 gigs if ram to my laptop so I could have a faster machine. I hate lag.Oh! Not having adobe flash hasn't fazed me one bit. I don't really understand the argument about that one but the iPad has no trouble playing YouTube videos in safaris browser. It doesn't take you to the YouTube app like on the iPhone. I almost bought the Sony tablet which was recently released but I didn't feel like getting all my apps all over again since  I already own popular ones like angry birds. iTunes on the iPad has similar functionality to the program on the pc, and I'm assuming Mac, and I out most of the songs from my husbands accout in here. I also have never used a honey comb based tablet so iOS and iPad I went. iOS 5 installed in under 30 minutes for me.I have accidentally hit the back button in here twice with the iPad-the screen is extremely sensitive-and I don't think I can leave anything more useful for others considering the iPad, so I'll wrap it up. I got the 32 gig iPad in black and I've had a hard time putting it down. I'm also using a reflex series Otterbox and never plan on removing it from the iPad. I'm leaving a review for that next...but stop reading this! Get your iPad if you want one!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product, But A Few Flaws
Reviews.Author: 24_fan
Reviews.Content: I had won an iPad 2 a few months ago by filling out a survey. Overall, i am very happy with the iPad 2. It is the 32GB model, so i have the extra storage. I have at least 70 apps and 3 songs and no videos on it and i only use up about 10GB so far. The ability to back up all of your documents, apps, music, etc. ti iCloud is a great feature. You get 5GB of free storage but then you can buy additional storage if you need it.EmailThe ability to check email on it is a great feature. I use the Xfinity Mobile App instead of the mail app though so the emails will delete and be marked as read on my computer too, not just my iPad.WebThe ability to go on the web right from my iPad is also another great feature. If i need to look something up real quick i can just use the iPad instead of waiting for my computer to boot up.PrintingOne area that the iPad does need improvement in is the ability to print from it. We originally had a WiFi printer from Lexmark but did not have Airprint in it which is what you need to print from the iPad. So, i went to the store and bought a Kodak printer that says you can print from iPod, iPad, iPhone on it. I thought that that means that it has Airprint which is what you need to print from the iPad. Come to find out it doesn't have Airprint in it, BUT, you can download an app that lets you print from your iPad. So i get the printer all set up, connect it to my network, and try out the app. You need to save a screenshot of the screen you want to print from, the send it to the app which sends it to the printer, and it worked fine. Was just hoping i could use Airprint, but maybe next time.Flash PlayerI was a little dissapointed to find out that the iPad doesn't have a flash player built in. I can't open emails with videos in it or stuff on the web that requires flash player. I think apple should put built in flash player on the iPad, beacuse if they are going to compete against the Kindle Fire which has flash player, then they should seriously consider flash player. If you need a device that has a flash player, go with Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Nice ipad.
Reviews.Author: Daniel Andrews
Reviews.Content: The only thing bad about this iPad2 is that it is easy to slip out of your hands so you had better get a case for it. A rubberized finish might be better. Otherwise it is just what I expected. I have the Verizon and wi-fi version.

Reviews.Title: iPad2 Ordered from Amazon
Reviews.Author: S. E. Brubaker
Reviews.Content: Wow, what a fantastic piece of equipment.  After having an iPhone, it is very easy to use.  Wife and I will be fighting over it for sure.  Also, item shipped and was received promptly.

Reviews.Title: The iPad is a factastic item
