Reviews.Content: I bought the iPAD 2 for my wife for Christmas. She is SOO happy with it and so am I. I plan to buy one for myself. Great product and a great deal from Amazon.com.Dr. Patrick H Reardon

Reviews.Title: Can't be beat, what else is there to say
Reviews.Author: Andrew A. Dillard
Reviews.Content: There's not much more to add to the benefit of owning a Ipad.  I bought this for my wife's birthday and the possibilities it allows are limitless.  Couple the Ipad or any apple product you have with Apple TV in your home and you have the capability to eradicate cable television and their monopoly from your list of home services.  Great product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Orledy Galaviz
Reviews.Content: Loving my ipad! I got it pretty fast? Highly recomendedIt was what i paid for. Desde venezuela caracas. It came with the newest software

Reviews.Title: I PAD 2
Reviews.Author: michael t.
Reviews.Content: In one word, super, does everything as advertised. My wife (X-MAS gift) loves it, she takes it every where. It worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Awesome gift!
Reviews.Author: Shando
Reviews.Content: I purchased this iPad2 for my husband for Christmas. I was at first hesitant to purchase online and not from a local retailer. However, I was thoroughly impressed. The iPad 2 came brand new still in a shrink-wrapped box. The device has worked flawlessy for the last two weeks. I would recommend this seller to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Glad I didn't settle for less
Reviews.Author: dkubecka
Reviews.Content: The iPad 2 is an excellent tablet.  It does everything I expected and with a few free apps does even more.  I sure am glad I didn't settle for something less.  The seller delivered very quickly and as ordered.

Reviews.Title: Loads of Fun
Reviews.Author: A. J. Herring "Daemon"
Reviews.Content: I won't hash out the technical specs and details like other reviewers have probably done a few times before me.I love my iPad 2. My girlfriend just got me one for our anniversary. Funny thing is she just got one from her mom for Christmas at my suggestion. So now we both have one.She just recently got wifi at work, too. She takes hers to work. She tends to call me about 3-4 times a day (at least it feels like that) and now she can call me on her iPad using Facetime, so she can see me as well. I don't really know how I feel about that feature sometimes, but it's pretty cool. I have other friends with iPads and iPhones and stuff, so we can all Facetime just like a house phone. It takes a little more effort to use it (just like Skype), but it's a really cool native app to the iPad. The camera quality is a bit to be desired. I think my Mac has a better camera than the iPad.Anyway, I'm not giving a review of Facetime. The iPad 2 is fast. The screen is pretty large compared to my iPod touch and my Droid X. It works well as a reader. The games work well on it. I've even used it as a drawing tablet a few times. I would link a photo I've drawn in my review, but I'm not sure I can do that.The browser works just as well as it does on my Mac and my iPod touch. It's not the best thing in the world, but it works well.Mail is still a problem for me. I can't get my Yahoo to work and I can't actually divulge why. I know the reason why and I'm not willing to fix it because it could be a slight security risk. Gmail works fine for me. I can't get my work e-mail to work either, but I haven't messed with it enough to really determine the reason just yet.The iPads are great to have around to watch Netflix and things like that. Especially when there is a toddler that wants to watch something and everyone else is watching something on the big screen.Finally, the iPads are very expensive. So far my experience with Apple in the past few years is that they build a quality product and it tends to be worth it. I hope they continue this trend. I can't say whether or not it was worth the cost as I didn't shell out the money this time. I can only say that I'm enjoying the product and I'm very happy to have it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Orledy Galaviz
Reviews.Content: Loving my ipad! I got it pretty fast? Highly recomendedIt was what i paid for. Desde venezuela caracas. It came with the newest software

Reviews.Title: I PAD 2
Reviews.Author: michael t.
Reviews.Content: In one word, super, does everything as advertised. My wife (X-MAS gift) loves it, she takes it every where. It worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Awesome gift!
Reviews.Author: Shando
Reviews.Content: I purchased this iPad2 for my husband for Christmas. I was at first hesitant to purchase online and not from a local retailer. However, I was thoroughly impressed. The iPad 2 came brand new still in a shrink-wrapped box. The device has worked flawlessy for the last two weeks. I would recommend this seller to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Glad I didn't settle for less
Reviews.Author: dkubecka
Reviews.Content: The iPad 2 is an excellent tablet.  It does everything I expected and with a few free apps does even more.  I sure am glad I didn't settle for something less.  The seller delivered very quickly and as ordered.

Reviews.Title: Loads of Fun
Reviews.Author: A. J. Herring "Daemon"
Reviews.Content: I won't hash out the technical specs and details like other reviewers have probably done a few times before me.I love my iPad 2. My girlfriend just got me one for our anniversary. Funny thing is she just got one from her mom for Christmas at my suggestion. So now we both have one.She just recently got wifi at work, too. She takes hers to work. She tends to call me about 3-4 times a day (at least it feels like that) and now she can call me on her iPad using Facetime, so she can see me as well. I don't really know how I feel about that feature sometimes, but it's pretty cool. I have other friends with iPads and iPhones and stuff, so we can all Facetime just like a house phone. It takes a little more effort to use it (just like Skype), but it's a really cool native app to the iPad. The camera quality is a bit to be desired. I think my Mac has a better camera than the iPad.Anyway, I'm not giving a review of Facetime. The iPad 2 is fast. The screen is pretty large compared to my iPod touch and my Droid X. It works well as a reader. The games work well on it. I've even used it as a drawing tablet a few times. I would link a photo I've drawn in my review, but I'm not sure I can do that.The browser works just as well as it does on my Mac and my iPod touch. It's not the best thing in the world, but it works well.Mail is still a problem for me. I can't get my Yahoo to work and I can't actually divulge why. I know the reason why and I'm not willing to fix it because it could be a slight security risk. Gmail works fine for me. I can't get my work e-mail to work either, but I haven't messed with it enough to really determine the reason just yet.The iPads are great to have around to watch Netflix and things like that. Especially when there is a toddler that wants to watch something and everyone else is watching something on the big screen.Finally, the iPads are very expensive. So far my experience with Apple in the past few years is that they build a quality product and it tends to be worth it. I hope they continue this trend. I can't say whether or not it was worth the cost as I didn't shell out the money this time. I can only say that I'm enjoying the product and I'm very happy to have it.

Reviews.Title: Good deal, love mine
Reviews.Author: summer gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Really love mine, easy to use and great apps, this is my first apple product. Was scared I would not like it. But overall not bad

Reviews.Title: Apple IPad
Reviews.Author: Donna Boulier
Reviews.Content: Gave this to our son for Christmas. So far, he seems to be very happy with it. Used it during his whole visit! So, we're happy that he's happy, lol.Now he is looking for a good keyboard, any suggestions?

Reviews.Title: Fun but not a laptop replacement
Reviews.Author: G. Little "Billium1953"
Reviews.Content: The iPad is a wondeful fun device great for casual web browsing and such.  The interface is typical Apple excellence and the quality of the device seems quite good.It most certainly is not a laptop replacement.  Two absolute killers are that you cannot run MS Office and printing anything is pretty much a joke.  Yes, there are applications that sort of kind of read and write Office files but they are very limited.  Printing can also be done as long as you get an application, save this way and that, stand on your head and hope for the best.  Again, it is fun and cool as all get-out but not a business machine.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Raclown
Reviews.Content: I was at first skeptical from the dealer I purchased from instead of going to an Apple store. I was pleasantly surprised when it showed up sooner than expected. I trusted Amazon for their merchant reliability rating and it payed off, again

Reviews.Title: Its amazing
Reviews.Author: Bdude
Reviews.Content: Ive never doughted apple and I had always wanted an iPad, they completely amaze me, and now since I have actually got one, the experience of having is great. Holding the iPad for the first time is a great feeling, and the whole structure of this amazing product. It is truly the best tablet. So if you think you should get a tablet and you are wondering what you should get, then get the iPad 2 it is truly amazing and I have no regrets at all.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Frederick Lathem "Jennifer"
Reviews.Content: This is my most favorite thing that i have. I was thinking about it and finely got it. I am happy what i can to with it and i only got th wifi and thoght about it and i didn't need something with 3g.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 is great!
Reviews.Author: mudd jumpper
Reviews.Content: I got my iPad as a gift from my wife and daughter this past weekend. Since I got it Saturday I have not put it down! It is amazing! I love it. It was very easy to set up and begin using it.

Reviews.Title: Great produce
Reviews.Author: Evilsanta
Reviews.Content: The ipad2 is awesome, fast, nice camera. only down side is that there's currently no jailbreak available for this model. unless it's the earliest firmware.

Reviews.Title: Just A pity with iOs5.0.1
Reviews.Author: Zyx Zy "Zyx Zy"
Reviews.Content: No quality problems, works very well and love it! Everyone knows iPad so I did need to said what that is. The ID fit the apple' ID.Just a little pity because it have an ios5.0.1 in it,Waiting for ios5 jealbreak.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2: An Exceptional Product
Reviews.Author: Penguin2013
Reviews.Content: I purchased the iPad 2 and was pleased with all the features it can offer. I am able to surf the web on Safara, play a plethora of games from the massive app store selection, check my stocks, and many many more. I now find watching videos on it a big plus as well. Compared to the new Kindle Fire, I have to say the iPad 2 is still much faster with its A5 processor and much better looking. I highly recommend this product as it leads the family of tablet technologies. Overall, a popular and renowned product. 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: IPad 2
Reviews.Author: Richard Eller
Reviews.Content: Love this device. Presentations to my clients, prospects and internal resources has been received with great paise. 90% of computer tasks are now complete and delivered from the iPad. Besides the awesome business task, it has made a great entertainment option for the family while traveling and I use the kindle ap to read as well. The most versatile technology device on the market.

Reviews.Title: 4th one!  Excellent seller!
Reviews.Author: North Gate Outlander
Reviews.Content: My husband and I love our IPads!First I purchased a 16G, but used up most of the space with books, music and pictures.  So my husband got that one and I purchased a 64G (model 1). Love it.  Then I was fortunate to have another loaned to me as part of a Board of Directors (it sounds like an expensive prop, but considering the copying, etc., storing of paperwork, and all else that goes into a Directorship, this is a real bargain!).Then we continued to have issues with our ISP, and would go days w/o internet service, so I felt it was necessary to move up to an IPad 2 with Verizon.I just couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: Can't live without this!
Reviews.Author: Ronald Fung
Reviews.Content: Great product ! Didn't think I needed a tablet, but now I can't go anywhere without it. Takes a little time to get used to but very simple to operate. Great apps for almost anything. Graphics are great too.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Jerry T. Williamson
Reviews.Content: When coupled with Bluetooth keyboard more than efficient enough for web surfing basic word processing etc.  Definitely recommend to anyone who craves portability

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: I was a little hesitant to spend this much however I really enjoy the product. I already have an Iphone yet having a much larger screen is very useful.

Reviews.Title: Great produce
Reviews.Author: Evilsanta
Reviews.Content: The ipad2 is awesome, fast, nice camera. only down side is that there's currently no jailbreak available for this model. unless it's the earliest firmware.

Reviews.Title: Loving it so far...
Reviews.Author: Jamie Campbell
Reviews.Content: My order arrived faster than I expected. It seemed really easy to get it set up and start using. The only trouble I had was with iTunes and trying to get my music transferred over but I think that's me and not the iPad. So far, I'm loving it but I've only had it for a few days. Would have given it 5 stars but it cost $20 more than if I had bought it at the store. Pay the price for convenience I guess.

Reviews.Title: Amazed
Reviews.Author: Frugal Guy
Reviews.Content: I am really amazed at ipad on what it can do with this tiny processor. Browsing the web sometimes is noticeably slow, but it is not much worse than the experience on a powerfull windows machine.Good job.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Jason Wayne
Reviews.Content: I could have never imagine how a gadget would be such an important part of my daily life. iPad has quickly become my friend, my game buddy, my organizer, assistant and my handy search tool. It's amazing how thin it is and how fast all the applications work.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2 Awesome Service
Reviews.Author: Junie/Melissa
Reviews.Content: Arrived faster then expected!! The iPad is still brand new! Easy set up and ipad was fully charged. Rocker Jakes you guys rock!!!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: F. Dee Moelling "Dee M"
Reviews.Content: emailed vendor, skeptical, reassured me that this product was new and under warranty until (date) i have forgotten the date-- anyway-- delivery was good-- secure-- I had to drive to the FedEx office and sign for the iPad2-- fine with me-- like I said-- secureNo box-- what???cord broke on first use-- what??no USB included--  what???contact vendor-- he mailed new cord and USB--good not great

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Angie K.
Reviews.Content: I've had the Apple iPad 2 for a few weeks now and I love it. It's so much easier to bring along when traveling than a regular laptop. Most of my iPod apps work on the iPad as well, and I didn't have to purchase the apps a second time. The iPad camera's resolution is not great when zooming way in on a subject, but I didn't really expect the iPad to replace a good quality hand-held digital camera anyway. It works well with Wi-Fi; haven't yet had a need to sign up for the optional Verizon service. Overall, it's been a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Jackleeen
Reviews.Content: I have never owned an Apple product before.  I love my iPad and this product is compact and so easy to use!  Can't wait till my phone upgrade to get an iPhone.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: raidergrl15
Reviews.Content: This is a great product, faster and lighter than the first generation. I still wish it had adobe flash, but it is still amazing and it is very user friendly...amazon has the best deals for used electronics, the iPad is so new buying it used was a great deal :)

Reviews.Title: Loved the Apple iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Joaquin Delafuente
Reviews.Content: I purchased as a birthday gift for my wife she loves it, takes it everywhere she goes. with the wi-fi and the 32 gb hard drive this has replaced her laptop!

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Darlinn
Reviews.Content: I bought this Ipad2 as a gift for a friend in Canada. Make sure that you specify if its going to be a gift because he had to pay a duty on it. Other than that he raves about how wonderful it is and I have one as well. We video chat on it all the time and it makes it so much easier to keep in contact with me living in Saudi arabia and him in Canada.

Reviews.Title: Super
Reviews.Author: Wolf
Reviews.Content: Cool thing, before I used just the ipod, but one is aging and your eyes need larger image. I'm very happy. I can only recommend.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!
Reviews.Author: Snick "Snick"
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad.  It's easy to read, not too big and it goes everywhere with me.  I'm glad I bought it.  It holds a charge well also.  Once you have charged the iPad, that charge will last for more than a day or two (depending how much you read).  I plug mine in every night before bed and it's ready the next morning.

Reviews.Title: So much more than I hoped for!
Reviews.Author: Mom of 6 "Jess"
Reviews.Content: I did my homework & spent months comparing tablets & laptops against the iPad2. Due to life taking it's own twist s & turns I was going to have to put off my purchase until next year. My boy friend bought me a poleroid e-reader 2 weeks ago to get me out of the living room after he went to sleep for the reading light as I'm addicted to everything Terry Prachet. Needless to say, while I was happy to be in our bedroom the e-reader is very limited in it's format & unless you know what your reading by heart your going to get lost thanks to missing text. Of course I am very thankful that he wanted to be generous & tried to be helpful but he knew I was unimpressed. So two days ago I was woken up to close my eyes & hold out my hands. He bought me the iPad2! The camera's are awesome, the size is twice as big yet the same weight as the e-reader. The already installed apps are great & navigating app store is so easy, let alone almost every site online that I have been to so far (20 of my favorite online news, shopping, weather etc.) already has a free app for the iPad2. There are a few interesting quirks though...1) You must have a pc to install the operating system through I tunes, but you can also go to an Apple store & they will help you.2) While it comes already installed with a YouTube app the videos aren't the best versions (due to their FLASH) but you do get the site, with most videos & songs.3) Apple IPad2 is not compatible with adobe FLASH... Not on the apps or if you just use the safari operating system to connect to the browser of your choice.4) No more zynga games, (Mafia Wars etc.) on Facebook if this will be your only mode of internet connection.5) The apps pages are in most cases very cool & graphically stimulating, however I am learning going to the same site using safari will have different content. In the case of Facebook, I couldn't view the links posted by my friends to my wall when using the Facebook app.6) The yahoo messenger app takes up the entire iPad screen & I tended to forget it was signed on to learn I was missing conversations due to web browsing... or sitting around waiting for a response.The iPad has made the last 2 days of after dinner family movies more tolerable, as the toddlers can watch their Disney movies. While I enjoy Netflix on the couch, they sung & danced to their hearts desires without me getting frustrated that I can't see Eric & Arial get thrown out of the boat for the 5 billionth time. Bed time has been fun for us all, as they are amazed I read them a color book (The little engine that could... Free in I-books) up in thier bedroom on my, "tiny nooooooo touchy TV".I LOVE MY IPAD2!!!! None of the aforementioned quirks are irritating enough to walk away, just things I don't know enough about or need to get used to. Considering the auto spell hasn't inspired me t9, I mean *59... ugh! Hasn't made me throw it out the window yet. But I can turn it off in the settings, which is a really cool feature with all kinds of settings & features I haven't fully jumped into yet.  You can buy the 500gb wifi external hard drive to store your movies & video's on, (as it's not expandable) plus share ability with up to 2 or 3 others, at the same time. So really it's only draw back is the whole Adobe Flash issue or I would think it is absolutely perfect!I knowI will go back to using my laptop from time to time, but right now I am so excited & inspired to find all the ways I can enjoy & use this clever machine it's going to be a while.

Reviews.Title: IPad 2
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Mcguffin
Reviews.Content: I have been VERY pleased with my purchase!  It came very promptly in the condition as promised and I have hardly put it down since I received it!

Reviews.Title: iPad2
Reviews.Author: sepp6424
Reviews.Content: For someone who is technically challenged, it would be helpful to have a couple of pages of basic "how-to" instructions. Despite all the hoopla about it being intuitive, I doubt that my wife could have gotten to first base if I had not set up some basic icon shortcuts to sites that I knew she would use. And how does a novice get past their first encounter with a gray screen? That said, it's a pretty slick machine. NOTE: It does not support Flash, so a lot of stuff will pass you by. (Third-party developers claim to have an app that solves this...the verdict appears to still be out on its effectiveness)

Reviews.Title: ipad2
Reviews.Author: Martin Levy
Reviews.Content: This is like having a computer in your grasp every moment you require one.  Outstanding speed and clarity.  The learning curve is gentle but every day you learn more.

Reviews.Title: My IPad2
Reviews.Author: Jorge Castrello
Reviews.Content: Is lovely device that resolve my tasks anywhereI' like so muchIt's a very worth inversion to be update

Reviews.Title: good service on a great product!
Reviews.Author: Gregory Kuntz "gregoryk"
Reviews.Content: I am happy with my new iPad, arrived on time but poorly packed, rattling around in a big box unsecured with padding.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Mario Segura Herrera "Mario Segura"
Reviews.Content: Excellent product as always with Apple, I love my iPad, easy to use, hundred of useful applications can be installed, elegant design, amazing display and incredible performance!

Reviews.Title: iPad2 is so great!
Reviews.Author: Little Warrior
Reviews.Content: rich Apps, bigger screen than iphone... you can name a lot of advantages if you get one. I like iPad so much!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Service
Reviews.Author: Mo 1986
Reviews.Content: IPad is a great product but this review is more about the prices, the phenominal serviceand no hassle shopping that Amazon offers. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Good Customer Service and High Quality Product
Reviews.Author: A. Narine "almonetts"
Reviews.Content: Great service, product arrived in good order and timely fashion. Product is functional, thus far. Supplier also had good follow-up and follow-through.

Reviews.Title: Awesome ipad
Reviews.Author: Oettinger
Reviews.Content: Excellent product very happy with it. The battery last much longer than the first edition of ipad,better resolution and excellent camera. The only bad thing Apple should send you a free cover because of what your paying.

Reviews.Title: Tablets, great as a second screen for a laptop (I just happen to like the iPad 2 the best*)
Reviews.Author: Chris J
Reviews.Content: I wanted to focus a bit on just one thing I love about tablets. They provide you a very portable second screen. I happened to pick the iPad 2 after a lot of research with other tablets.I am away from home a lot during the day for work and class and also at night as I study. As a college student and future programmer I love having the iPad as a second screen. I can have my Kindle and PDF textbooks, web tutorials or HTML help apps open on the iPad as I type notes and program on my laptop. I am not constantly having to minimize or switch between windows on my laptop screen, which is pretty nice. I can also have Netflix, the ABC app or Hulu playing as I do homework. The small size of the iPad allows for me to slip it right into the same case as my laptop, awesome! They have some laptops now that have a pull out second screen but it seems to be an expensive option that leaves no other features like the iPad (or another tablet) does.iPads also have a lot of other fun features besides providing you with more screen real-estate when you aren't doing homework or programming!The End*I am a fan of Apple, have been since the early 90's when in 1st grade I was blown away by the amazing Oregon Trail (yes I know it was MECC software) on the IIGS in all it's green glory. I now own many Apple products. I am also a fan of Microsoft, work on Win XP and 7 at work everyday and have no issues with Windows. I also play pretty hard on the Xbox 360 in my down time. I use Google's services across multiple platforms. I run Win7 and OSX on my Apple laptop. I run Linux, although not as much as the other operating systems.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 2 is great
Reviews.Author: André
Reviews.Content: This was my first apple product and I have no doubt taht is an excelent product, it is much better then I expected and Amazon service is also great.

Reviews.Title: Just upgrade from iPad 1, Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Simo Alvarez
Reviews.Content: It has been very nice doing business with you. Item arrived on time and as told. By the way, lovely product.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2
Reviews.Author: Paula
Reviews.Content: I like this very much ordering was easy and quick, received in a timely manner.  Company processed order quickly and effectively love the product.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 (16GB, WiFi + 3G)
Reviews.Author: DanielSilva
Reviews.Content: Regarding the store, everything was more than OK. Really fast sipping. I really recomend it. Regarding the product, is unbelievable how you can use iPad 2 for business, enterteinement and D2D needs. I'm very satisfied with my recent aquisition.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Bernadette A. Moyer
Reviews.Content: My iPad has replaced my desk top my net book and is the fastest easiest to use! Portable convenient and perfect for quick info, social networking, music and movies. Easy to set up and fun to use. My first ever apple product. Love it and highly recommend it. I thought my Droid was cool but this is great!

Reviews.Title: Fun with my iPad
Reviews.Author: Birgit Ladet
Reviews.Content: My iPad is really fun to work with, the only problem I had was that I had downloaded NOOK ebooks while I was in the US, but forgot to download the link that enables me to read them. As I live in Europe, I can't download that link. Also I find that there are certain apps that don't work in Europe.

Reviews.Title: ipad2
Reviews.Author: Annette
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Ipad2 for my daughter's birthday she is in love with it, she is starting college on Sept and that was the idea. There are so many things she can do with it. The purchase was smooth and the delivery was perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Kathy Conklin
Reviews.Content: No complaints here! My iPad was delivered quickly and in perfect condition. Although I did have to reset it to get the iPad to sync to my PC iTunes, I have had no difficulties since.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad2
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: Wonderful piece of electronics equipment.  Worked right out of the box, which arrived on time and in perfect condition.  I've installed several apps, and they all work!  I just installed the Skype app for the iPad2, and that works just fine, and I Skype with my children.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT! much more than the first gen
Reviews.Author: peatreat
Reviews.Content: i may be biased since i like most of the products that apple produces but i really like my ipad 2.  Its thin design, and ability to play things like hulu, netflix, mlbtv and more along with apps that let me stream videos from my HUGE desktop computer to my ipad are great!

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: Camilo
Reviews.Content: Using this devices It's really simple, fast and exciting, thats why searching the web, listening to music, reading papers and others make the ipad fantastic for it. Apps are extremelly cool, I completly recommend it

Reviews.Title: iPad2
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I really like the iPad 2, but it doesn't play some video formats like other pads out there.I do wish that I bought the iPad 2 with Wi-Fi + 3G.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a device to surf the internet, and to use it for my work. It is an excelent choice to show videos,pictures, etc.It has also a lot of other nice things, but I think another reviewers have said it all.

Reviews.Title: One Nice Deal !
Reviews.Author: HoneyG
Reviews.Content: Placed my order and in Two days I received my iPad2 and after that all was well with me and my iPad2. No complaints the Order went well and I love my iPad2 !!!George

Reviews.Title: Non tech person review
Reviews.Author: Nontech44
Reviews.Content: Not being a techno-whiz, I need all the cue cards I can get. No cue cards w/ the iPad (original). No instruction book. Even w/ tutorials, lots of info re how to download ($),but no basics like how to access and play the music you have downloaded. Took LOTS of trial and error to figure out.On the up side, having a store nearby to take 1:1 classes is wonderful, and will learn much in short order.One other concern, I downloaded Sketchbook Pro to learn to draw in the computer. Present iPad technology requires a stylus pen w/ an eraser tip for iPad to "read" the marks you make. Any way to make a different type of interface sensitivity (pressure  vs electrical charge of skin) to enable a finer tip as needed? Yes, one can choose tips and brushes, but requiring so much surface of the eraser tip to create a line seems inefficient. Perhaps a wacom tablet would have been a better choice.Overall, it is amazing to have music, mail, drawing, search, calendar etc in such a small package.  The problems...no doubt more my abilities than the product.

Reviews.Title: The new personal computer
Reviews.Author: Andrew Peleikis "pillowcase1"
Reviews.Content: For years I had carried around a Newton Messagepad 2100; which was the most amazing portable touch screen device until the iPhone dropped in on the scene. But still the iPhone didn't really carry along the legacy of a useful, tablet computer that the Newton had hinted at back in 1997.As soon as I took my new iPad out of the box, I got the picture that there is something to this device that is more than a sum of its parts. After a few months; I keep saying this is the new personal computer. It will be laptops and desktops for work, and devices like the iPad for the rest of life. As it is, the iPad is almost that device - Its much more than I expected.I have zero gripes with the hardware. None. Its the most perfect piece of hardware I've ever used. The battery lasts forever, the screen is amazing (amazing!) - the smart cover is genius.Now that tethering with my iPhone works over bluetooth, portable internet is handled. Netflix, even facetime on the go is seamless.ANyhow I could go on. Its no replacement for a "computer" but does everything else right.I forgive you, Steve Jobs, for killing the Newton.Newton is dead. Long live iPad.

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet Out There!
Reviews.Author: Jordan Maes

Reviews.Title: I pad 2
Reviews.Author: Turki .A. Basri
Reviews.Content: It's a great gadget. Very easy to use, even my 1 n 1/2  years doughter can use it, not kidding. The only three downsides I see  are the camera (very bad resolution), the flash problem and some of the apps are really expinsive.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 is so sweet.
Reviews.Author: RichieRich
Reviews.Content: iPad 2 makes reading fun again. This is a must-have product. Simplifies my life while making news, education, books, and lifestyle easily accessible.

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: MK
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this purchase!  The shipping wasn't fast, but I requested super saver shipping.  I love using it!  I has almost totally replaced my computer!  It is incredibly easy to use.

Reviews.Title: iPad or computer?
Reviews.Author: Makayla
Reviews.Content: This thing is all some! If i had to chose from this or a computer I would chose this ( the IPad 2).

Reviews.Title: Love my Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: J. Bryan Turner "JBT"
Reviews.Content: I've only had my Ipad 2 a month so far but I love it and it's quickly become my favorite gadget  Thanks amazon

Reviews.Title: Does what it should....
Reviews.Author: cindleonion
Reviews.Content: I bought the Ipad with the intent of playing some of the internet games I play on my HP.  I found out that they are not compatible in this arena, so I was disappointed.  It does however fill all other responsibilities that I use a computer for.  It is light weight and holds a charge for a very long while.  It is great as long as you don't expect to use it  far all of your HP abilities.

Reviews.Title: I love it but .....
Reviews.Author: lizgro
Reviews.Content: I love the item but three weeks in I am already having problems with it. It is doing crazy things. Not letting me return by using the home button, when I am in e-mail and deleting it kicks me out! I have already been on the phone with Apple and believe I will have to return the item for repair or replacement. When I contacted manjatech thru amazon where it was purchased. they did not want anything to do with me after 15 days. And of course it took more than 15 days for me to get the product and really start using it!

Reviews.Title: Perfect !!!
Reviews.Author: Anup S. Nair
Reviews.Content: Have used the ipad 2 for couple of months. I must say, its a master piece. I have the 16GB white, Wifi+3g I use it for books, movies, games, news, banking, YouTube, surfing, location specific services, meetings, presentations, notes, comics, baby entertainment etc.The real estate is just right, extremely portable, the user interface design is very intuitive and simple, the apps are outstanding. The 32 pin connector takes care of most of the connectivity requirements if you buy the right connector.

Reviews.Title: Cool gadget, isn't it!
Reviews.Author: Key
Reviews.Content: I have an iPhone 4, but it's screen is not wide enough to enjoy many US TV shows that are available online.  With Apple's iPad 2, I am really enjoying them, although I can not see a full episode since they are limited to the States and it's territories.  What a shame!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic ipad2
Reviews.Author: Kathy A. Warren "writer"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product.  It took me a while to figure it out, but now I have no problems.  It's a computer in a tablet!  I love it!

Reviews.Title: iPad2
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: For a month and a half it was great. Then I had connectivity issue. Apple was great and I am currently awaiting a replacement. Verizon iPads, iPods and iPhones do not have SIM cards, they have their own little server. I believe that was the problem. It fried. Take out the service contract. It is well worth it. Priority service.

Reviews.Title: caveat emptor
Reviews.Author: Dr. Wine "Dr. Wine"
Reviews.Content: Before you consider paying a premium on the Amazon Marketplace, read the fine print. The sellers have a long delivery window to get it to you. You have to wait 3 more days to file a claim then they could still could send it up to 2 weeks later. Hopefully, negative feedback would keeping anyone from doing this too many times but this is little consolation for me who paid a premium for something that I would have in my hands if I had ordered from Apple in the first place.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: Lancer
Reviews.Content: I love my Ipad 2.  Took it on vacation.  Much easier to carry than the laptop.  Great battery life.  Took some time to figure out the keypad and emails but not a lot of time until I had it down.  No owners manual - boo.  Have to read it online.  Free books - yes.  Movies - ok.  Games - fun.  Thanks Apple.!!!

Reviews.Title: Great too
Reviews.Author: Ramady
Reviews.Content: Received my iPad 2, it is amazing tool for replacing my pc with a small machine satisfying my need for personal use.

Reviews.Title: Amazing iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Brenda Sanders "Cruizin Lady"
Reviews.Content: I have never had any type of a tablet but I absolutely love this.  I am a Realtor and I use it in the field quite a bit to show listings, etc.  I also am an avid Harley rider and it fits just perfect in my saddle bag.  I love being able to open it right up from wherever I am and googling my location to see where I need to go.  I love it!!!!!

Reviews.Title: I waited for iPad upgrade, happy that I did
Reviews.Author: wildferret "Oso"
Reviews.Content: I was ready to purchase the first iPad when it was release.  After a while I decided to wait, put the money in the bank and just wait.  I was happy that I did.  During the time I just used my iPhone at work.  I work with special education children and use my iPhone for visual representations.  Now that I have the iPad 2 I am using it for work and play.  Very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Annoying without flash
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We had high expectations when we first got our iPad. Right now, it is the last gadget in demand of the family, firmly behind a toshiba notebook, a kindle, and android phone. We mainly use it to surf the web. But without flash, it becomes quite annoying. I often have to switch to a pc to continue surfing for video and games etc. So we end up using it to play plants vs zombies or other game apps or surfing the web when the computer is taken. Even watching streaming movie on it is stressful, which requires holding the iPad compared with placing a notebook on a surface. Then we realized that iPad is a fashion. It is not as good reading device as kindle because of the weight and LCD display. It is not as good as pc for many tasks requiring keyboard, storage and multitasking. It is slow. It could be a good surfing device if it supports flash. To prove my point, it takes me a great deal of effort to type this review. Try place the cursor by tapping on the touch screen.

Reviews.Title: Amazing but not a notebook replacement, no Flash enable Web Browser
Reviews.Author: Jose Angel Acosta
Reviews.Content: Very little space, fragile perception, frontal camera is a shame,some operations still tricky as cut'n paste.BTW is excellent as "In BED" PC... coz is very ligth.

Reviews.Title: SLEEK TOY / NOT FOR PROFESSIONAL USE
Reviews.Author: rgabb
Reviews.Content: The ipad although cool is just a toy. It does not have the capability to be used for anything serious. This is not for professionals. I purchased it from bestbuy for my business. I run a 3d animation company. i wanted to use the thing for the simple task of storyborading. Lack of a good file mangagment system will cripple your workflow in this regard. I tried for two days straight downloading apps to try and justify the purchase and could not. I am returning this thing and investing in some software for my PC that will actually benefit my business. Technology wise it is savy, very impressive.But functionally from a professional stanpoint it is seriously lacking. Although the tablet boasts of thousands of APPs most of them are not suited for professional use. I am also a musician and couldnot find one darn APP that was useful for a serious musician. So from an Arts and media perspective this thing is a waste of money. IF you want something to play around with then by all means get it. However, if you are using it for work, Forget it!! Very dissapointed with the device...

Reviews.Title: WARNING, THE DESCRIPTION IS WRONG, DONT BE FOOLED BY THE PRICE!
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: I ordered a black 64 gb ipad 2 to replace my previous iPad 2 of three years because I broke the screen.I received a product made for Korea.  I couldn't read the directions and I received a plug adapter for Korea. Secondly, I asked for WIFI only, but I received one with cellular with no SIM card.This was sold by a third party approved by Amazon. I made the mistake of not looking further into the third party. This was sold by TechGiant.  I highly recommend staying away from this seller!Being a college student, I thought I was getting an awesome deal and saving money. Lesson learned: do your homework and research the third party or go at your own risk.

Reviews.Title: Be careful with the little ones!
Reviews.Author: virtueofpatience
Reviews.Content: We love our Ipad2 but was shocked how easy it was for our young son to order 200.00 in games without our consent.  He is too smart for his own good.  Hard to tell if he realizes this comes out of mommy's bank account!If your eye's are in need of reading glasses you will certaintly need them for the ipad2.  It is very small writing even though you can adjust the text I find it annoying.  I think this is a great expensive gift for a ten year old and above.  Do not give out your password!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Ahmed Alkuwaiti
Reviews.Content: this pruduct ( ipad 2 ) arrived only in 5 days and i live in the other side of the world ( bahrain ), this ipad 2 is one of the best thing that i ever owned, you'll never regret buying it wourth every penny, ipad 2 is much better than ipad 1 , the battery is great its stay like 72 hour ( for my usage ) and finally the price is perfect

Reviews.Title: Great Device if you can afford it!
Reviews.Author: Laneuffer
Reviews.Content: Everyone was at awe and full of excitement when the Apple iPad 2 was announced, but how does it really stand up to the competition and is it worth the upgrade? Now that it has been released for six months and I own one, along with the first generation iPad and a HP Touchpad. I feel I am one person that can give a fair review of the item. Examining how the iPad 2 is an improvement over the original on the outside, inside, and how it compares to the Touchpad in terms of hardware and software is a great way to show why the iPad 2 is worth buying. When first grasping the iPad 2, you notice it is much thinner than the iPad 1. It is approximately the same thickness as a simple pencil; you may ask how does it not break? Well it is construced of aluminum on the back and gorilla glass on the front. The gorilla glass in the iPad 2 is double the strength of the similar type of glass used in the first generation iPad. The testers at the website Gizmodo.com compared these two pieces of glass with two pieces of wood and bending the glass between them. The iPad 2 glass stretched twice as far before breaking.  The glass is not perfect though, it will break it dropped without a case because it is indeed glass. Unlike the iPad 1, the iPad 2 has special tiny magnets built in around the screen that allows Apple's new product the smart cover to be usable. The cover sticks to the iPad 2 and wakes up the iPad when the cover is removed. This interesting feature is a feature not available with the first iPad. The screen size and resolution is the same as the original iPad, with a 9.7" IPS technology screen and a 1024x768 resolution. A new addition to the iPad 2 is the cameras on both the front and the back of the device. The front facing camera, similar to that of the one in the Apple iPhone 4 is mainly used for skype and video conversations. The camera on the back is a low one megapixel camera, and is quite grainy. I cannot imagine anyone having a use for this and I myself have never found a use for it. It still is better than the originals iPad's though, since it does not even have a camera.  The iPad 2 can also be bought in the color white, unlike the original. I bought my iPad 2 from Apple.com the night it was available and got it in a few days with free shipping.The internals have gone through a drastic change between the two iPads. Apple, along with every other technology giant upgrades their devices to meet the latest technology. Apple has shown this by upgrading from the slower A4 single-core processor in the original iPad to the faster and much smoother dual-core A5 processor found in the iPad 2. The random access memory or RAM has been doubled between the two devices from 256 megabytes to 512 megabytes. The RAM upgrade allows more webpages to be open simultaneously in applications such as skyfire and safari. On the original iPad if you open ten pages at once, the device is quite slow and can even become unresponsive; on the new iPad ten pages is no problem, with no slowdowns. The speakers are the same in both iPad's, although the placement of them is a bit different. The hard drive storage options are the same in both devices, depending on how much you need. Available options are as low as 16GB to as high as 64GB. The video memory has also been upgraded in the iPad 2, allowing games such as Infinity Blade to run quickly and look much better, more realistic even. The figures in Infinity Blade look more closely to real humans than those shown on the first iPad. Overall it is good upgrade to the original in my opinion, since the price of the two is the same starting out.Knowing the iPad 2 is a good improvement over the original, how does it compare to similar tablet computers in the market? I own an HP Touchpad which is a similar tablet and it is a close comparison. The Touchpad features the same type of display, sporting a 9.7" IPS technology screen just as the iPad 2. I consider the two being a tie in this category, because there really is not much of a difference. When it comes to overall shape the Touchpad is shorter than the iPad but the same width. I do not see this as being much of a difference either. The iPad 2 is considerably lighter than the touchpad it feels like, this should not matter too many people, the difference is not to major, and with a case the weight equals out. The touchpad has smaller hard drive options than the iPad 2; having only 16GB and 32GB options. I do not know many people that would use the full 64GB of data that can be bought in an iPad 2, but if you need that much than the iPad 2 would be the device to go with. Both my iPad 2 and touchpad have 16GB of data and I do not find myself looking for more space at all. My original iPad has 64GB of data and if I did not put my movies on it, I would have no use for the full 64GB. The camera comparison between the iPad 2 and the touchpad is another tie. While the touchpad only has one, front facing camera, it is of a much higher quality than both of the cameras on the iPad 2. Since the touchpad does not have a camera on the back and iPad 2 does, I give them a tie.  The touchpad has a dual-core processor, just as the iPad 2, but it is .2 gigahertz faster. The .2 gigahertz does not seem to make much of a difference, but since the speed is clocked faster, I give this to the touchpad. The battery life on the touchpad is very close to that of both iPad's. I do not notice much faster drainage between the three devices. A notable difference in the two devices is the speaker quality. The iPad 2 has decent speakers but not the best on the market; on the other hand, the touchpad uses higher quality beats audio, which is argued as some of the best on the market in 2011. It shows this, the sound quality on any music is like comparing static to clear, smooth sound between the two devices.  When it comes to price, originally they were both tied at $499 for the base price, but now the touchpad has been lowered to an extremely good, low price of $99. If you are on a budget and want a nice tablet, the touchpad is for you.When it comes to software, I have to say the iPad 2 dominates this category all around. The touchpad, which runs on WebOS is a system that does not have near the developers or supporters that the iPad 2 and the app store has. The app store has well over 500,000 applications that can be downloaded for free, or for a small fee to the iPad, whereas the touchpad has only a few 1,000. This attracts many more people to the iPad 2 because there is many more applications for anything you can think of in the app store, the selection of apps is very limited if you are buying the touchpad. If you are using a phone as a main internet connection, you will notice trouble when trying to connect the touchpad to the internet; this is because the touchpad does not support ad-hoc networks. This is a downfall for people like me that live on the iPhone internet tethering; the iPad 2 does support these networks and has no trouble connecting. For most people this will not be an issue but it something that should be known and that I was not aware of when I bought the touchpad. When using the touchpad, it is just as fluid as the iPad 2 when it comes to scrolling between pages of applications and searching through the device.  WebOS itself is not a bad system to use, and if it had more applications I believe it would be a great system.If you are stuck on deciding a tablet computer to buy, ask yourself what you are expecting. If you want just a simple tablet computer, with no cameras, lots of apps and good ability to function, the iPad 1 would be good. Although if you want a nice, newer tablet with a camera you have to decide how much your budget is? The iPad 2 and the touchpad are close in mostly every category besides the selection of apps, is the price difference of $400 worth the app store? I myself believe the iPad 2 is a wonderful device to have and use if your budget can afford it, otherwise I would highly recommend the $99 HP touchpad.

Reviews.Title: iGod
Reviews.Author: Thinkman "SmartEnoughToKnowBetter"
Reviews.Content: I have difficulty with my arms, but my finger dexterity is still pretty good. There are so many features of the iPad 2 that make this one of the most indispensable devices in my life. Many of the apps are out-of-this-world amazing, while others simply allow you to be as productive as possible. When you consider the evolution of this product in such a short time, one can only wonder what the future holds. I'm excited and very optimistic!

Reviews.Title: Doesn't have Retina Display, and if you have an iPhone or iPod, then you probably don't need it
Reviews.Author: Amazonadicto "John"
Reviews.Content: I have an iPhone 4 with retina display, and I supposed (my bad) the iPad2 had it as well, I was wrong. The display is not as good as the iPhone 4, however it is a decent display.Also, if you have an iPhone or an iPod Touch, then you probably don't need it.The apps are great, every day you have more and more amazing apps.Also, if you are considering to buy one, try to wait for March or April 2012 for the iPad 3.Thank you!

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD!
Reviews.Author: Koshka
Reviews.Content: THIS ITEM WAS EXCEPTIONAL AND ARRIVED EFFICIENTLY AND WELL PACKAGED. I WAS PLEASANTLY SURPRISED AND SINCE IT WAS A GIFT FOR SOMEONE, I REALLY APPRECIATED HOW WELL THE PRODUCT WAS AND MORE THAN MET MY EXPECTATIONS.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Ahmed Alkuwaiti
Reviews.Content: this pruduct ( ipad 2 ) arrived only in 5 days and i live in the other side of the world ( bahrain ), this ipad 2 is one of the best thing that i ever owned, you'll never regret buying it wourth every penny, ipad 2 is much better than ipad 1 , the battery is great its stay like 72 hour ( for my usage ) and finally the price is perfect

I do not know many people that would use the full 64GB of data that can be bought in an iPad 2, but if you need that much than the iPad 2 would be the device to go with. Both my iPad 2 and touchpad have 16GB of data and I do not find myself looking for more space at all. My original iPad has 64GB of data and if I did not put my movies on it, I would have no use for the full 64GB. The camera comparison between the iPad 2 and the touchpad is another tie. While the touchpad only has one, front facing camera, it is of a much higher quality than both of the cameras on the iPad 2. Since the touchpad does not have a camera on the back and iPad 2 does, I give them a tie.  The touchpad has a dual-core processor, just as the iPad 2, but it is .2 gigahertz faster. The .2 gigahertz does not seem to make much of a difference, but since the speed is clocked faster, I give this to the touchpad. The battery life on the touchpad is very close to that of both iPad's. I do not notice much faster drainage between the three devices. A notable difference in the two devices is the speaker quality. The iPad 2 has decent speakers but not the best on the market; on the other hand, the touchpad uses higher quality beats audio, which is argued as some of the best on the market in 2011. It shows this, the sound quality on any music is like comparing static to clear, smooth sound between the two devices.  When it comes to price, originally they were both tied at $499 for the base price, but now the touchpad has been lowered to an extremely good, low price of $99. If you are on a budget and want a nice tablet, the touchpad is for you.When it comes to software, I have to say the iPad 2 dominates this category all around. The touchpad, which runs on WebOS is a system that does not have near the developers or supporters that the iPad 2 and the app store has. The app store has well over 500,000 applications that can be downloaded for free, or for a small fee to the iPad, whereas the touchpad has only a few 1,000. This attracts many more people to the iPad 2 because there is many more applications for anything you can think of in the app store, the selection of apps is very limited if you are buying the touchpad. If you are using a phone as a main internet connection, you will notice trouble when trying to connect the touchpad to the internet; this is because the touchpad does not support ad-hoc networks. This is a downfall for people like me that live on the iPhone internet tethering; the iPad 2 does support these networks and has no trouble connecting. For most people this will not be an issue but it something that should be known and that I was not aware of when I bought the touchpad. When using the touchpad, it is just as fluid as the iPad 2 when it comes to scrolling between pages of applications and searching through the device.  WebOS itself is not a bad system to use, and if it had more applications I believe it would be a great system.If you are stuck on deciding a tablet computer to buy, ask yourself what you are expecting. If you want just a simple tablet computer, with no cameras, lots of apps and good ability to function, the iPad 1 would be good. Although if you want a nice, newer tablet with a camera you have to decide how much your budget is? The iPad 2 and the touchpad are close in mostly every category besides the selection of apps, is the price difference of $400 worth the app store? I myself believe the iPad 2 is a wonderful device to have and use if your budget can afford it, otherwise I would highly recommend the $99 HP touchpad.

Reviews.Title: iGod
Reviews.Author: Thinkman "SmartEnoughToKnowBetter"
Reviews.Content: I have difficulty with my arms, but my finger dexterity is still pretty good. There are so many features of the iPad 2 that make this one of the most indispensable devices in my life. Many of the apps are out-of-this-world amazing, while others simply allow you to be as productive as possible. When you consider the evolution of this product in such a short time, one can only wonder what the future holds. I'm excited and very optimistic!

Reviews.Title: Doesn't have Retina Display, and if you have an iPhone or iPod, then you probably don't need it
Reviews.Author: Amazonadicto "John"
Reviews.Content: I have an iPhone 4 with retina display, and I supposed (my bad) the iPad2 had it as well, I was wrong. The display is not as good as the iPhone 4, however it is a decent display.Also, if you have an iPhone or an iPod Touch, then you probably don't need it.The apps are great, every day you have more and more amazing apps.Also, if you are considering to buy one, try to wait for March or April 2012 for the iPad 3.Thank you!

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD!
Reviews.Author: Koshka
Reviews.Content: THIS ITEM WAS EXCEPTIONAL AND ARRIVED EFFICIENTLY AND WELL PACKAGED. I WAS PLEASANTLY SURPRISED AND SINCE IT WAS A GIFT FOR SOMEONE, I REALLY APPRECIATED HOW WELL THE PRODUCT WAS AND MORE THAN MET MY EXPECTATIONS.

Reviews.Title: Buggy operating system
Reviews.Author: Thomas C Lofgren
Reviews.Content: Looks pretty and functions for my intended use (reading music), but completely useless as a replacement laptop.  The apps are not designed to work with an external keyboard (so you'd still have to scroll with the touchscreen instead of page up/down on the external keyboard), and about 75% of the time, bluetooth sync just locks up to the point that I have to hard reboot it (and even then, it usually doesn't work).  I wish I had bought an Android tablet.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Diana Poore
Reviews.Content: It was really nice to get such a nice used item.  It was slightly used and not all that much cheaper than new but it was cheaper and it included a nice case.  It was just as described, in original box and all.  Thanks

Reviews.Title: REALLY GREAT iPAD!
Reviews.Author: david1827
Reviews.Content: This is so much fun and really does it all! I am very happy I finally got one. Would make a great gift for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Not that great
Reviews.Author: Logan
Reviews.Content: This tablet may have pretty good graphics but there are a lot of faults with it to. Like both cameras really aren't that good really Apple a $400 tablet with only 0.7 mp front and back camera. Not to mention there's no micro sad card slot wich i know none of apples devices have but still they should add it in to them a lot of people wind up needing more space. And why was Siri not added in it was out before this tablet was and it was put in the iPhone 4. People who actually read this review before you buy it ur better off getting a galaxy tab 3 lite it's a lot cheaper then this. its graphics are equal if not better and it has a 2mp camera a whole lot better than this one it alson has a micro sd card slot up to 32 gigs of memory.

Reviews.Title: Ipad from seller Susan Hill
Reviews.Author: Martha Maxwell
Reviews.Content: This is a piece of trash.  BEWARE of buying used items.  The Ipad was to have been received by Feb 28th.  It was not mailed from Ohio until March 7th and received March 12th.  The case and screen hare held together with a piece of plastic tape.  There are three cracks in the screen.  There is no charger included.  I am out almost $250.00 for someone's garbage.  There should be some type of recourse for a buyer in cases of this type,  I guess I could try Judge Judy.

Reviews.Title: A very nice used ipad.  The seller was prompt in mailing it.  Goodd service.
Reviews.Author: Sue K. Nadeau "still reading and learning"
Reviews.Content: I didn't realize I need more memory for what I do.  combined with my iphone and Kindle, I really don't need the ipad.  I am considering re-selling it.

Reviews.Title: Great except Home button after yr 2
Reviews.Author: Alan
Reviews.Content: I loved it. I've had it for about 2.5 years and it's been great...though the Home button has lost it's sensitivity and I have to push it hard to register. I've heard others with this model have the same problem.

Reviews.Title: IPAD Camara does not work!
Reviews.Author: Pam Heinz
Reviews.Content: The Camara on this device does not work; I don't live near an apple store and of course it is too late to return so I am out of luck!

Reviews.Title: Just not for me
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: I mainly use my lap top for playing games and reading emails but wanted something smaller and lighter so tried the ipad.  It is smaller and lighter but I found I could not play most of my games as it does not support Adobe. So I traded it to my daughter and she loves it.  So I guess in the end it worked out okay but it just wasn't for me.

Reviews.Title: Had do drop a few stars
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I've had my iPad 2 for a while now and I used to love it. It had a very crisp and unique look, functioned smoothly, and took care of all my entertainment needs. Then I turn it on one day and see I have an update. iOS 7...Since the update I feel robbed and cheated. Even the simplest of functions(like typing in a 4 digit password) have a lag/delay. The "new and improved" graphic design is a total disaster. It looks like a 5 year old was asked to replicate the look of a windows tablet.Would you like to watch a movie or tv show on your iPad with iOS 7? If you said yes then you'd better grab a pair of oven mitts to hold it with. That's right-now the back gets scalding hot after 30 minutes using it.Finally we get to the battery life. I spent around 10 minutes writing this review and in that time the battery has gone from 91% down to 83%. Before the update a single charge would last almost an entire week of medium/light use.My mother has the same issues with her iPad so it's not that mine is faulty or defective. I want to stress that my problems have been more with the update to iOS 7 than with the iPad itself. If these issues are resolved then I will edit my review and my rating, but as of right now I can't recommend this product to anybody.

Reviews.Title: It arrived just as product is described
Reviews.Author: Rosemary's kindle
Reviews.Content: This was a used item but it was just like new with the exception of a very small scratch on the back.. otherwise, looks and works perfect.

Reviews.Title: Very good thx
Reviews.Author: eugene kirkham
Reviews.Content: Love it.the price was right.it came in like new condition . I was glad to see it at my house as soon as I did.ths for the fast service!,,

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Dina Marquez
Reviews.Content: My husband received it and really liked it.  The images are clear and it navigates fast.  Highly recommend it.  Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great IPAD 2- Very happy with it
Reviews.Author: Daniel Schulaner
Reviews.Content: Even though It's an older IPAD, IPAD 2 has everything you need, to get the job done, and with the 64 GB of storage, you can't beat that.

Reviews.Title: Works fine except WiFi range limited
Reviews.Author: Marvin Bonner
Reviews.Content: Tablet was delivered on time... good condition with only a slight scratch on screen. Tablet works fine except the WiFi range seems to be limited. Will only connect with my router up to about 25 ft. Other devices in my house seem to connect several rooms away. Will probably have to return the ipad if I can't solve the WiFi issue. Would have rated 4 stars except for WiFi range.

Reviews.Title: Travel computer :)
Reviews.Author: Rachelle Pettit
Reviews.Content: I travel a lot and bought this to keep up with my business and website while I'm away. I was not only able to purchase what I needed for an upcoming wedding for a client, but also did my online backing as well. I haven't found much that can't be done with an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Heavily flawed design.
Reviews.Author: MMSahler
Reviews.Content: Had this thing for a couple weeks now and it's essentially a glorified gameboy.The camera is total garbage- I mean my 1995 webcam was higher resolution. The speaker is on the rear of the ipad (why?!) making the poor audio quality and volume even worse. I have sensitive eyes and the brightness does not go nearly low enough to use comfortably in a dark room at night. The volume buttons don't adjust to when the ipad is rotated so I am constantly changing it in the wrong direction. The web access is dodgy even though my router is in my room and there's no signal issue. iOS is very lacking, notifications are tedious to turn off, ad block doesn't do bleep...Battery life is pretty much the only thing decent about this. Screen resolution is just OK. I honestly think this is worth about $50-100 at most. $400 can buy a much more versatile and powerful netbook.

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: The Ipad came exactly has it was posted.  I would recommend this product to everyone that was interested in buying one.

Reviews.Title: It serves my needs.
Reviews.Author: Peapodpixi
Reviews.Content: I won't use the camera on the iPad. That sucks. However, I've been really pleased with the capacity and speed of this device. I use it to edit photos as well as video streaming and Internet surfing. Great for all my networking needs.

Reviews.Title: Love love love
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: I am attached to my I pad like a  barnacle! I never put it down! My whole life is run using my iPad ! I work, play and socialize on this thing every day! THE BEST PURCHASE EVER!

Reviews.Title: Generic box
Reviews.Author: TBS
Reviews.Content: This item arrived in a generic box that was not the original packaging. This item was purchased as new but appeared to have been shipped to be in just a generic box not the original apple packaging. The item did not appear to be new or in original package.

Reviews.Title: The thing that converted me to Apple products once and for all
Reviews.Author: Fryersoncaptain
Reviews.Content: I've always been a bit eclectic in terms of the hardware and software of my various electronic devices. I have a laptop running Ubuntu, a 2008 iMac desktop (I got it as a birthday present mere weeks before the '09 model debuted), I've used many Android devices (two phones and a tablet), and the only e-book reader I've ever used is a Kindle.That having been said, after using the iPad, I'm completely won over to Apple. The build quality is superior to other products, the interface is smooth and responsive, and the software library (as is well known at this point) is incomparably large.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: charlotte
Reviews.Content: I can't rate the ipad yet because it came without a power cord so it is basically unusable.  But when I let Amazon know of my problem I received (as always) excellant customer service from Rajasekhar.  I work in customer service industry myself & know what good customer service is.  I am always pleased with Amazon service.  I am sure once I get a power cord I will like my ipad 2 very much.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished, but had a faulty docking port.
Reviews.Author: Roberta A. Thornton
Reviews.Content: The item came looking like new, but I soon realized the sound would shut off and had to be repaired.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 - It is a find tablet, but is it for you?
Reviews.Author: Kat
Reviews.Content: I will be the first to admit - I am an android lover (it is such a cute little robot).  More importantly, I am also a techie, so it was inevitable that curiosity would eventually kill the cat (cat being the product loyalty).  When I decided that I wanted to see if iPads live up to the hype, I didn't want to go all out - I wasn't going to purchase a plan from a phone company that will overcharge me for limited data use - especially not when I can tether devices to my phone!  I also wasn't going to pay at least $100 more to get a retina display since I view it as unnecessary for me- certainly not worth the extra money (even if I do have an instinct to have the latest and greatest). I decided that the iPad2 16GB would be appropriate to base my decision!The iPad is a good looking piece of hardware - but I would say that the software left me feeling limited in what I was able to do.Pros:-It's pretty - I do love a good looking piece of technology, and in that, the iPad does not disappoint-I like the multitouch gesturesCons:-Heavy if you are reading in bed-Edges around the screen mean that I have to stretch my thumbs that much further if I am trying to hold and manipulate the device with both hands (you can always cradle it in one arm and manipulate with the other, but it just feels odd no matter how you do it)-No expandable memory - there are very few android tablets that do not offer this- get with the program apple-the App Store was not user friendly and was stubborn when connectivity wasn't fast-I find the settings app to be all over the place - settings for a single app may be in three different places (wouldn't it be nice to get into an individual app's settings from within that app)Overall, if you are looking for something simple to use and don't want to be able to do anything too indepth the iPad is a perfectly adequate choice.  iOS is very straight forward, and generally user friendly as long as you don't want to change settings for them (ie you want to use default settings)- otherwise, you may have to go on a hunt for the exact setting you are looking for (if it even exists).  I have no plan to get rid of my iPad - it works in a pinch and if I am doing something that may be hazardous to my technology, I would bring my iPad, but ultimately, I still prefer my android tablets!

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: The Ipad came exactly has it was posted.  I would recommend this product to everyone that was interested in buying one.

Reviews.Title: It serves my needs.
Reviews.Author: Peapodpixi
Reviews.Content: I won't use the camera on the iPad. That sucks. However, I've been really pleased with the capacity and speed of this device. I use it to edit photos as well as video streaming and Internet surfing. Great for all my networking needs.

Reviews.Title: Love love love
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: I am attached to my I pad like a  barnacle! I never put it down! My whole life is run using my iPad ! I work, play and socialize on this thing every day! THE BEST PURCHASE EVER!

Reviews.Author: TBS
Reviews.Content: This item arrived in a generic box that was not the original packaging. This item was purchased as new but appeared to have been shipped to be in just a generic box not the original apple packaging. The item did not appear to be new or in original package.

But when I let Amazon know of my problem I received (as always) excellant customer service from Rajasekhar.  I work in customer service industry myself & know what good customer service is.  I am always pleased with Amazon service.  I am sure once I get a power cord I will like my ipad 2 very much.
