Reviews.Title: FLASH-the IPad is a nuisance!
Reviews.Author: James S. Kelley "bogwood"
Reviews.Content: I have had the 5.1 for almost a year.  The lack of flash/adobe is now driving me to google.  The device is OK but too many of the websites I visit use flash player.  The workarounds are also a nuisance.  There will probably be frustrations with the google device but I have had it with Apple.

Reviews.Title: It's a cool product for me!
Reviews.Author: Poohbear
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd Apple product I've ever owned.  The first one being the littlest Ipod from years ago.  I'm pretty impressed by it, along with my lil daughter, when she saw it being charged, she screamed "Ipad!!!"  lol.  The only thing that bummed me out was when it came with no battery life at all.  I had to charge it while getting the Ipad2 all set up, needless to say, it was stuck to the charger for couple of hours, while I downloaded free apps. I did notice it immediately registered Verizon, but I have AT&T; wireless internet at home and this was meant to be just Wifi only.  And not for long, it started asking if I want to add more data now or later before I can proceed with browsing.  That was an easy fix and I was able to modify it to just Wifi only. It then asked for IOS6 update while in the midst of downloading apps.  And after that, it was just smooth sailing and I made sure to enable some restrictions so my 4 yr old won't be buying any in-apps accidentally.  Read too much horror stories on that.  I did tell her to never click on the word "buy" because that would mean, it will take money away from Mommy!  LOL  Overall, quite happy with my big purchase.  I know this ain't the newest Ipad model but to me, it's good enough!And I am as pleased with the case and the screen protector I bought here in Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Love the iPad 2
Reviews.Author: tika
Reviews.Content: The iPad two is great! It has a great 9 inch screen which is easy to carry around but not too small so you can see things very easily on it. It also has the option of choosing a different color which is great. All other tablets only come in black but I love the option of being able to choose a different color. It is light weight for its size and has great battery life. I recommend buying one today! :)

Reviews.Title: They lied about the Apple Care
Reviews.Author: Crystal A. Wright
Reviews.Content: The ipad is beautiful. Works perfectly, however I chose this ipad from this seller because the description said that the ipad was covered under applecare.Upon receipt, I couldn't find any applecare contract.I emailed REPEATEDLY and asked how long remained on the agreement. While they responded, they NEVER answered that question and just kept saying things like:On 8/17/12 12:10 PM, "Nimlow Electronics - Amazon Marketplace"<[e-mail address removed]> wrote:Hi, Apple only needs the serial numbers on the back of the iPad for AppleCare.-----------On 8/18/12 8:58 AM, "Nimlow Electronics - Amazon Marketplace"<[e-mail address removed]> wrote:You only need the serial number for warranty, I have gotten warranty manytimes for my macbook pro. It doesn't need to be registered to your name.---------------On 8/19/12 2:52 PM, "Nimlow Electronics - Amazon Marketplace"<[e-mail address removed]> wrote:you can check the warranty expiration on apple website using the serialnumberWhen I called Apple, I found out from apple that it was the orig manu warranty & there was 100 days left. But No APPLECARE at all, which includes phone and in person customer support.So I just paid $79.00 for Apple Care.It's hard to do business with people that you cannot trust. Be careful with this company.

Reviews.Title: The pad
Reviews.Author: Miss Vee
Reviews.Content: This is  a very  nice  ipad very easy to carry around expecially when you are traveling around i would recommand this item for everyone to buy.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2
Reviews.Author: Dennis P. Demarco "D P DEMARCO"
Reviews.Content: Got the ipad very quickly.  It works terrific & I'm very happy.  Only thing is, I wish it had vibrate set-up as I am deaf.  Thank you for being very professional about the sale & delivery.

Reviews.Title: I love it when things work the way they'r supposed to...
Reviews.Author: quotetaker "Tom Morrow"
Reviews.Content: Having purchased two new I-Pads from Apple, I later purchased a "refurbished" I-Pad-2 for a friend. It was delivered on the date it was promised and, for the past month, it has worked the way it supposed to work. He's extremely happy, and, of course, so am I. There are two purchase points I have steadily had positive results: Amazon.com and Apple. They do exactly as they promise and their stuff works the way advertised!

Reviews.Title: IPad2
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: I purchased the IPad2 after reading several reviews about the new Ipad's internet connection issue. IPad2's setup was very easy. I already have an ITunes account so it took minutes to get started. It took less then 5 minutes to get my secured internet connection working. I was disappointed that I can not play any games through my steam account. The application only lets me chat with other users so hopefully steam will provide an application that allows you to play your purchased games using IPad. I really like being able to use Kindle's and Overdrive's readers in order to read ebooks. I plan to install VMWare on the machine so I can use it to work with .net applications.

Reviews.Title: From Toy to Tool
Reviews.Author: Kenneth A. Ingold
Reviews.Content: I bought the iPad 2 after I had accidentally sat on my Kindle on an airplane and needed to make a decision - do I replace the Kindle or go with the iPad.  I had always told my wife that her iPad was little more than a toy, but once I got mine, my world began to change.  Sure, I have 40+ games downloaded, so I definitely enjoy the "toy" factor, but I also use it to take notes at meetings, keep up to date on emails and have even used "docs to go" for verbal presentations.  It has become an awesome tool in my life.

Reviews.Title: I pad
Reviews.Author: coop
Reviews.Content: The I pad two has been such a wonderful tool for my students.  I work I six different schools and having this is easy to transport and so versatile .  Thanks so much!

Reviews.Title: Simply awesome.
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: I bought this to take on a trip and love having access to e-books, my email and other things. Much more lightweight than my laptop and way less cumbersome. Since there is WIFI everywhere now, I don't use the Verizon service much, but if I need its there :-). Just a really great product!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed in myself
Reviews.Author: daisygirl
Reviews.Content: I purchased a refurbished Ipad2 and loved it until I realized I made a mistake by not getting the one with the +3g.  I now find out that I cannot get a internet connection through a provider so I cannot take it on the road or anywhere they do not have WIFI.  I still love the IPAD2....I just wish I would have investigated more into the product.  Hope this helps someone else from making the same mistake.

Reviews.Title: Convenient
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: It help ipad stand steadily. Before this, I usually got sore with my neck. Keyboard is very useful while write a letter or a document.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Drago1981
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with it.Wish I had two :) Terrific product for web surfing and music .I am ihappy with my iPad :)

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: fatidan
Reviews.Content: I am in Afghanistan working and my wife skypes our son's sports to me with the ipad and she loves it . Thank you !My kids love playing with it and it is portable more so than a laptop we set up hotspot with iphone and instant internet.

Reviews.Title: the best grown-up toy evah!
Reviews.Author: jvm
Reviews.Content: surprisingly lite, expremely fast and tons of fun. i caught myself playing a lego game which was meant for my kiddos. my kids weren't right for netflix, and enjoyed the portability of the ipad from play area to play area.

Reviews.Title: Amazing  Product
Reviews.Author: Noel0069
Reviews.Content: This tablet works like a dream I am able to run my company's paper work right off with out any problem. I am able to sign contracts edit and e-mail, this tablet is the best thing that has happened to the buisness industry.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablets - Best for sure!
Reviews.Author: excrivo
Reviews.Content: We love it, since we got this this Xmas, our kids and everyone loves it.. Hands down best products in the world.Love the Cloud to synch with my iphone4S.Love it.

Reviews.Title: This is a great tablet
Reviews.Author: M. Soldano
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet computer. I've used it for a few months now and have had no problems.It does everything I want, and its quick, light, and has an excellent display. It seems to be less susceptible to fingerprints than other devices I own.

Reviews.Title: Very fast delivery!!
Reviews.Author: IPad 2 Received!!
Reviews.Content: So excited!! I ordered the IPad 2 on Tuesday afternoon and it was received in my office on Friday morning!! So not expected. The product was packaged wonderfully and ready for use. There were no scratches or dents...nothing on it that I would be surprised of. Thank you for such a quick delivery. This will definitely give me time to familiarize myself prior to the start of my hiring season in the next couple of weeks!The iPad is in wonderful condition. I am so glad that I ordered the Verizon version. The data package deals are not too bad and can be purchased directly from the iPad. The apps are super fun and the apps that I will use for my kids are not that expensive, between 2 and 5 dollars. A note to self would be that IBM Lotus notes is not immediately compatible with Mac. The installation looks as if it happens, but the id name does not install. There are Youtube videos with instructions, but I am not the most computer savvy so I do not necessary understand the instructions. Microsoft office works well and all other programs that I have installed.Have a wonderful day!

Reviews.Title: Great product! Worth the money! (reiview may still need revising)
Reviews.Author: moon fox
Reviews.Content: You are there, standing in the middle of the electronics department, credit card in hand, about to spend hundreds of dollars on a touch pad you can trust to be worth the money, and a good product. The store clerks are saying different things to you about each pad, and you don't know who to trust. Ladies and Gentlemen, the I Pad 2 is the correct item for you! It consists of app selection, optional WiFi, and other sources such as 4g. Coasting around the range of $800.00, I would suggest this particular system over any of the other available touch pads. I tried another once. I didn't like it. I would choose ipad2 over a regular i pad. why? many reasons..It is faster.it looks better based on the fact that it is so thin..Its the newest version, so why not take a go before it gets outdated?The following are my views on this remarkable contraption. Also, I'm just going to call the I pad 2 an i pad just to make it easier. Just know that the I pad and I pad 2 are 2 different products. Sometimes, i will call it an i pad 2, but just so no one gets confused while reading this, there's a fact. Hope they help!First facts: This was a bummer, but based on Apple restrictions, the i pad 2 does not have flash, so it can't play online games or run certain programs that need flash. There is also no place for discs or flash drives, so you can't download saved work such as the data on flash drives or discs. You can't download programs like Microsoft office programs on this particular item, which is not fortunate, not to mention the fact that it doesn't connect to the printer. Hopefully some day it will evolve into better stats.Camera: For the most part i like the camera, but based on the fact i haven't seen or interacted with many other i pads except my own, which has a crooked, bury camera, it wasn't the best for me, but the other touch pad i owned had a horrible camera. I don't know how the other cameras look on the i pad 2 because i don't bother to put pictures of myself out into the public on the store tester i pads, so, keep the camera idea something to check on before buying. On the camera though you can make it look straigt ahead like a regular video camera or make it face the way you are looking at the screen, so it flips around depending on what kind of picture you want. I give MY experience on the camera a B gradeApp selection: Great apps! Many apps are free, but 1 app's full version wasn't free on the i pad like it was on my other pad. I still don't think that should be a problem. Also the apps appear with fewer selections on the screen based on certain categories then my other touch pad, which appeared in a long list that was helpful. Although i would beleive that all together the ipad 2 has a wider selection of apps. Unlike some touch pads, The i pad 2 offers netflix, and many other apps that are one of the reasons i got the i pad in the first place. Great quality. I give the apps a A grade.Battery: The battery doesn't last very long. Sometimes, it last a long time, but for the most part, I always have it charging. This is a issue if i want to travel with it. I'm going to have to get a i pad car charger... Anyway, the battery issue may just be with only MY i pad 2 but I'm not really sure. I would give this category a C or B grade, but it has some work to do before it reaches an A.App download speed: The apps for the most part download quickly, but there has been some times where the apps don't make any progress with loading so i usually have to delete it (and pray it will actually download) and download it again. In the end i always get ti worked out but its like, "Come ON!" you know? I give this category a A for it's amazing speed!WiFi quality: I love this category. Mine plays most H.D. videos and can just download apps from its app store rather then having to connect it to the computer to download things. That i can really appreciate. I can open up nearly all web-sights just the way they would appear on the internet unlike my last touch pad. I would say in order to get the full i pad 2 experience WiFi is a must-have. I give WiFi a A for great function!Speakers: Lets put it this way, the speakers... they could use some work. Sometimes when i have it to the maximum sound it is hard to hear. That is not something that i favor based on the fact that the i pad is like, 40% sound, but i still like the product. If you have this problem i suggest going to a quieter area or plugging in ear phones to assure you get the most out of your money.Covers: I don't have a smart-cover. Perhaps the smart-covers do save the battery and make the screen sleep when you put the cover over it, but i have a cover that's not a smart-cover and it is just fine. As long as you turn it off when not in use for long periods of time any covers should work. Note that the cover should fit nicely around the i pad 2, that way, it is a better buy and protects the i pad more. i would suggest a case to help protect it and make a nice little stand for it. You can't exactly rate a cover because there are many different ones, but here is my rate on how important a cover is to have to me. A B. Its optional, but a good idea.App Usage speed: Most of the apps i use are great, fast, functional, and don't have jerky movements. Take Talking Friends apps for example. They are fun, functional, and fast. Just how it should be, not to mention very clever. There isn't much to say about this particular category, but let me just say it deserves a A or B for nice function.Note where there should have been another Category view: I haven't had really any interaction with a regular i pad, so i can't say if the i pad 2 is really "new and improved", but i can say its good for me and very fast. Keep that in mind.Video and Photo booth: I love making videos, so i was happy to hear that the i pad 2 came with a camera ready to make some videos! It is a personal highlight. Also photo booth is fun. seeing what your pictures look like in x-ray vision, and flipped, and so much more. I really liked that. too bad you can't film videos in photo booth :( Also note that both of these are the free apps that come right when you get the i pad. the video is connected to camera app.Personal Favorites: I love the i pad 2, but my favorite features about it, are the following:.Its very thin and simple, which is very neat..The apps are great and so are their function..A i pad without WiFi is a very sad i pad..Videos and photo booth..speed!-------> ZOOMGRAND CLOSING..These are all my opinions of different category in the i pad 2. Comment if there is more you want to know about the i pad 2 and i will see if i have an answer to add to this review for you. Thanks for reading! Hope it helped!!

Reviews.Title: Another winner for Apple.
Reviews.Author: cenobite
Reviews.Content: All I can say about the iPad 2 is that it is simply amazing. The faster 1 ghz dual core A5 processor is a workhorse. The display is very high quality and is very easy on the eyes. Watching movies and surfing the web over WiFi is a joy, especially compared to the iPhone 4 which I have and love, but the limited browsing capabilities of the iPhone is enough to make you want for something larger. For iPhone users, the interface is familiar and easy to adapt to, and for new users, it is easy to learn. The iPod and Videos features are nice to have when travelling, and for those who like to read, the iBooks app is a capable book reader and there are thousands of ePub books and PDF files out there to load up on. For people that use Office to write letters and school papers, there is the iLife office suite which is Office compatible in most cases.There is a bonus for musicians. The iPad is becoming a professional tool for musicians with a plethora of music utilities, software synths (including a few Moog products), guitar amp simulators and even Garage Band to write and record on the go. The only thing is I wish it were more of an open platform and I wish it had stereo speakers, although most times I listen with earbuds.If you are thinking of the Kindle Fire or an Android tablet, the only advice I can give is DON'T ... The iPad 2 is a great tablet, and is constantly growing to meet the needs of all different types of users.

Reviews.Title: It is NOT a PC replacement
Reviews.Author: Ivy
Reviews.Content: It's an Itouch or an Iphone but bigger: nothing more. I have clients contacting me wanting to get it so they can do this and that with it, and quite frankly it's not best for that.I recently gotten one and I love it. I turn it on instantly, look something up, entertain myself with games, etc.However it does have it's limitations, and the most annoying thing is it does not support Adobe Flash which limits you on many websites: NOT THOSE KIND OF WEBSITES!!!I like Apple products for the most part they are a solid product. But their direction at times is completely narrow-minded like not support Adobe Flash.For what it is I will give it 4 stars, minus one for their lack of support in other areas. Hopefully that will change one day.

Reviews.Title: thank you
Reviews.Author: zahrah
Reviews.Content: i love it so much. it is an amazing product. it is Small size and swish at the same time works very excellent. also my friends like it.

Reviews.Title: Good product, arrived early
Reviews.Author: Jamal
Reviews.Content: Product received early and in excellent shape.. certainly exceeded my expectations. The iPad is great and exactly as perscribed. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Novagoth
Reviews.Content: Ive had my Ipad2 for 3 weeks now and found that i cant put it down. I aldready have the Iphone 4 and the Ipod touch 16 gig model. What i love about apple is the inner connectivity between all 3 products. Icloud hasnt been a disappointment and love all the great apps. Its very customizable to fit all your needs and has really improved my daily living. though id like to have gotten the higher storage model for the storage but the price is very high. The cameras are great and takes great pictures. resolution for gaming is great and video chat has worked well with staying in contact with family and friends. the Ipad is a great size and very convienant to carry. i used to carry a large laptop everywhere. it was very heavy and alot to set up. This has made life alot easier and travel alot more plesant. Ive been very happy with apple products and look forward to the future and thier new systems

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Haseena
Reviews.Content: After five months of using a 16GB iPad 2 WiFi (no 3G), I can honestly say that it is one of the most useful technology purchases I can think of. While its price may be a little expensive I defiantly think it's worth every penny.Part of the reason the iPad  is perfect for travel is that you can use it in any position, unlike a laptop, where you have to find a seat It won't ever got hot or overheat. Personally, I've had a couple laptops expire on me due to overheating. You always have to keep them on a firm surface so you don't block the vents. The iPad doesn't have these problems. You no longer have to grab a tray or giant book to set your laptop on when using it in bed.Video Skype works great on this tablet - the cameras make showing people things FAR simpler due to the front and back placement.The battery life is excellent! This thing can go for two days without a recharge! And that's with fairly heavy usage (try that with a laptop!)The touchscreen is extremely responsive, the machine is very fast - wifi works extremely well.The only issue I have is the reflective screen - I am not a fan of the reflective screen and have ordered a matte screen protector - not because I feel it needs protecting, but because I want to be able to read in various lighting conditions.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable!!!
Reviews.Author: mate
Reviews.Content: I was not sure if I'm gonna get a black or white but I'm very glad I got the white cuz it's really coooool!!

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Rafael
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto, hice mi compra desde Venezuela y el aparato llego a tiempo y en perfecto estado, altamente recomendado el vendedor.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: CRiley10
Reviews.Content: My husband ordered this item (iPad 2, 16gb, black) for work. He loves it. We still have been unable to update it to iOS 5 because our wifi kept disconnecting on wifi on laptop but I think when we do that it will be faster. First day he had some slowness but not everything is great. We looked at getting some of the tablets on the android market and went to best buy to review. I liked the idea because the androids are more customizable but had reservations because 1. They are about the same price as iPads 2. Wasn't sure if I wanted to take that risk. 3. I have iPhones and know how dependable they are. However I found the toshiba thrive and it was cheaper. So that was our main focus. Toshiba thrive vs. iPad 2. On one hand the toshiba had USB ports, sd card ports and customization options, on the other if was not familiar with it. So we tried them both at best buy. Toshiba thrive looked better. It's graphics looked more fun, apps are cheaper..mostly free and all that. But it was more complicated, which i love because I like to tween things. My husband on the other hand...does not. So he wanted iPad...I wanted toshiba thrive but we wanted to talk to somebody who knew more about it. So we grabbed a guy who only deals with tablets. He said he has an android phone and likes it but as far as tablets go he said hands down iPad won. Reason was that apple makes one specific hardware for iPads. So they had it perfected. All their apps and music were specifically made for apple hardware so it had very little problems. Android market on the other hand is made from many different tablets, that are all made by different hardware. Therefore, if an app is made on a toshiba thrive, it may work great, but if you download it for your samsung thrive, the hardware is different so you are going to have more freezes with all, crashes or lack of working at all.In conclusion, iPad 2 so far is more dependable and perfected. I do believe however, with time, the android market will be more perfected. As of now, I am siticking with my iPad 2!

Reviews.Title: Great for business purposes
Reviews.Author: Tailgater
Reviews.Content: I am pretty new to this tablet market but after having this iPad for about a week. I am for the most part impressed.Packaging: Apple has always impressed when it comes to their packaging. The box is very sleek and makes you very happy with your purchaseSetup: Now since this is only the wifi version, it doesn't require much setup.Now after everything was setup, I had fun connecting downloading all the apps and seeing what neat things I could do with it. I have an iPhone so I was apply to move over all my photos, songs, files, etc to the iPad and it was very easy. The plan for this iPad is to use in meetings and allow the customers to flip through the pictures or files that I am showing.Downfalls: The issues I have been having with this is that since I only have an iPhone 3GS, the tethering (personal hotspot) can only be connect through bluetooth so the internet isn't as fast as through wifi. I also wish there was some sort of case that comes with the iPad. I had to spend an additional $50 for a case to protect it. The front cases that Apple make I find are not helpful at all in terms of protection so I wish Apple would offer a better of assortment of accessories rather than having to buy 'made for the ipad' products.Overall I am quite happy and am enjoying the iPad. I do quite a bit of flying so this will make my flights more enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: Nice Step Up
Reviews.Author: P Magnum
Reviews.Content: The iPad 2 is a nice step up from the first generation iPad.  The new thin design only is a reason to select the 2nd generation model over the first. There are some other changes like a doubling of the RAM size, but those first two features are the ones that will immediately jump out at you.  After that, it operates the same as the first generation iPad and is truly one of the cooler tech devices out on the market.

Reviews.Title: A wonderful toy and cyber-companion

Reviews.Content: My i Pad is a wonderful product, I am happy I bought it.It is easy to use, as intuitive as can be, and is a delight to own and use.So far, (two weeks after delivery), I ha ve downloaded a few games, plus chess, and a book, plus my subscription to two magazines.The iPad is kind of like a cyber-friend, it is there at the ready to play or do whatever, just like a happy puppy.  As a matter-of-fact, were I in charge of product-naming at Apple, this thing would have been named the iPuppy, it is just a fun creation all the way.Had I to do it again, I would repeat the purchase.Dan Elliott Jr.

Reviews.Content: Great product, very addictive, I have move all the things that I wasn't suppose to do in my laptop to the iPad 2 (internet browsing, personal email, pictures, movies, calendars, TV, news, e-Books, etc) it seems just like the right device for it, so now my laptop is only for work.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: ***** NEW IPAD2 $498.88  *****
Reviews.Author: Joe Gump "Joe Gump"
Reviews.Content: I just received a new IPAD2 delivered for $510.90.I looked at Amazon no luck.  I tried Ebay, no luck. I tried Apple.com, Apple Store, and Best Buy.On Google I found J&R.com.;  Jaques at ext.1015 sold me a new iPad2 in black.  I paid $498.88 plus $12.02 for two-day UPS.  The iPad2 arrived in two weeks.  I paid no sales tax and no CA recycle fee.  They sell all models.This was a great experience.  Since then, I bought an easy set-up Medialink wireless router, a bargain Casecrown protective case, and a couple capacitive pens, all from Amazon. Everything a great deal.  Also, check out Amazon's price on the AppleCare Protection Plan.

Reviews.Title: Powerful iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Abbas Fathy
Reviews.Content: I owned iPad 1 but, I was surprised when iPad 2 comes out. I was in need for more speed, camera, more battery life (10 hours) and more monitor resolution. Now, I have more satisfaction but still we are in need for Flash module and more development to let us use it instead of our laptop. I am using it for my project management work, some photo / movie editing, emails, presentation, Internet browsing, to do list calendar, friends caring, Facebook, and more. I compared it with motorols Xoom tablet but, I choosed the iPad 2. I love iPad 2 and I have a lot of ideas for it's required development and I hope to get a Chanel to communicate with Apple the greatest company around the world. Also, I have the Mac mini iPod and iPhone. I recommend the iPad 2 as the best tablet in the market.

Reviews.Title: damaged product
Reviews.Author: Tara Nevola
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Apple iPad 2, and received it rater quickly, within three days.  However when I went to sync it and also connect it with my wi-fi, it wouldn't connect or Sync.  I immediately brought it to apple and they said it was an internal error, a glitch.  After trying to manipulate the iPad to work, they eventually gave me a brand new one.  Thankfully, being Apple and standing behind their product 100% I received a new working iPad.

Reviews.Title: iPad not operating properly
Reviews.Author: Todd Harris
Reviews.Content: The volume control switch is not operating properly. No easy way to correct the problem without having to return it.

Reviews.Title: just as described
Reviews.Author: Julia
Reviews.Content: great price for a new ipad. ipads can do and be used for so many things now i dont know how i got along without one.

Reviews.Title: Not a computer
Reviews.Author: John W. Barton
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife and she loves it, however it is not a computer, it is only good for games and e-mail.  If you want a little computer look somewere else, this does not have any expansion ports and only work with the Apple stuff.  I only speak PC so the Apple is strange to me.

Reviews.Title: So much satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Editha A. Tupas
Reviews.Content: The screen is so clear as well as the sound. The camera is also clear and I enjoy taking pictures!

Reviews.Title: Apple ipad 2 wifi+3G review
Reviews.Author: Moses
Reviews.Content: I bought this ipad for my daughter who lives abroad, she said she loved it. I do not have any personal experience with it.Physically it looked exactly the way it was discribed.thanks for askingSincerely,Moses

Reviews.Title: I Pad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: What's to say, it does so much it's awesome. Wish I had purchased long ago for all my personnel needs..  The computer has incredible U Tube tutorials.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: Rosetta
Reviews.Content: The ipad already had an Apple ID on it so I couldn't set it up. Had to send it back.

Reviews.Title: This why we love our IPad 2
Reviews.Author: Debra L. Motley
Reviews.Content: We had gotten some very good recomidations from a couple of people whom had gotten their iPad 2 from Amazon & were very happy with them. Ours has been great and will able to keep in touch with family no matter where we are

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal
Reviews.Author: Janelle
Reviews.Content: For the price I bought it for I was expecting it to be very used but it was like it was practically brand new. So I am very happy with what I got and I am so glad I bought it from this seller

Reviews.Title: APPLE PRODUCTS SUCK!!!!
Reviews.Author: Vladimir Grishin "Vladimir"
Reviews.Content: After the last update the iPad lost all my docs. It partly restored some from the backup file, but the most important ones are missing. The Apple customer service wanted $19 to talk to me on the phone one time and allegedly resolve the problem their company has created. I just couldn't believe. They screwed up and want to make money on it!!!!  I don't like that... I'm going to get rid of their products!!! APPLE SUCKS!!! DON'T BUY THEIR "RELIABLE PRODUCTS"!!! SAVE UP YOUR MONEY!!!

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: LINDA LEE
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my IPAD.  The only  thing I am not pleased about is the fact you can't download Java.  I need Java for some game sites I go to.  But that is not the fault of the seller, Amazon or Apple.  I realize Oracle is the problem since they have a monopoly on this..

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: M. Bratton
Reviews.Content: Really enjoy the iPad and so do our granddaughters.  It is a nice piece of technology.  I like that we can take it anywhere we go.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: StephanieDP3
Reviews.Content: I've never had an apple product before so this iPad 2 is my first. And I have to say I really like it! It makes me want more Apple in my home. Also my seller shipped really fast and the product arrived in very good condition and I got a great value for my money!!

Reviews.Title: Why 2 star
Reviews.Author: ai chan1
Reviews.Content: Because when I upgraded the IOS , the wifi just got very weak that  i cant connect when I am over 5 feet away from my D Link router.And I just bought a refurbished model  and I will most likely donate this to my brother. I have a feeling that Apple is rendering their older hardware useless so we buy the  new model.

Reviews.Title: Price and promise
Reviews.Author: Corey Nelson
Reviews.Content: Item was in in great condition. Better than what I expected and a great price.  I got more than promised!!

Reviews.Title: Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: Paul W.
Reviews.Content: I'm really impressed with the Ipad 2.  It's everything I thought it would be and the service from Amazon is the best.

Reviews.Title: VERY NICE
Reviews.Author: Timothy J Homan
Reviews.Content: WORKED GREAT BEFORE UPDATES NOT SURE WHY UPDATES MAKE IT WORK WORSE, A LITTLE ANNOYED ON HOW UPDATES MAKE ELECTRONICS THIS HARD TO OPERATE!

Reviews.Title: never used the other things
Reviews.Author: daisymae "daisymae"
Reviews.Content: it would not hold a charge so I sent it back thinking they would send me another one that did work.  The company stayed in touch with me and I was very impressed with their service, and I loved the I pad was very disappointed when it would not hold a charge.

Reviews.Title: Defective iPad
Reviews.Author: rhonda l burden
Reviews.Content: Was advertised "like new" - looked  ok until I tried to adjust the volume, unable to set, then I noticed a large dent around the volume switch. The volume goes up and down and the switch does not respond. This item was certainly not like new defective.

Reviews.Title: Expensive and useless paperweight
Reviews.Author: D. W. Lunt
Reviews.Content: Bought this unit at another retailer several years ago. Happy for quite  a while, then something happened to ability to connect to home wifi network. All other devices in house continue to work fine. That includes laptops, tablets, printers, DVD player, and Roku. Searched for support online. Found forums full of similar complaints. Lots of potential solutions but none has worked for me. Even purchased an extender for wireless router. As it is I have to sit on floor in front of the router or the extender to get more than a single bar and to access anything including Amazon. I used device to watch Amazon movies on Prime, will not be continuing Prime subscription since this POS won't connect well enough to view anything. Of course it does not have an Ethernet connection so I can't even wire the paperweight to the internet.No apparent solution from Apple in the works as they appear to not recognize the problem is an iPad problem.I believe Apple IOS updates have degraded the capability. Probably a corporate decision in order to sell new devices or sell devices with 3G/4G so continuing revenue stream come in from the ISP subscriptions.I can't believe the lemmings in the Apple market let this company get away with the stunts they pull.

Reviews.Title: The best tablet
Reviews.Author: Cris Ericson
Reviews.Content: The ipad replaced my laptop for around the house Internet surfing. The Apple IOS is far superior to the Android and Windows counterparts. When Ipads came out I wasn't interested at all, then I got my hands on one and WOW!. This is a transformative product.

Reviews.Title: Hate it because the seller lied. It was used and its not charging anymore within 2 weeks using it.
Reviews.Author: Claudia Perez
Reviews.Content: Hate it i dont recommend it.  i bought a lemon Ipad 2..............The seller should have describe it was USED AND ITS YEAR OR 2 OLD and the charger was not in a very good condition. I had to buy a new charger for the Ipad.

Reviews.Title: Good!

Reviews.Content: This is really good! I can use it to do many entertainment thing. This color is really beautiful. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: hi

Reviews.Content: Bc when iam charging the ipad it kind take long to charge wich mean I used diffrent charges to.make sure not from the charge

Reviews.Title: disappointed

Reviews.Content: the item is very disappointed. The volume button is not working. I can't control the volume. I don't like it.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: Darlene Brown
Reviews.Content: I love the system however I could never get any movies to load on my system.  I was advise to take it into an APPLE store, however my time does not allow me to take time to stand in a extremely long line!

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad
Reviews.Author: Trish Arnold
Reviews.Content: I may have made a mistake on the ipad and the covers.  Either way they are great products and very useful

Reviews.Content: It is much harder to learn than I was led to believe and difficult to schudule appt times for $;100 tutoring.

Too expensive for what you get and is so restricted to Apple's dictator style software. If you love apple you'll probably love this but if not you'll dislike it just as much as I do.

Reviews.Content: I got mine refurbished, which is what i paid for ... so it's what I get I guess. I works alright, but my complaint is that the screen is separating from the body, so I have to really pay attention to that and ghetto rig it to keep it from peeling away (which is an extensive way of saying I use duct tape).Anyway, not terrible, but not great. Maybe buy one and tell them you don't want yours falling apart on you.

Reviews.Content: I just picked up an iPad 2!  Love the product!  Personally think this iPad gives you the most bang for your buck.  Also had to pick up a Bed Butler while I was at it.  Pretty sweet new product..Bed Butler 16" Pro Bedside Caddy for Laptops and Remotes

Reviews.Title: Battery dies out quickly
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The battery sucks so bad.  I have to keep it charged in constantly, and even while the screen is on and it's plugged in, the battery still dies...it's the weirdest most awful thing, especially since I got the iPad thinking that it would be stable for business purposes.

Reviews.Title: Great value

Reviews.Content: Arrived in great condition and works as expected, would purchase again, highly recommend, for business purpose this is great for the money.

I have been searching for FACETIME application and it is NOT on this IPAD 2.I have been told that this IPAD 2 was probably manufactured for sale in UAE or other middle eastern country and Apple does not include FaceTime on these products.ALSO, IT CANNOT be down loaded after market.

Reviews.Title: Good

Reviews.Content: I found you product was great and fast handing with all the shipment thanks for and I like at so much that's why I recommend my friends and family

Reviews.Title: IPAD2

Reviews.Content: I just love my ipad 2 - with all of the cool apps and music - nice!!!  Easy to use and portable

Reviews.Title: blurry. resolution is way too low.
Reviews.Author: Peter Ian Staker
Reviews.Content: they shouldnt have even bothered with the resolution on this. if you have average vision or better, this wont look very sharp compared to most other tablets. resolution is too low for a screen this size. and another thing: the icons are spaced out too far. other than that, it works as youd expect.

Reviews.Title: Cost Effective and Totally Useful
Reviews.Author: Happy
Reviews.Content: My refurbished iPad seems to work just fine. The rate I paid for it makes it almost disposable.  It's Excellent!

Reviews.Title: IPAD 2
Reviews.Author: Mary B.
Reviews.Content: It is fun to use and performs just as I would expect it to.  The screen is easy to see, and is simple to use. There are many free apps that are available from the app store which makes it easy to get started using it.

Reviews.Title: iPad wasn't quite as good as my old one which was the next generation, but overall I was very pleased.
Reviews.Author: Fred Davis
Reviews.Content: My rating was based on the earlier iPad I had which was the next generation. Overall I was well pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: IPAD 2
Reviews.Author: Ronald E Clapsaddle
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a reduced price IPAD 2 to give to my son.  He got it and is using it to transfer photos from his digital camera to it wirelessly.  Also, his 3 kids are playing games on it.  They love it.

Reviews.Title: OKAY
Reviews.Author: okoroafor n.
Reviews.Content: MET MY EXPECTATION BUT WOULD HAVE PREFARE THE ONE I CAN USE A MODEM WITH.WILL TRY AND RECOMMEND TO FRIENDS.THANKS

Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Content: Love it  it work s wonderful  I'm planning to bye my sister one  and my three grand baby's  for a great xmass gife thank you

Reviews.Title: I paid all this money in Verizon says that I cannot connected to the 3G network

Reviews.Content: Just a total waste, plus the unit came with dings in the back I wouldn't trust the seller. Make sure the unit can get on 3G if you buy used iPad

Reviews.Title: Stuck some times....
Reviews.Author: zainab
Reviews.Content: My iPad is really nice and I am so happy with it but it dies stuck some time which makes me really sad

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: Jacob Sturgill
Reviews.Content: I love my Ipad if you do not have one I recommend buying one it is my computer on the go or more like entertainment for the kids that I can put new media on everyday and they love it

Reviews.Title: Great if your going Apple
Reviews.Author: novice
Reviews.Content: Had an I phone 4 and now a 5. I am still learning all the iPads capabilities but the two have worked together very well. Like most Apple products intuitive and easy to use. I love it but so far to me its just a large extension of the I phone.

Reviews.Title: I love the ipad
Reviews.Author: memorybooker
Reviews.Content: I bought this a while ago and just realized I didnt leave a review.  I have loved the ipad.  I have hundreds of apps loaded and have had no issues.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: cranston
Reviews.Content: Everything worked perfectly! I was very pleased and I am sure I will order again. Keep up the great work.

Reviews.Title: Still love it years later
Reviews.Author: Nathan G
Reviews.Content: I have had my iPad 2 since the first shipment dates.  I ordered it Apple direct and have been pleased with it every day.  I would order the largest size when I replace it as I have run out of space on my 32GB iPhone.  I prefer the krakken(available at amazon) case for this and it has kept it safe for years. I dont miss any of the features of the current full size iPad but do think its bigger than I would prefer.  When I upgrade it will likely be to a mini.  Happy shopping!

Reviews.Title: I love the ipad
Reviews.Author: memorybooker
Reviews.Content: I bought this a while ago and just realized I didnt leave a review.  I have loved the ipad.  I have hundreds of apps loaded and have had no issues.

Reviews.Content: I had to pay $5 to have this redirected as it require a signature in person only-this should have been told up front

Reviews.Title: Exactly as ordered

Reviews.Content: Received sooner than expected! It was exactly what I expected. The price was great and I've had no problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Returned it - not new
Reviews.Author: Debra
Reviews.Content: This product was advertised as new, but the box was opened.  It was also poorly packaged.  Consequently it was a little "banged up" when it arrived.

Reviews.Title: better than expected
Reviews.Author: Janet Lambert
Reviews.Content: The product arrived in better than expected condition.  Im only disappointed by the size of the memory.  Any home videos take up most of the memory not leaving enough room for any programs.  There's no way to transfer video off or plug a sim card into the device.  Thats Apple not the shipper's issue.

Reviews.Title: Happy as punch
Reviews.Author: sofayhe
Reviews.Content: I Did my research, and love this product.  Must have! And often better than most tablets I have messed with.

Reviews.Title: Good; bad shipping box
Reviews.Author: MWilkinson
Reviews.Content: The iPad works great, I have found no problems at all with it. I am so happy with the product. The only thing I didn't like was the packaging. The box was barely taped shut, I could stick my entire hand in the side of it. No bubble wrap was placed around the iPad box to protect from damages. I would have liked amazon to pay closer attention to their shipping boxes

Reviews.Title: I'm so sorry for my kids!!
Reviews.Author: paola vasquez
Reviews.Content: I git this iPad for my little ones. It was to b a surprise. and it really was BUT FOR ME.The condition wasn't the bestUnfortunately and without any reason this peace of @&$!?(() in the middle of a game it starts going on and off. The screen goes completely dark. I'm so disappointed because I really thought I was making a goog decision but is is toght to recognize that I didn't.My husband was right the cheapest some times is the most expensive.

Reviews.Title: Do not get if this will be your main computer!
Reviews.Author: Nightblaze
Reviews.Content: As far as tablets go the iPad is alright, works just fine. There were a few things about it that I didn't like but they really didn't matter to me (ex: camera, keyboard, etc). But the main problem I had was the limitations. For instance say someone wants to play a facebook game or something similar, cannot play it. You can play games found on the AppStore, but not your favorite online game. All in all it is a decent table, I don't recommend this for people wanting something as their main computer, this computer has too many limitations. For what it is Apple needs to lower pricing, it's not worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Buen producto
Reviews.Author: garl3000@yahoo.es
Reviews.Content: Producto excelente y buen estado entregado a tiempo y en condiciones óptimas altamente recomendado el vendedor y con buena credibilidad

Reviews.Title: great purchase

Reviews.Content: great purchase; good price for the item.  Husband is loving his new ipad which was a gift for this past Christmas.

Reviews.Content: this thing is the best and i didn't have to spend an arm and a leg for it so i am very satisfied.  amazon is my new ordering center.

Reviews.Author: britneymcdan
Reviews.Content: Great product. And amazing Christmas gift for my paramour. I really think this word requirement for a review is quite ridiculous, by the way!

Reviews.Content: Several modules came after this one but it still beats the hell out of the copycats tablet..Simply the best tablet on the planet.

Reviews.Title: Very Excited and can't wait!

Reviews.Content: Very Excited about this Ipad2  I have tested it and have loaded all my games.  Works great!  Can't wait for my son to see it Christmas morning!

Reviews.Title: No less of what I expected
Reviews.Author: Cesar F.

Reviews.Title: Great for games, entertainment, not so much for productivity
Reviews.Author: theniner
Reviews.Content: Hardware:The design of the iPad is exceptional with smooth curved edges and elegant textures of soft-touch metal. One problem that is apparent and has been stated multiple times is the weight of the device. It is too heavy to hold comfortably with one hand and the wrist may feel sore or achy after long periods of use. At the time of release, the screen was good enough for the average person to use. However, now with HD screens on devices less than half the size, the iPad's screen is seeming to pale in comparison. In addition, the battery life is quite exceptional. It lasts for weeks in Standby mode and also for long duration while reading or watching movies. Another point is that the cameras on the device are extremely poor, the resulting pictures looking too pixelated to view. You can forget about low-light shooting, because of a lack of flash and a poor image sensor.Software:iOS has always been a novel user interface, not for the unlimited functions, but for the extremely easy to use USER INTERFACE. Heck, I have seen kids not even 2 years old who know how to unlock and play their favorite games on the devices. The app store offers an abundance of games, and "productivity" apps. However, these productivity apps are not that easy to use. Lots of fonts supported by Microsoft Word do not work on these apps and the formatting is often completely messed up when transitioning from my laptop to the iPad. Apple needs to get Microsoft to build a preloaded app that will be accessible from other places in the OS.Overall:It's hard to recommend a product which is primarily limited to games, but if you're looking for an entertainment device, I would recommend the iPad 3 or 4 which have better graphics, a better processor, and a better screen. For the price, this is a good buy.

Reviews.Title: It's an overpriced/oversized iPod touch...
Reviews.Author: H. Ricks
Reviews.Content: ...but I love it!I was skeptical at first for getting one because the specs didn't/doesn't seem to justify the price.  I have a laptop, desktop and a very good Android phone so I didn't really need this.  But I've owned many Apple products (Macs and iPods) too, but never an iOS device.  So, as a birthday gift, I wanted to splurge (haha).Not to sound like an Apple ad/fanboy (or SJ-RIP), but I do like its `convenience.' I like that I can `lounge' with this instead of being at my desktop, having to deal with the bulk of a laptop or the small size (and power) of my smartphone.  The touchscreen is very responsive and the image quality (be it pictures, web pages, video-especially HBO) is great.  There is little to understand or setup (except connecting it to your wifi, if you got a wifi only; if you know/use Apple, Android or Windows, you'll figure it out easily).  I got a 32 gig because I wasn't sure what my ratio would be for apps vs. media/pic content (even with Apple's cloud service).Granted, it has some limitations (be it lack of `flash,' getting used to the onscreen keyboard and some multi-tasking capabilities), but its conveniences do make up in its usefulness (that is, if you use it for web surfing, checking email, using apps, etc).  I've had to stop myself at times from saying `I'm doing those things on such a thin device'-haha.I'll say that this is a very good `half-top,' that is, half a desktop/laptop.  It isn't to replace my computer or smartphone, but I do find myself using this more in leisure than my actual computer (haha).  I know there are less expensive tablets and/or tablets with better software/hardware specs.  But this device is a delight to have when/if you don't want to use your smartphone or computer.

Reviews.Title: The Best yet

Reviews.Content: This is by far my favorite toy.  It's more usesr freindly and even more helpful for almost everything I want it for, except the portability issue since theiPod touch fits in your pocket but leaving that aside, it's really mobile, you can take it with you everywhere. This product has literally helped me get over my Ex. Ipad 2 is so much more than just a lareger ipod toch instrument.  People making such claims dont seem to have used one. I agree that because applications are similar and they both share the same iOS, the experience might not seem that different, but once you get your hands on it, the bigger screen, the dual core processor, larger memory and longer battery so I like it better.

Reviews.Content: ok i am some one who loves the ipad it is just mindblowing i got this a few weeks it came out and it took 3weeks to get here but it is totally woth the wait. the grafics are amazing the app store is practickly one of a kind compared to other systims and it is litning fast. the thing is as simple to use and can still complete your tasks. my only regret is you cant use java flash on it but there are apps to fix that. there are a few apps to let you login to your computer and make you tablet your computer when you need one.again this is very well the best tablet

Reviews.Title: iPad2
Reviews.Author: Richard Drosche "Semper Fi!"
Reviews.Content: I am more than satisfied with my recent purchase of an Apple iPad2.  It's everything I expected and more.  It is much easier to carry around the house and elsewhere than was our laptop.  And with the Portenzo case I bought for it, it looks good setting on our coffee table.  It's fun just downloading and testing the many applications available.  This is a must have.Rick

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!
Reviews.Author: R. Sjursen "Grandma"
Reviews.Content: I love my I pad.  I carry it with me wherever I go.  It's convenient and has everything I want....e-mail, web capability and more.  I would highly recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: The Best of the Best
Reviews.Author: Debra C
Reviews.Content: The new Ipad 2011 is AWESOME. I own both the first Ipad and this new one, and Apple went beyond my expectations on this second one. One of the reasons I love Apple products, whether it be the Iphone or the Ipad, is because of the apps. The new Ipad apps are AWESOME! Also the new Ipad games are pretty cool, also. The new Ipad 2011 still has a few minor issues but absolutely nothing to be concerned with. The new Ipad is so far above and beyond any other tablet out. One of the other cool things about the Ipad 2 is that it is similar to a regular laptop computer when it comes to updates. The new Ipad updates are sent to the tablet automatically, but you can also go online and get additional updates. The new Ipad 2011 also offers some sleek new designs in its covers. Very think and hardly noticable. I would strongly recommend the Ipad 2 over any other tablet on the market. The new Ipad 2011 is a winner in my book!!

Reviews.Title: Slick!
Reviews.Author: Heidi B.
Reviews.Content: This thing is incredible.  It's got great games and is better for quickly checking my email, and filing it, than my desktop computer.  It took about five minutes to transfer my address book from my Palm to my iPad, including looking up instructions.  The email client and address book are integrated, so I can easily update email addresses in the address book.  It's sleek and smooth and nice to touch.I had a little trouble figuring out iTunes to start with (because I was trying to download Plants vs. Zombies before completing the OS update and other setup tasks).  I still haven't figured out how to force synch.  And it bugs me that everything goes through iTunes -- I want to be able to drag and drop files to it from my computer.The default keyboard utility is useless for any kind of coding -- I've ordered the ZAGGmate keyboard case.To summarize:  this is a giant lump of awesome that comes with some minor irritations.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2

Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the ipad2.Very user friendly and not like a notebook itis very portable and convenient.I use it everyday for research or just fun.

Reviews.Content: functions well, not enough instructional information included need to seek additional information. Overall a good product not sure alot of difference between generations.

Reviews.Title: I love this thing
Reviews.Author: Kevin S. Morgan
Reviews.Content: I travel for work and this thing is the best thing you can think of for your frequent traveler ( the only thing you have to watch out for is leaving it in that little pocket but at least they offer software to track it with) Only happened to me once and I got it back.

Reviews.Title: NEVER going back to Kindle Fire again!
Reviews.Author: larsona
Reviews.Content: First, let me tell you about what you can do on a Kindle Fire...I just told you what you can do on a Kindle Fire. The only advantage the Kindle Fire has over the iPad is the Directory (built-in) and the Android side-loading. The apps are not well built, and after a while, the UI (or user interface) gets old!-Now, let me tell you what you can do on a iPad that is BETTER than the Kindle Fire:Video, Camera, Skype, Kindle APP, (which I find WAY better than that of the Kindle its self), Agmented realiy apps (Such as Flow, junaio, Microsoft Photosynh), apps that require audio input and iPhone apps.-There are MORE things you can do, too though I just named a couple. If, in the case that there are no apps that suit your needs on the iPad, it works with iPhone apps VERY well, too.-75% of my LIFE is on this thing (iPad), and on my old Kindle, less than 5%. Saddly, the iPad killer just got killed by the iPad.

Reviews.Title: Teribble antialiasing - cannot read PDFs at all.
Reviews.Author: uzevla
Reviews.Content: The pixel density on this tablet is good enough to get good smoothing of the font edges. Yet, the iOS doesn't do well here. In result, reading PDFs is impossible as it causes some serious strain on my eyes. I have 20" LCD HP crap that has ~3 less pixel density. Yet, the font edges are as good as on this IPAD. Huh.I see IPAD3 fixes this problem, but not in the iOS but with better screen - good for marketing since not many people even see any difference. In fact, people say the screen is not worth it. Huh. Makes me think if I got the eagle eyes or maybe there is a few million people who simply don't know nothing.If you don't need PDF, well, letters in Safari are terrible too.Also, I cannot believe there is no LED behind the Home button. There is even that dark square in it where LED could fit (like on HP touchpad). So, carrying it next to me, like iPhone, and checking email frequently is the way to go? That's ridiculous. If I am not using it, it's on the stand, not withing my reach. That's where LED comes handy.Also, when I click on Mail icon that shows new email, it opens inbox, instead the email. - few clicks more are needed to see the email. Terrible approach if you plan to use multiple accounts and receive many emails.Finally, Notification bar is not popping-up new messages when I am working on ipad. Why? Status bar is there all the time - showing some small icon when new message arrives would be completely unobtrusive.In summary, message/email communication interface is years behind Android. And yet, all that is needed are few minor changes.I was hopping that external adapter can serves as additional storage. At least read-only. But no, you can only import stuff from there. Import where? To 16GB memory? From HD camera? Ridiculous.

Reviews.Title: Over-rated but OK
Reviews.Author: hjgreg
Reviews.Content: I own a Nook Tablet, Kindle Fire and an ipad2.I would have to guess that most of the people that rate the ipad2 5 stars have not tried other tablets,Maybe you will like the ipad -- it has more apps in its store, but it also is slow compared to my Kindle Fireand lacks the customization options of Android,Apple products I have owned have malfunctioned after a few years (2 if my 4 itouchs')Not having Flash Video is a major shortcoming -- most videos online are flash -- so you will be disappointed when videosdon't play.Ipad does have a nice big screen, but no USB port, no memory card slot, average cameras and a VERY HIGH price.I bought mine because of the hype and I was curious.My advice is to check them all out before you buy - I would not have bought mine -- it is OK but over-rated with many shortcomings

Reviews.Title: Neat but not very useful
Reviews.Author: B. Omdahl
Reviews.Content: After using the iPad 2 for about six months I can definitely say that I can't wait for the Windows 8 tablet to be released. The iPad 2 is a neat toy but it is too limitd to use for any productive purposes. Number one on the list is no Flash. I can't even tell you how many times I've had to put the iPad 2 aside and grab a Windows laptop to look at a Web page. At this point, if I want to be productive I grab a Windows laptop. If I want to play games I grab the iPad 2.

Reviews.Title: Why?
Reviews.Author: Random Walker
Reviews.Content: Why pay $450 here when you can get a refurbished iPad2 directly from Apple for the same price with Apple warranty, etc.?

Reviews.Title: Andriod Does...
Reviews.Author: AMGesus
Reviews.Content: I use my Xoom for grad school everyday and I love it!  Let me say that my wife has an iPad, and I like it too.  However, iOS feels like training wheels and Honeycomb feels like the real deal.  Android is more like an actual computer while iOS feels like (and is) a giant phone.  I can do things like download Power Points directly to my device and open them using Docs To Go.  What good are 10,000 apps if they are all games?!  I have not discovered anything yet that my iPad colleagues in school can do that I cannot with the Xoom, but only Android has widgets, multiple desktops, Google integration, the list goes on and on...  Honeycomb is getting new apps everyday and you are free of Apple's restrictive environment.  Plus, Ice Cream Sandwich is going to polish off Android and take it to the next level.  Take it from me, if you want open accessibility, maximum customization, and the slickest OS, you want Android.  MOTOROLA XOOM Android Tablet (10.1-Inch, 32GB, Wi-Fi)

Reviews.Title: Typing
Reviews.Author: Phil Quigley
Reviews.Content: I just got my new iPad 2.now i'M going to try to type on the iPad screen. first u can't look away because u can't rest your fingers on the screen-- and even if u could  u couldn't feel the keys. it is much like texting on the iPhone. U have to go to the numbers screen to find the " ' " or the numbers. There are no forward or back arrows, so u have to touch the screen where u want the cursor to go.The good part is that the letter is registered immediately when u hit the key-- u don't have to hit it twice to get it to enter the letter.All in all, I think an external keypad is needed so I'm going shopping.

Reviews.Title: APPLE: BUY OR DIE
Reviews.Author: B. Lynch "the_onewhoknows"
Reviews.Content: April 4, 2011 -- Apple Security shot would be robbers of the Chula Vista, CA store, killing one person and severely wounding two others, No iPAds or other Apple equipment was damaged, so Apple investors' earnings and capital are safe.Most people probably would not go to the same extremes as Apple does to protect their iPad's, iPod's, and i-everything else's.  But think about WHY you want an iPad-2 or similar device, then compare the convenience and utlility of owning the devices, and Apple's iPad is very hard to beat.The big negative is the high price.  Another is no full hardware-level interface for UBS, SD, or Flash/Shockwave/Adobe support -- I can't figure out why not. You can hook several devices into the iPad-2, but in most cases (especially for cameras, SD cards, etc.) you'll need to have at least one physical media adapter.  Apple has maintained that Adobe Flash, Showckwave, et.al are obsolete, so they have no plans to support any of it.  Time will tell if Apple is correct (if not, then expect another adapter in a year or so).The positives outweigh the negatives however.The size and weight make the iPad-2 extremely easy to carry around, and convenient to use. For now, this IS a major advantage, but 'Moore's Law' about the rate of electronics miniaturization is still 'in effect', so the iPad-2's weight and dimension advantage will be gone within 2 years. By 2013, it's a good bet that all devices will be at elast as light and thin as the iPad-2, and they'll all do 'more stuff, faster' for about the same (or maybe less) money.The iPad-2's camera-system, with 'face-to-face' conferencing potential is more of a theoretical advantage than a real one: it only works well if you and the people with whom you're conferenceing have similar device capability (2 way video) and reliable broad-bandwidth availability. Otherwise, the experience and results are less than thrilling.The iPAD2 RAM memory is double that of the iPAD (512MB), which means faster performance of many graphic-intensive apps, and better responsiveness for users who like to 'multi-task' with several apps running at once.The Application software availaible fo the iPad-2 far exceeds that which is available for most competing devices, both in terms of quantity and quality. This is probably the main reason to get an iPad 2 -- you can just do more stuff (useful, recreationsl, fun, or other) with an iPAD-2, because more people have developed and marketed apps for the iPad/Apple platform than has been the case for anything else.  Given the overall state of flux for mobile computing, with platform and operating systems shifting, APPL (with a relatively stable operating platform and system) may be able to maintain its advantage in applications for some time.Worth killing people to own?  Don't mess with Apple: if you go into their stores, be sure you have enough money to get out alive.  In the mean time, April 2011 seems to be a good month in which to sell AAPL common stock. Legal and other problems appear likely to take a severe toll on the company'e equity valuation.

Reviews.Title: Don't drink the apple kool-aid
Reviews.Author: Brandon Sherman
Reviews.Content: Do you like watching online media that comes from other media distributors and not just pay apple for everything you watch? Would you like to watch videos you already own on a mobile Device without hours of re-encoding to Apples proprietary format for each video you want to watch?Well then don't buy Apple products because they have the same IRON Grip on every one. I own Apple products (luckily I didn't have to buy them all my job did) and I've been sorely disappointed with every one. Apple products have not Flash support, no Java support, and no support for almost any video formats that are not Apple proprietary.If you want a mobile pad that plays almost any video I would suggest the Asus Eee pad both support flash, and both support Java, so that means online streaming sites work, and online flash games work. (two things Apple don't want you to be able to use so you have to get videos and games from them.)Now I can't speak for the Galaxy (though I've heard good things) but the Asus Eee pad is great for video. To watch video on the Asus Eee pad you plug in the pad, it comes up as a drive, you drag your video files to the Asus pad, and then you watch them without having to re-encode. This pad has played every video file I've tried. Be smart get almost anything other than an Ipad, you'll be happier not being told what you can do, and what to buy, that is ALMOST as good as what YOU actually want to do with a product YOU spent money for.And remember don't drink the Apple Kool-aid and don't listen to the brainwashed hype of the Apple sheep who tell you to stay in the heard.

Reviews.Title: Apple does not fix Ipads
Reviews.Author: UNHAPPY BUYER
Reviews.Content: BUYER BEWARE - IPADS ARE DISPOSABLE ELECTRONICS. My Ipad broke so I took it to an Apple store, but THEY WILL NOT FIX IT. Instead Apple will give you a refurbished Ipad if your warranty is still in effect. If your warranty has expired then your only option may be to throw your Ipad away. This means that after 13 months (unless you pay for an extra year of warranty then it will be 25 months) you could be flushing $500-$800 down the toilette. Even worse, if you are still under a warranty then Apple will give you a refurbished Ipad which could have 2-3 year old parts in it. An Applette at an Apple store told me that any broken Ipads are sent back to the factory where the unbroken parts are recycled into other Ipads. In other words, if you have a 6 month old Ipad that breaks, you could get a replacement that is already 2 years old. These disposal electronics only have a 3-5 year lifespan and `refurbished' has a reputation of lasting 1 month past the end of the warranty period or 6 months, whichever is a shorter period. If you are one of those that just has to have an Ipad then buy the cheapest one, otherwise buy the competitors for ¼ to ½ the price of an Ipad. BTW, Apple might use old Ipad 1 parts in a refurbished Ipad 2.

I'm giving this a one-star unless this business backs up their end.  Otherwise, I would highly discourage you from doing business from this place.  Quite the unhappy buyer right now. If I hear back from this company, dependingon how they decide to deal with returns to their business, will depend on whether I leave it at one star or bump it up to a business upholding good customer service.
